```dart
/// Base class cho t·∫•t c·∫£ k·∫øt qu·∫£ t√≠nh to√°n th·∫ßn s·ªë h·ªçc
abstract class NumerologyResult {
  final int? number;
  final bool isMasterNumber;
  final String? displayValue; // For cases where result is not a number
  final dynamic interpretation;

  const NumerologyResult({
    this.number,
    this.isMasterNumber = false,
    this.displayValue,
    this.interpretation,
  });

  /// Get the display text for this result
  String get display => displayValue ?? number?.toString() ?? '';
  
  /// Check if this result has valid data
  bool get isValid => number != null || displayValue != null;
}

/// Life Path specific result
class LifePathResult extends NumerologyResult {
  LifePathResult({
    required int number,
    required bool isMasterNumber,
    dynamic interpretation, // Now optional for Hero animation support
  }) : super(
          number: number,
          isMasterNumber: isMasterNumber,
          interpretation: interpretation,
        );
}

/// Generic result for other factors
class GenericNumerologyResult extends NumerologyResult {
  GenericNumerologyResult({
    int? number,
    bool isMasterNumber = false,
    String? displayValue,
    dynamic interpretation,
  }) : super(
          number: number,
          isMasterNumber: isMasterNumber,
          displayValue: displayValue,
          interpretation: interpretation,
        );
}
```

```dart
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import '../shared/models/numerology_factor.dart';
import 'universal_numerology_result.dart';

/// Abstract base controller cho t·∫•t c·∫£ factor detail controllers
abstract class BaseFactorController extends GetxController {
  final NumerologyFactor? factor;
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  
  // Observable states
  final _isLoading = false.obs;
  final _result = Rx<NumerologyResult?>(null);
  final _errorMessage = ''.obs;

  BaseFactorController({
    this.factor,
    this.inputData,
  });

  // Getters
  bool get isLoading => _isLoading.value;
  RxBool get isLoadingRx => _isLoading;
  Rx<NumerologyResult?> get result => _result;
  Rx<NumerologyResult?> get resultRx => _result;
  String get errorMessage => _errorMessage.value;

  @override
  void onInit() {
    super.onInit();
    
    if (factor != null && inputData != null) {
      print('üìä Factor ${factor!.name} loaded for: ${inputData!.fullName}');
      
      if (factor!.isImplemented) {
        calculateResult();
      }
    }
  }

  /// Abstract method - m·ªói subclass s·∫Ω implement ri√™ng
  Future<void> calculateResult();

  /// Helper method ƒë·ªÉ set loading state
  void setLoading(bool loading) {
    _isLoading.value = loading;
  }

  /// Helper method ƒë·ªÉ set result
  void setResult(NumerologyResult? newResult) {
    _result.value = newResult;
  }

  /// Helper method ƒë·ªÉ set error
  void setError(String error) {
    _errorMessage.value = error;
  }

  /// Refresh calculation
  void refresh() {
    if (factor?.isImplemented == true) {
      calculateResult();
    }
  }

  /// Get factor info
  String get factorName => factor?.name ?? 'Unknown Factor';
  String get factorDescription => factor?.description ?? '';
  bool get isFactorImplemented => factor?.isImplemented ?? false;
  NumerologyCategory get factorCategory => factor?.category ?? NumerologyCategory.basic;
}
```

```dart
/// Universal result structure for new numerology system
class NumerologyResult {
  final int? mainNumber;
  final String? description;
  final String? calculation;
  final List<NumerologySection>? sections;
  final bool isMasterNumber;
  final String? displayValue;

  const NumerologyResult({
    this.mainNumber,
    this.description,
    this.calculation,
    this.sections,
    this.isMasterNumber = false,
    this.displayValue,
  });

  /// Get display text for this result
  String get display => displayValue ?? mainNumber?.toString() ?? '';
  
  /// Check if result has valid data
  bool get isValid => mainNumber != null || displayValue != null;
}

/// Section within a numerology result (for expandable content)
class NumerologySection {
  final String? title;
  final String? content;
  final bool isExpandable;
  final Map<String, dynamic>? metadata;

  const NumerologySection({
    this.title,
    this.content,
    this.isExpandable = false,
    this.metadata,
  });
}
```

```dart
/// Abstract base class cho t·∫•t c·∫£ calculator c·ªßa c√°c y·∫øu t·ªë th·∫ßn s·ªë h·ªçc
abstract class BaseFactorCalculator {
  /// T√≠nh to√°n y·∫øu t·ªë t·ª´ input data
  static NumerologyResult calculate(NumerologyInputModel input) {
    throw UnimplementedError('Subclass must implement calculate method');
  }

  /// Check if a number is Master Number (11, 22, 33)
  static bool isMasterNumber(int number) {
    return [11, 22, 33].contains(number);
  }

  /// Reduce number to single digit, except Master Numbers
  static int reduceToSingleDigit(int sum) {
    while (sum > 9 && !isMasterNumber(sum)) {
      sum = sumDigits(sum);
    }
    return sum;
  }

  /// Sum all digits in a number
  static int sumDigits(int number) {
    int sum = 0;
    while (number > 0) {
      sum += number % 10;
      number ~/= 10;
    }
    return sum;
  }

  /// Convert Vietnamese text to numerology values
  static int textToNumber(String text) {
    // A=1, B=2, C=3... etc
    // Will be implemented based on Vietnamese alphabet
    const map = {
      'A': 1, '√Å': 1, '√Ä': 1, '·∫¢': 1, '√É': 1, '·∫†': 1,
      'ƒÇ': 1, '·∫Æ': 1, '·∫∞': 1, '·∫≤': 1, '·∫¥': 1, '·∫∂': 1,
      '√Ç': 1, '·∫§': 1, '·∫¶': 1, '·∫®': 1, '·∫™': 1, '·∫¨': 1,
      'B': 2,
      'C': 3,
      'D': 4,
      'ƒê': 4,
      'E': 5, '√â': 5, '√à': 5, '·∫∫': 5, '·∫º': 5, '·∫∏': 5,
      '√ä': 5, '·∫æ': 5, '·ªÄ': 5, '·ªÇ': 5, '·ªÑ': 5, '·ªÜ': 5,
      'F': 6,
      'G': 7,
      'H': 8,
      'I': 9, '√ç': 9, '√å': 9, '·ªà': 9, 'ƒ®': 9, '·ªä': 9,
      'J': 1,
      'K': 2,
      'L': 3,
      'M': 4,
      'N': 5,
      'O': 6, '√ì': 6, '√í': 6, '·ªé': 6, '√ï': 6, '·ªå': 6,
      '√î': 6, '·ªê': 6, '·ªí': 6, '·ªî': 6, '·ªñ': 6, '·ªò': 6,
      '∆†': 6, '·ªö': 6, '·ªú': 6, '·ªû': 6, '·ª†': 6, '·ª¢': 6,
      'P': 7,
      'Q': 8,
      'R': 9,
      'S': 1,
      'T': 2,
      'U': 3, '√ö': 3, '√ô': 3, '·ª¶': 3, '≈®': 3, '·ª§': 3,
      '∆Ø': 3, '·ª®': 3, '·ª™': 3, '·ª¨': 3, '·ªÆ': 3, '·ª∞': 3,
      'V': 4,
      'W': 5,
      'X': 6,
      'Y': 7, '√ù': 7, '·ª≤': 7, '·ª∂': 7, '·ª∏': 7, '·ª¥': 7,
      'Z': 8,
    };

    int sum = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
      final char = text[i].toUpperCase();
      sum += map[char] ?? 0;
    }
    return sum;
  }

  /// Check if character is vowel (for Soul Number calculation)
  static bool isVowel(String char) {
    const vowels = ['A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U', 'Y', '√Å', '√Ä', '·∫¢', '√É', '·∫†', 
                   'ƒÇ', '·∫Æ', '·∫∞', '·∫≤', '·∫¥', '·∫∂', '√Ç', '·∫§', '·∫¶', '·∫®', '·∫™', '·∫¨',
                   '√â', '√à', '·∫∫', '·∫º', '·∫∏', '√ä', '·∫æ', '·ªÄ', '·ªÇ', '·ªÑ', '·ªÜ',
                   '√ç', '√å', '·ªà', 'ƒ®', '·ªä', '√ì', '√í', '·ªé', '√ï', '·ªå',
                   '√î', '·ªê', '·ªí', '·ªî', '·ªñ', '·ªò', '∆†', '·ªö', '·ªú', '·ªû', '·ª†', '·ª¢',
                   '√ö', '√ô', '·ª¶', '≈®', '·ª§', '∆Ø', '·ª®', '·ª™', '·ª¨', '·ªÆ', '·ª∞',
                   '√ù', '·ª≤', '·ª∂', '·ª∏', '·ª¥'];
    return vowels.contains(char.toUpperCase());
  }
}
```

```dart
import '../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import 'base_factor_controller.dart';
import 'universal_numerology_result.dart';
import 'calculators/numerology_calculator.dart';
import 'config/factor_config.dart';

/// Generic implementation of BaseFactorController for universal system
class GenericFactorController extends BaseFactorController {
  final int factorId;
  int? previewNumber;
  late final String heroTag;

  GenericFactorController({
    required this.factorId,
    this.previewNumber,
    String? heroTag,
    NumerologyInputModel? inputData,
    super.factor,
  }) : super(inputData: inputData) {
    // Set previewNumber after super constructor
    this.previewNumber = previewNumber;
    // Set hero tag for animations
    this.heroTag = heroTag ?? _generateHeroTag();
  }

  /// Check if we have a valid result
  bool get hasResult => result.value != null;

  @override
  Future<void> calculateResult() async {
    print('üîç GenericFactorController.calculateResult() - Factor $factorId');
    print('üîç InputData: $inputData');
    print('üîç PreviewNumber: $previewNumber');
    
    if (inputData == null) {
      print('‚ùå InputData is null, cannot calculate');
      return;
    }

    setLoading(true);
    
    try {
      NumerologyResult? result;
      
      switch (factorId) {
        case 1: // Life Path
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePath(inputData!);
          break;
        case 2: // Birth Chart
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthChart(inputData!);
          break;
        case 4: // Expression
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateExpression(inputData!);
          break;
        case 5: // Soul Urge
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateSoulUrge(inputData!);
          break;
        case 6: // Personality
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonality(inputData!);
          break;
        case 7: // Personal Year
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonalYear(inputData!);
          break;
        case 3: // Arrows
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateArrows(inputData!);
          break;
        case 8: // Nine Year Cycle
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateNineYearCycle(inputData!);
          break;
        case 9: // Birth Day Number
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthDayNumber(inputData!);
          break;
        case 10: // Maturity Number
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateMaturityNumber(inputData!);
          break;
        case 11: // Hidden Passion
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateHiddenPassion(inputData!);
          break;
        case 12: // Karmic Lessons
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateKarmicLessons(inputData!);
          break;
        case 13: // Karmic Debt
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateKarmicDebt(inputData!);
          break;
        case 14: // Attitude Number
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateAttitudeNumber(inputData!);
          break;
        case 15: // Innate Abilities
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateInnateAbilities(inputData!);
          break;
        case 16: // Life Pinnacles
          result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePinnacles(inputData!);
          break;
        default:
          // For factors not yet implemented, create a placeholder result
          result = NumerologyResult(
            mainNumber: previewNumber ?? 1,
            description: 'Y·∫øu t·ªë n√†y ƒëang ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn',
            calculation: 'Ph√©p t√≠nh ƒëang ƒë∆∞·ª£c c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t',
          );
      }
      
      print('‚úÖ Calculated result for factor $factorId: $result');
      setResult(result);
    } catch (e) {
      print('‚ùå Error calculating factor $factorId: $e');
      setError('L·ªói t√≠nh to√°n: $e');
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }

  @override
  void onInit() {
    super.onInit();
    
    // Auto-calculate if we have input data
    if (inputData != null) {
      calculateResult();
    }
  }

  /// Generate hero tag based on factor configuration
  String _generateHeroTag() {
    final config = FactorConfigHelper.getConfig(factorId);
    final baseTag = 'factor_${factorId}';
    
    if (config?.hasPreview == true && (previewNumber != null || inputData != null)) {
      // For factors with preview numbers (Life Path, Expression, etc.)
      final number = previewNumber ?? _calculateMainNumber();
      return '${baseTag}_number_${number ?? 0}';
    }
    
    return baseTag;
  }

  /// Calculate main number for hero tag generation
  int? _calculateMainNumber() {
    if (inputData == null) return null;
    
    try {
      switch (factorId) {
        case 1: // Life Path
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePath(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 4: // Expression
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateExpression(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 5: // Soul Urge
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateSoulUrge(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 6: // Personality
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonality(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 7: // Personal Year
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonalYear(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 9: // Birth Day
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthDayNumber(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 10: // Maturity
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateMaturityNumber(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 14: // Attitude
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateAttitudeNumber(inputData!).mainNumber;
        case 11: // Hidden Passion
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateHiddenPassion(inputData!).mainNumber;
        default:
          return previewNumber;
      }
    } catch (e) {
      return previewNumber;
    }
  }

  /// Check if we have preview number for immediate display
  bool get hasPreviewNumber => previewNumber != null;

  /// Get the main number (either from result or preview)
  int? get mainNumber => result.value?.mainNumber ?? previewNumber;
}
```

```dart
class FactorConfigHelper {
  static FactorConfig? getConfig(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId];

  static bool hasPreview(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId]?.hasPreview ?? false;
  }
  
  static bool isPremium(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId]?.isPremium ?? false;
  }
  
  static String getTitle(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId]?.title ?? 'Unknown Factor';
  }
  
  static HeaderType getHeaderType(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId]?.headerType ?? HeaderType.numberCircle;
  }
  
  static BodyType getBodyType(int factorId) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS[factorId]?.bodyType ?? BodyType.standard;
  }
  
  static List<int> getFactorsByHeaderType(HeaderType type) {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS.entries
        .where((entry) => entry.value.headerType == type)
        .map((entry) => entry.key)
        .toList();
  }
  
  static List<int> getPreviewFactors() {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS.entries
        .where((entry) => entry.value.hasPreview)
        .map((entry) => entry.key)
        .toList();
  }
}
```

```dart
import 'dart:ui';
import 'package:bluebyte_flutter_getx/config/assets_path.dart';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../universal_numerology_result.dart';
import '../../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import '../../shared/controllers/numerology_results_controller.dart';
import '../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';
import '../../utils/numerology_responsive.dart';

/// Base class for all header components in factor detail views
///
/// Provides consistent structure for:
/// - Number circles (premium/ordinary)
/// - 3x3 grids (birth chart, arrows)
/// - Pyramid structures (pinnacles)
abstract class BaseHeaderComponent extends StatelessWidget {
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final NumerologyResult? result;
  final String heroTag;
  final bool isLoading;

  const BaseHeaderComponent({
    super.key,
    this.inputData,
    this.result,
    required this.heroTag,
    this.isLoading = false,
  });

  /// Header background - consistent across all factors
  Widget buildHeaderBackground() {
    return Stack(
      fit: StackFit.expand,
      children: [
        // Background image
        Image.asset(
          NumerologyPath.detailBackground,
          fit: BoxFit.cover,
          width: double.infinity,
          height: double.infinity,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
        ),

        // Dark overlay gradient
        Container(
          decoration: const BoxDecoration(
            gradient: LinearGradient(
              begin: Alignment.topCenter,
              end: Alignment.bottomCenter,
              colors: [
                Colors.transparent,
                Color(0x40020931),
                Color(0xFF020931),
              ],
              stops: [0.0, 0.7, 1.0],
            ),
          ),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  /// Build the main content of the header
  /// Must be implemented by each header type
  Widget buildHeaderContent();

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return SliverAppBar(
      expandedHeight: 336.nh,
      floating: false,
      pinned: true,
      backgroundColor: const Color(0xFF020931), // Color when collapsed
      elevation: 0,
      surfaceTintColor: Colors.transparent,
      leading: Container(
        margin: EdgeInsets.only(left: 16.nw, top: 8.nh, bottom: 8.nh),
        child: GestureDetector(
          onTap: () => _handleBackNavigation(context),
          child: Container(
            width: 40.nw,
            height: 40.nw,
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.3),
              shape: BoxShape.circle,
            ),
            child: ClipOval(
              child: BackdropFilter(
                filter: ImageFilter.blur(sigmaX: 18, sigmaY: 18),
                child: const Icon(
                  Icons.arrow_back_ios_rounded,
                  color: Colors.white,
                  size: 20,
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ),
        ),
      ),
      title: Text(
        getTitle(),
        style: NumerologyTheme.detailHeaderTitle,
      ),
      centerTitle: true,
      flexibleSpace: LayoutBuilder(
        builder: (context, constraints) {
          // Calculate if AppBar is collapsed
          final isCollapsed = constraints.biggest.height <= kToolbarHeight + MediaQuery.of(context).padding.top;
          
          return Stack(
            fit: StackFit.expand,
            children: [
              // Background - only show when expanded
              if (!isCollapsed) ...[
                FlexibleSpaceBar(
                  background: Stack(
                    fit: StackFit.expand,
                    children: [
                      buildHeaderBackground(),
                      Positioned(
                        top: 156.nh,
                        left: 0,
                        right: 0,
                        child: buildHeaderContent(),
                      ),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
              ],
              // Shadow overlay when collapsed
              if (isCollapsed)
                Positioned(
                  bottom: -1, // Move down 1px to only show shadow
                  left: 0,
                  right: 0,
                  child: Container(
                    height: 2, // Slightly taller for better shadow
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(
                      color: const Color(0xFF020931), // Match AppBar color
                      boxShadow: [
                        BoxShadow(
                          color: const Color(0xFFE9E9E9).withValues(alpha: 0.20), // Slightly less opacity for subtler effect
                          offset: const Offset(0, 1),
                          blurRadius: 2.0, // Slightly less blur for sharper shadow
                          spreadRadius: 0,
                        ),
                      ],
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
            ],
          );
        },
      ),
    );
  }

  /// Get the title for this factor
  String getTitle();

  /// Handle back navigation with Hero animation optimization
  void _handleBackNavigation(BuildContext context) {
    // Get factorId from route arguments instead of constructor
    if (Get.isRegistered<NumerologyResultsController>()) {
      final resultsController = Get.find<NumerologyResultsController>();
      final factorId = Get.arguments?['factorId'] as int?;
      if (factorId != null) {
        resultsController.setActiveFactorForBackNavigation(factorId);
      }
    }

    // Navigate back
    Navigator.of(context).pop();
  }
}
```

### core/components/base_body_component.dart

```dart
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../universal_numerology_result.dart';
import '../../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import '../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';
import '../../utils/markdown_helper.dart';
import '../../utils/numerology_responsive.dart';
import '../../../../config/assets_path.dart';
import '../../../../app/routes/app_pages.dart';

/// Base class for all body components in factor detail views
/// 
/// Provides consistent structure for:
/// - Standard body (calculation + description + expandable sections)
/// - Tabbed body (tabs + tab content)
abstract class BaseBodyComponent extends StatelessWidget {
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final NumerologyResult? result;
  final bool isLoading;

  const BaseBodyComponent({
    super.key,
    this.inputData,
    this.result,
    this.isLoading = false,
  });

  /// Build calculation explanation text
  Widget buildCalculationText() {
    if (inputData?.birthDate == null) {
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }

    final explanation = getCalculationExplanation();
    if (explanation.isEmpty) {
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }

    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
      child: MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
        explanation,
        NumerologyTheme.detailCalculationText,
      ),
    );
  }

  /// Build description text (title + body)
  Widget buildDescriptionText() {
    final description = getDescription();
    if (description.isEmpty) {
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }

    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
      child: Column(
        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
        children: [
          if (description['title'] != null) ...[
            Text(
              description['title']!,
              style: NumerologyTheme.detailDescriptionTitle,
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8.nh),
          ],
          if (description['body'] != null) ...[
            MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
              description['body']!,
              NumerologyTheme.detailDescriptionBody,
            ),
          ],
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  /// Build expandable sections
  Widget buildExpandableSections(List<RxBool> expandedStates) {
    final sections = getExpandableSections();
    if (sections.isEmpty) {
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }

    return Column(
      children: sections.asMap().entries.map((entry) {
        final index = entry.key;
        final section = entry.value;

        return _buildExpandableSection(
          index,
          section['icon']!,
          section['title']!,
          section['content']!,
          expandedStates[index],
          () => expandedStates[index].toggle(),
        );
      }).toList(),
    );
  }
  
  /// Navigate to Nine Year Cycle Detail view
  void _navigateToNineYearDetail(String? title) {
    if (title == null) return;
    
    // Parse year information from title
    // Title format: "üå± NƒÉm 1 ‚Äì Kh·ªüi ƒë·∫ßu (NƒÉm 2024)"
    final yearMatch = RegExp(r'NƒÉm (\d+)').firstMatch(title);
    final actualYearMatch = RegExp(r'\(NƒÉm (\d+)\)').firstMatch(title);
    
    if (yearMatch != null && actualYearMatch != null) {
      final yearNumber = int.parse(yearMatch.group(1)!);
      final actualYear = int.parse(actualYearMatch.group(1)!);
      
      // For yearPositionInCycle, we need to determine the position
      // This is same as yearNumber for now (1-9)
      final yearPositionInCycle = yearNumber;
      
      Get.toNamed(
        Routes.NINE_YEAR_CYCLE_DETAIL,
        arguments: {
          'yearNumber': yearNumber,
          'actualYear': actualYear,
          'yearPositionInCycle': yearPositionInCycle,
        },
      );
    }
  }

  /// Build content widget for expandable sections with special handling for bold titles
  Widget _buildExpandableContent(String content, {String? title}) {
    // Special handling for Nine Year Cycle content with "Xem chi ti·∫øt"
    if (content.contains('üí° Xem chi ti·∫øt')) {
      final parts = content.split('üí° Xem chi ti·∫øt');
      final mainContent = parts[0].trim();
      
      return Column(
        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
        children: [
          // Main content (description)
          MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
            mainContent,
            NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 12.nh),
          // "Xem chi ti·∫øt" link
          GestureDetector(
            onTap: () {
              // Navigate to nine year cycle detail view
              _navigateToNineYearDetail(title);
            },
            child: Row(
              mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
              children: [
                Text(
                  'üí° ',
                  style: TextStyle(
                    fontSize: 16.nsp,
                  ),
                ),
                Text(
                  'Xem chi ti·∫øt',
                  style: TextStyle(
                    fontSize: 16.nsp,
                    fontWeight: FontWeight.w700,
                    color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED),
                    decoration: TextDecoration.underline,
                    decorationColor: const Color(0xFFFFFAED),
                  ),
                ),
              ],
            ),
          ),
        ],
      );
    }
    
    // Check if content starts with **Title**\n pattern
    if (content.startsWith('**')) {
      // Find the closing **
      final titleEndIndex = content.indexOf('**', 2);
      
      if (titleEndIndex > 0) {
        // Check what comes after the closing **
        var bodyStartIndex = titleEndIndex + 2;
        
        // Skip all newlines after the closing **
        while (bodyStartIndex < content.length && content[bodyStartIndex] == '\n') {
          bodyStartIndex++;
        }
        
        // If we found newlines and there's content after them
        if (bodyStartIndex > titleEndIndex + 2 && bodyStartIndex < content.length) {
          final titleText = content.substring(2, titleEndIndex);
          final bodyText = content.substring(bodyStartIndex);
          
          return Column(
            crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
            children: [
              // Bold title
              Text(
                titleText,
                style: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent.copyWith(
                  fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                  color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED), // Use correct color from design
                ),
              ),
              // 24nh spacing
              SizedBox(height: 24.nh),
              // Body content (may contain more markdown)
              MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
                bodyText,
                NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
              ),
            ],
          );
        }
      }
    }
    
    // Default: use normal markdown rendering
    return MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
      content,
      NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
    );
  }

  /// Individual expandable section
  Widget _buildExpandableSection(
    int index,
    String icon,
    String title,
    String content,
    RxBool isExpanded,
    VoidCallback onToggle,
  ) {
    return Container(
      margin: const EdgeInsets.only(bottom: 1),
      child: Obx(() {
        final expanded = isExpanded.value;

        return Column(
          children: [
            // Header
            GestureDetector(
              onTap: onToggle,
              child: Container(
                constraints: BoxConstraints(minHeight: 40),
                width: double.infinity,
                color: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionBackground,
                padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw, vertical: 8.nh),
                child: Row(
                  children: [
                    // Level Icon with number
                    SizedBox(
                      width: 24.nw,
                      height: 24.nw,
                      child: Stack(
                        alignment: Alignment.center,
                        children: [
                          Image.asset(
                            IconsPath.levelIcon,
                            width: 24.nw,
                            height: 24.nw,
                            fit: BoxFit.contain,
                          ),
                          Transform.translate(
                            offset: Offset(-3.nw, -5.nh), // Fine-tune center position
                            child: Text(
                              icon,
                              style: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionNumber,
                            ),
                          ),
                        ],
                      ),
                    ),
                    const SizedBox(width: 8),

                    // Title
                    Expanded(
                      child: Text(
                        title,
                        style: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionTitle,
                      ),
                    ),

                    // Dropdown Arrow
                    Transform.rotate(
                      angle: expanded ? 3.14159 : 0,
                      child: Image.asset(
                        IconsPath.dropIcon,
                        width: 24.nw,
                        height: 24.nw,
                        color: const Color(0xFFFFEFC4),
                        fit: BoxFit.contain,
                      ),
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),

            // Content
            AnimatedContainer(
              duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
              height: expanded ? null : 0,
              child: expanded
                  ? Container(
                      width: double.infinity,
                      color: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
                      padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
                      child: _buildExpandableContent(content, title: title),
                    )
                  : const SizedBox.shrink(),
            ),
          ],
        );
      }),
    );
  }

  /// Get calculation explanation - must be implemented by each factor
  String getCalculationExplanation();

  /// Get description data - must be implemented by each factor  
  Map<String, String?> getDescription();

  /// Get expandable sections - must be implemented by each factor
  List<Map<String, String>> getExpandableSections();

  /// Build the main content - must be implemented by each body type
  Widget buildContent();

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      width: double.infinity,
      color: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
      child: buildContent(),
    );
  }
}
```

### core/components/number_circle_header_component.dart

```dart
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_screenutil/flutter_screenutil.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import 'base_header_component.dart';
import '../universal_numerology_result.dart';
import '../../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import '../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';
import '../../utils/numerology_responsive.dart';
import '../../../../config/assets_path.dart';

/// Header component for factors with number circles
/// Used by: Life Path, Expression, Soul Urge, Personality, Personal Year, etc.
class NumberCircleHeaderComponent extends BaseHeaderComponent {
  final int? number;
  final bool isPremium;
  final String? iconAssetPath; // Changed from IconData to asset path

  const NumberCircleHeaderComponent({
    super.key,
    super.inputData,
    super.result,
    required super.heroTag,
    super.isLoading = false,
    this.number,
    this.isPremium = false,
    this.iconAssetPath,
  });

  @override
  Widget buildHeaderContent() {
    return Center(
      child: Hero(
        tag: heroTag,
        flightShuttleBuilder: (
          BuildContext flightContext,
          Animation<double> animation,
          HeroFlightDirection flightDirection,
          BuildContext fromHeroContext,
          BuildContext toHeroContext,
        ) {
          final toHero = toHeroContext.widget as Hero;
          return Material(
            type: MaterialType.transparency,
            child: toHero.child,
          );
        },
        child: _buildCircleContent(),
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildCircleContent() {
    if (isLoading) {
      return Container(
        width: 100.nw,
        height: 100.nw,
        alignment: Alignment.center,
        child: const CircularProgressIndicator(
          color: Colors.white,
          strokeWidth: 3,
        ),
      );
    }

    return Stack(
      alignment: Alignment.center,
      children: [
        // Circle background image - Use glow version in detail view
        Image.asset(
          _getCircleAssetPath(),
          width: 100.nw,
          height: 100.nw,
          fit: BoxFit.contain,
          cacheWidth: 200, // 2x for high-DPI screens
          cacheHeight: 200,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high, // Smooth Hero animation
        ),
        
        // Number text - dynamically centered for visual alignment
        if (number != null)
          Transform.translate(
            offset: Offset(0, _getNumberOffset(number!)), // Dynamic offset for visual alignment
            child: Text(
              '$number',
              style: isPremium 
                ? NumerologyTheme.resultsPremiumNumber  // White text for premium (Life Path)
                : NumerologyTheme.resultsMainNumber,    // #FFEFC4 text for ordinary circles
            ),
          )
        else if (iconAssetPath != null)
          // Factor icon for non-number factors
          Image.asset(
            iconAssetPath!,
            width: 48.nw,
            height: 48.nw,
            fit: BoxFit.contain,
            color: Colors.white, // Tint icon white
          ),
      ],
    );
  }

  /// Determine which circle asset to use based on context
  /// Premium circles always use gold background
  /// Detail views use glow effect for emphasis
  /// List/grid views use ordinary circles
  String _getCircleAssetPath() {
    if (isPremium) {
      // Life Path (S·ªë ch·ªß ƒë·∫°o) always uses premium gold circle
      return NumerologyPath.numberCirclePremium;
    }
    
    // Check if we're in a detail view to use glow effect
    if (_isInDetailView()) {
      return NumerologyPath.numberCircleGlow;
    }
    
    // Default to ordinary circle for list/grid views
    return NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary;
  }
  
  /// Check if currently in a detail view
  /// Returns true when viewing individual factor details
  /// Returns false when in results list/grid view
  bool _isInDetailView() {
    try {
      // Primary detection: Check route arguments for factorId
      // All detail views have factorId in their arguments
      final arguments = Get.arguments;
      if (arguments != null && arguments is Map) {
        if (arguments.containsKey('factorId')) {
          return true;
        }
      }
      
      // Secondary detection: Check current route name
      final currentRoute = Get.currentRoute;
      if (currentRoute.contains('UniversalFactorPage') ||
          currentRoute.contains('universal_factor') ||
          currentRoute.contains('/numerology/factors/')) {
        return true;
      }
      
      // Tertiary detection: Check if not on results page
      final context = Get.context;
      if (context != null) {
        final modalRoute = ModalRoute.of(context);
        final routeName = modalRoute?.settings.name ?? '';
        
        // If we have a route name and it's not the results page
        if (routeName.isNotEmpty && !routeName.contains('results')) {
          return true;
        }
      }
      
      // Default to false (ordinary circle) if cannot determine
      return false;
    } catch (_) {
      // If any error occurs, default to showing glow in detail views
      // This ensures better UX even if detection fails
      return true;
    }
  }

  /// Get dynamic offset for number visual alignment in header circles (100.w)
  /// Fixes optical illusion where numbers 6, 8, 9, 0 appear off-center
  /// Fine-tuned offset for each number using Playfair font (100.w circle)
  /// Number 8 is used as baseline, scaled 1.5x for larger circle
  double _getNumberOffset(int number) {
    const scale = 1.5; // 100.nw / 66.nw
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return -9.nh * scale;   // ADJUSTED: Was too high, reduced from -12.nh
      case 2: return -8.nh * scale;   // Slightly high baseline  
      case 3: return -8.nh * scale;   // Similar to 2
      case 4: return -10.nh * scale;  // Tall ascender but shorter than 1
      case 5: return -8.nh * scale;   // Mid-height
      case 6: return -4.nh * scale;   // Heavy bottom, less negative
      case 7: return -10.nh * scale;  // Tall but angled
      case 8: return -3.nh * scale;   // BASELINE - perfect center
      case 9: return -9.nh * scale;   // ADJUSTED: Moved up more from -6.nh
      case 0: return -4.nh * scale;   // Heavy bottom, oval shape
      case 11: return -9.nh * scale;  // Double 1s, adjusted with number 1
      case 22: return -8.nh * scale;  // Double 2s
      case 33: return -8.nh * scale;  // Double 3s
      default: return -8.nh * scale;  // Fallback
    }
  }

  @override
  String getTitle() {
    // This will be overridden by factor-specific implementations
    return 'Numerology Factor';
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Horizontal scrollable navigation bar showing all factors with focus state
/// Displays all 16 factors with special styling for the currently viewed factor
/// Allows quick navigation between factor detail views
/// Uses exact same styling as results view grid items
/// Auto-scrolls to show the focused card in viewport
class FactorNavigationBar extends StatefulWidget {
  final int currentFactorId;
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  
  const FactorNavigationBar({
    super.key,
    required this.currentFactorId,
    this.inputData,
  });

  @override
  State<FactorNavigationBar> createState() => _FactorNavigationBarState();
}

class _FactorNavigationBarState extends State<FactorNavigationBar> {
  late ScrollController _scrollController;
  bool _isScrollScheduled = false;
  
  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    _scrollController = ScrollController();
    // Schedule auto-scroll after first frame
    WidgetsBinding.instance.addPostFrameCallback((_) {
      _scrollToFocusedCard();
    });
  }
  
  @override
  void didUpdateWidget(FactorNavigationBar oldWidget) {
    super.didUpdateWidget(oldWidget);
    // Re-scroll if currentFactorId changes
    if (oldWidget.currentFactorId != widget.currentFactorId) {
      WidgetsBinding.instance.addPostFrameCallback((_) {
        if (mounted) {
          _scrollToFocusedCard();
        }
      });
    }
  }
  
  @override
  void dispose() {
    _scrollController.dispose();
    super.dispose();
  }

  /// Auto-scroll to make focused card visible
  void _scrollToFocusedCard() {
    try {
      // Wait for the scroll controller to be ready
      if (!_scrollController.hasClients) {
        // Prevent infinite scheduling loop
        if (!_isScrollScheduled) {
          _isScrollScheduled = true;
          // Schedule for next frame if controller not ready
          WidgetsBinding.instance.addPostFrameCallback((_) {
            _isScrollScheduled = false;
            if (mounted) {
              _scrollToFocusedCard();
            }
          });
        }
        return;
      }
      
      final filteredFactors = _getFilteredFactors();
      
      // Find index of focused card
      final focusedIndex = filteredFactors.indexWhere(
        (factor) => factor['id'] == widget.currentFactorId
      );
      
      if (focusedIndex == -1) {
        return; // Focused card not found
      }
      
      // Calculate scroll position
      // Each card is 102.nw wide + 12.nw spacing
      final cardWidth = 102.nw;
      final spacing = 12.nw;
      final padding = 16.nw; // horizontal padding
      
      // Calculate position to center the focused card (or at least make it visible)
      final targetPosition = padding + (focusedIndex * (cardWidth + spacing));
      
      // Get viewport width
      final viewportWidth = MediaQuery.of(context).size.width;
      
      // Calculate optimal scroll position to center the card
      final scrollPosition = targetPosition - (viewportWidth / 2) + (cardWidth / 2);
      
      // Ensure scroll position is within bounds
      // Check if we have valid scroll extent
      if (!_scrollController.position.hasContentDimensions) {
        return;
      }
      
      final maxScroll = _scrollController.position.maxScrollExtent;
      final finalPosition = scrollPosition.clamp(0.0, maxScroll);
      
      // Animate to position
      _scrollController.animateTo(
        finalPosition,
        duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
        curve: Curves.easeInOut,
      );
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error scrolling to focused card: $e');
    }
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    try {
      final filteredFactors = _getFilteredFactors();
      
      // If no factors to show, return empty space
      if (filteredFactors.isEmpty) {
        return SizedBox(height: 40.nh); // Just bottom spacing
      }
      
      return Container(
        margin: EdgeInsets.only(top: 12.nh, bottom: 40.nh), // Reduced top spacing, added bottom space  
        height: 130.nw, // Use .nw for consistent height across devices
        child: ListView.separated(
          controller: _scrollController, // Add scroll controller
          scrollDirection: Axis.horizontal,
          padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
          itemCount: filteredFactors.length,
          physics: const BouncingScrollPhysics(), // Smooth iOS-style scrolling
          cacheExtent: 800.0, // Cache more items for smooth scrolling
          separatorBuilder: (context, index) => SizedBox(width: 12.nw),
          itemBuilder: (context, index) {
            // Additional safety check for index bounds
            if (index >= filteredFactors.length) {
              return const SizedBox.shrink();
            }
            
            final factorData = filteredFactors[index];
            // Wrap in RepaintBoundary to prevent unnecessary repaints
            // Especially important for focused card which has different styling
            return RepaintBoundary(
              child: _buildFactorCard(factorData, context),
            );
          },
        ),
      );
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error building FactorNavigationBar: $e');
      return SizedBox(height: 40.nh); // Return minimal space instead of crashing
    }
  }

  /// Get all factors with validation

      debugPrint('Error filtering factors: $e');
      return []; // Return empty list instead of crashing
    }
  }

  /// Calculate real preview number using actual numerology calculation
  int? _calculateSampleNumber(int factorId) {
    try {
      if (widget.inputData == null) {
        // Return default sample numbers
        const defaults = {
          1: 7, 4: 3, 5: 9, 6: 1, 
          7: 5, 9: 8, 10: 2, 14: 6
        };
        return defaults[factorId] ?? 1;
      }
      
      // Use real numerology calculations with safe fallbacks
      try {
        switch (factorId) {
          case 1: // Life Path
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePath(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 4: // Name Number (Expression)  
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateExpression(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 5: // Soul Urge
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateSoulUrge(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 6: // Personality
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonality(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 7: // Personal Year
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonalYear(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 9: // Birth Day Number (factor 9 represents birth day)
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthDayNumber(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 10: // Maturity (now showing as "Tr∆∞·ªüng th√†nh")
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateMaturityNumber(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 14: // Attitude (now showing as "Th√°i ƒë·ªô")
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateAttitudeNumber(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          case 11: // Hidden Passion (now showing as "Ti·ªÅm nƒÉng")
            final result = NumerologyCalculator.calculateHiddenPassion(widget.inputData!);
            return result.mainNumber ?? ((factorId % 9) + 1);
          default:
            // For factors without preview (icons), return fallback
            return ((factorId % 9) + 1);
        }
      } catch (calculationError) {
        // If calculation fails, return null to indicate error (will show icon instead)
        debugPrint('Calculation error for factor $factorId: $calculationError');
        return null; // Return null to indicate calculation failed
      }
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error calculating real number for factor $factorId: $e');
      // Return safe fallback
      return ((factorId % 9) + 1);
    }
  }

  /// Build individual factor card with focus state support
  Widget _buildFactorCard(Map<String, dynamic> factorData, BuildContext context) {
    try {
      final factorId = factorData['id'] as int? ?? 0;
      final name = factorData['name'] as String? ?? 'Unknown';
      final type = factorData['type'] as String? ?? 'icon';
      final hasPreview = factorData['hasPreview'] as bool? ?? false;
      final number = factorData['number'] as int?;
      final icon = factorData['icon'] as IconData?;

      // Validate required data
      if (factorId <= 0 || name.isEmpty) {
        return const SizedBox.shrink();
      }

      // Check if this is the focused card
      final isFocused = factorId == widget.currentFactorId;

      // Build card content
      final cardContent = Container(
        width: 102.nw, // Exact design width
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(12.nw),
        decoration: BoxDecoration(
          borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(NumerologyTheme.cardBorderRadius),
          color: isFocused ? const Color(0xFF08197B) : const Color(0xFF040F4E),
          border: !isFocused ? Border.all(
            color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED).withValues(alpha: 0.3),
            width: 0.6,
          ) : null, // No border for focused card (handled by gradient wrapper)
        ),
        child: Column(
          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceBetween, // Ensure proper spacing
          children: [
            // Circle area with proper sizing based on design
            SizedBox(
              height: 66.nw, // Use .nw for consistent circle size
              child: Center(
                child: Column(
                  mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
                  children: [
                    // Circle content with conditional Hero animation
                    // DISABLE Hero for focused card to avoid tag conflict
                    if (type == 'number' && hasPreview) ...[
                      // Show circle with or without number
                      isFocused 
                          ? _buildNumberCircleWithoutHero(factorId, number)
                          : _buildConditionalHeroNumber(factorId, number),
                    ] else if (type == 'icon' && icon != null) ...[
                      isFocused
                          ? _buildIconCircleWithoutHero(factorId, icon)
                          : _buildConditionalHeroIcon(factorId, icon),
                    ] else ...[
                      // Fallback - empty circle
                      Image.asset(
                        NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
                        width: 66.nw,
                        height: 66.nw,
                        fit: BoxFit.contain,
                        cacheWidth: 132,
                        cacheHeight: 132,
                        filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
                      ),
                    ],
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),

            // Flexible spacing  
            SizedBox(height: 6.nh), // Smaller fixed spacing
            
            // Text area - use Flexible to take remaining space
            Flexible(
              child: Container(
                padding: EdgeInsets.only(top: 2.nh), // Small top padding to prevent text touching circle
                child: Center(
                  child: Text(
                    name,
                    style: NumerologyTheme.resultsFactorName.copyWith(
                      fontSize: 13.nsp, // Slightly smaller font for better fit
                      height: 1.15, // Tighter line height for 2-line text
                    ),
                    textAlign: TextAlign.center,
                    maxLines: 2,
                    overflow: TextOverflow.visible, // Allow text to be visible
                    softWrap: true,
                  ),
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      );

      // Apply focused card styling if needed
      if (isFocused) {
        // Wrap with gradient border for focused state
        return Container(
          width: 102.nw,
          decoration: BoxDecoration(
            borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(NumerologyTheme.cardBorderRadius),
            gradient: const LinearGradient(
              colors: [
                Color(0xFFF5E29F),
                Color(0xFFDEC87D),
                Color(0xFFD3AA45),
                Color(0xFFF2DC98),
              ],
              begin: Alignment.topLeft,
              end: Alignment.bottomRight,
            ),
          ),
          child: Container(
            margin: const EdgeInsets.all(1.2), // Creates the gradient border effect
            child: cardContent,
          ),
        );
      }

      // Non-focused cards are tappable
      return InkWell(
        onTap: () => _navigateToFactor(factorId, context),
        borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(NumerologyTheme.cardBorderRadius),
        child: cardContent,
      );
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error building factor card: $e');
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }
  }

  /// Get custom icon asset path for factor (exact copy from results view)
  String? _getFactorIconAsset(int factorId) {
    switch (factorId) {
      case 2:
        return NumerologyPath.iconBirthChart;
      case 3:
        return NumerologyPath.iconArrows;
      case 8:
        return NumerologyPath.iconNineYearCycle;
      case 12:
        return NumerologyPath.iconMissingNumbers; // S·ªë thi·∫øu h·ª•t
      case 13:
        return NumerologyPath.iconKarmicDebt; // N·ª£ nghi·ªáp  
      case 15:
        return NumerologyPath.iconInnateAbilities; // NL b·∫©m sinh
      case 16:
        return NumerologyPath.iconLifePinnacles; // ƒê·ªânh cao Cƒê
      default:
        return null; // Use Flutter icon fallback
    }
  }

  /// Generate hero tag for animation consistency (copied from UniversalFactorRoute)
  String _generateHeroTag(int factorId, NumerologyInputModel? inputData, int? previewNumber) {
    try {
      final baseTag = 'factor_${factorId}';
      
      // For factors with preview numbers (Life Path, Expression, etc.)
      final hasPreview = [1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 14, 11].contains(factorId);
      if (hasPreview && (previewNumber != null || inputData != null)) {
        final number = previewNumber ?? _calculateMainNumber(factorId, inputData);
        return '${baseTag}_number_${number ?? 0}';
      }
      
      // For icon factors (no preview but same circle layout)
      const iconFactors = [2, 3, 8, 12, 13, 15, 16];
      if (iconFactors.contains(factorId)) {
        return '${baseTag}_icon';
      }
      
      return baseTag;
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error generating hero tag for factor $factorId: $e');
      return 'factor_${factorId}';
    }
  }

  /// Calculate main number for hero tag generation (copied from UniversalFactorRoute)
  int? _calculateMainNumber(int factorId, NumerologyInputModel? inputData) {
    if (inputData == null) return null;
    
    try {
      switch (factorId) {
        case 1: // Life Path
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePath(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 4: // Expression
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateExpression(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 5: // Soul Urge
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateSoulUrge(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 6: // Personality
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonality(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 7: // Personal Year
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonalYear(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 9: // Birth Day
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthDayNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 10: // Maturity (now showing as "Tr∆∞·ªüng th√†nh")
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateMaturityNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 14: // Attitude (now showing as "Th√°i ƒë·ªô") 
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateAttitudeNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 11: // Hidden Passion (now showing as "Ti·ªÅm nƒÉng")
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateHiddenPassion(inputData).mainNumber;
        default:
          return null;
      }
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Error calculating main number for factor $factorId: $e');
      return null;
    }
  }


  /// Get dynamic offset for number visual alignment
  /// Fixes optical illusion where numbers 6, 8, 9, 0 appear off-center
  /// Fine-tuned offset for each number using Playfair font (66.w circle)
  /// Number 8 is used as baseline (perfect center) - same as results view
  double _getNumberOffset(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return -9.nh;   // ADJUSTED: Was too high, reduced from -12.nh
      case 2: return -8.nh;   // Slightly high baseline  
      case 3: return -8.nh;   // Similar to 2
      case 4: return -10.nh;  // Tall ascender but shorter than 1
      case 5: return -8.nh;   // Mid-height
      case 6: return -4.nh;   // Heavy bottom, less negative
      case 7: return -10.nh;  // Tall but angled
      case 8: return -3.nh;   // BASELINE - perfect center
      case 9: return -9.nh;   // ADJUSTED: Moved up more from -6.nh
      case 0: return -4.nh;   // Heavy bottom, oval shape
      case 11: return -9.nh;  // Double 1s, adjusted with number 1
      case 22: return -8.nh;  // Double 2s
      case 33: return -8.nh;  // Double 3s
      default: return -8.nh;  // Fallback
    }
  }

  /// Build number circle WITHOUT Hero animation (for focused card)
  Widget _buildNumberCircleWithoutHero(int factorId, int? number) {
    return Stack(
      alignment: Alignment.center,
      children: [
        Image.asset(
          factorId == 1 // Only main factor (ID=1) uses premium
              ? NumerologyPath.numberCirclePremium
              : NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
          width: 66.nw,
          height: 66.nw,
          fit: BoxFit.contain,
          cacheWidth: 132,
          cacheHeight: 132,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
        ),
        if (number != null && number > 0)
          Transform.translate(
            offset: Offset(0, _getNumberOffset(number)),
            child: Text(
              number.toString(),
              style: factorId == 1
                  ? NumerologyTheme.resultsPremiumNumber.copyWith(fontSize: 42.nsp)
                  : NumerologyTheme.navigationFactorNumber,
            ),
          ),
      ],
    );
  }

  /// Build icon circle WITHOUT Hero animation (for focused card)
  Widget _buildIconCircleWithoutHero(int factorId, IconData icon) {
    return Stack(
      alignment: Alignment.center,
      children: [
        Image.asset(
          NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
          width: 66.nw,
          height: 66.nw,
          fit: BoxFit.contain,
          cacheWidth: 132,
          cacheHeight: 132,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
        ),
        Builder(
          builder: (context) {
            final customIconAsset = _getFactorIconAsset(factorId);
            if (customIconAsset != null) {
              return Image.asset(
                customIconAsset,
                width: 36.nw,
                height: 36.nw,
                fit: BoxFit.contain,

  /// Build conditional Hero widget for number factors
  Widget _buildConditionalHeroNumber(int factorId, int? number) {
    // Check if results controller is available for conditional Hero
    if (Get.isRegistered<NumerologyResultsController>()) {
      final resultsController = Get.find<NumerologyResultsController>();
      
      return Obx(() {
        final shouldUseHero = resultsController.shouldUseHeroForFactor(factorId);
        final circleWidget = Stack(
          alignment: Alignment.center,
          children: [
            Image.asset(
              factorId == 1 // Only main factor (ID=1) uses premium
                  ? NumerologyPath.numberCirclePremium
                  : NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
              width: 66.nw,
              height: 66.nw,
              fit: BoxFit.contain,
              cacheWidth: 132, // 2x for better quality on high-DPI screens
              cacheHeight: 132,
              filterQuality: FilterQuality.high, // High quality for crisp images
            ),
            if (number != null && number > 0)
              Transform.translate(
                offset: Offset(0, _getNumberOffset(number)), // Dynamic offset for visual alignment
                child: Text(
                  number.toString(),
                  style: factorId == 1 // Life Path uses white text for premium circle
                      ? NumerologyTheme.resultsPremiumNumber.copyWith(fontSize: 42.nsp) // Same size as navigation cards
                      : NumerologyTheme.navigationFactorNumber,
                ),
              ),
          ],
        );
        
        return shouldUseHero && number != null && number > 0
            ? Hero(
                tag: 'factor_${factorId}_number_$number',
                child: circleWidget,
              )
            : circleWidget;
      });
    }
    
    // Fallback for when results controller is not available - no Hero
    return Stack(
      alignment: Alignment.center,
      children: [
        Image.asset(
          factorId == 1 ? NumerologyPath.numberCirclePremium : NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
          width: 66.nw,
          height: 66.nw,
          fit: BoxFit.contain,
          cacheWidth: 132,
          cacheHeight: 132,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
        ),
        if (number != null && number > 0)
          Transform.translate(
            offset: Offset(0, _getNumberOffset(number)),
            child: Text(
              number.toString(),
              style: factorId == 1 // Life Path uses white text for premium circle
                  ? NumerologyTheme.resultsPremiumNumber.copyWith(fontSize: 42.nsp) // Same size as navigation cards
                  : NumerologyTheme.navigationFactorNumber,
            ),
          ),
      ],
    );
  }

  /// Build conditional Hero widget for icon factors
  Widget _buildConditionalHeroIcon(int factorId, IconData icon) {
    // Check if results controller is available for conditional Hero
    if (Get.isRegistered<NumerologyResultsController>()) {
      final resultsController = Get.find<NumerologyResultsController>();
      
      return Obx(() {
        final shouldUseHero = resultsController.shouldUseHeroForFactor(factorId);
        final iconWidget = Stack(
          alignment: Alignment.center,
          children: [

              NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
              width: 66.nw,

              fit: BoxFit.contain,
              cacheWidth: 132, // 2x for better quality
              cacheHeight: 132,
              filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
            ),
            // Use custom factor icon if available, otherwise Flutter icon
            Builder(
              builder: (context) {
                final customIconAsset = _getFactorIconAsset(factorId);

                if (customIconAsset != null) {
                  return Image.asset(
                    customIconAsset,
                    width: 36.nw,
                    height: 36.nw,
                    fit: BoxFit.contain,

                  );
                }
              },
            ),

        return shouldUseHero
            ? Hero(

      });
    }

    return Stack(

            if (customIconAsset != null) {
              return Image.asset(
                customIconAsset,
                width: 36.nw,

                cacheWidth: 72,

                filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
              );

  /// Navigate to factor detail - replace current factor detail to maintain results view back behavior
  Future<void> _navigateToFactor(int factorId, BuildContext context) async {
    // Validate inputs - should never navigate to same factor
    if (factorId < 1 || factorId > 16 || factorId == widget.currentFactorId) {
      debugPrint('Invalid navigation: factorId=$factorId, currentFactorId=${widget.currentFactorId}');
      return;
    }
    
    try {
      // Track navigation between factors
      final analyticsService = Get.find<AnalyticsService>();
      analyticsService.logCustomEvent(
        name: 'numerology_factor_navigation',
        parameters: {
          'from_factor_id': widget.currentFactorId,
          'to_factor_id': factorId,
          'navigation_source': 'factor_navigation_bar',
        },
      );
      
      // Set active factor for Hero animation optimization first
      if (Get.isRegistered<NumerologyResultsController>()) {
        final resultsController = Get.find<NumerologyResultsController>();
        resultsController.setActiveFactorForHero(factorId);
        
        // Reset after animation completes
        Future.delayed(const Duration(milliseconds: 500), () {
          if (resultsController.activeFactorForHero == factorId) {
            resultsController.clearActiveFactorForHero();
          }
        });
      }
      
      // Clean up any existing controller with this tag
      if (Get.isRegistered<GenericFactorController>(tag: 'factor_$factorId')) {
        Get.delete<GenericFactorController>(tag: 'factor_$factorId');
      }
      
      // Generate hero tag for animation (same logic as UniversalFactorRoute)
      final heroTag = _generateHeroTag(factorId, widget.inputData, null);
      
      // Create controller instance first (same logic as UniversalFactorRoute)
      final controller = NumerologyComponentFactory.createController(
        factorId, 
        inputData: widget.inputData,
        previewNumber: null,
        heroTag: heroTag,
      ) as GenericFactorController;
      
      // Put controller in GetX (same logic as UniversalFactorRoute)
      Get.put<GenericFactorController>(controller, tag: 'factor_$factorId');
      
      // Use Navigator.pushReplacement to replace current factor detail
      // This maintains the original behavior: back always goes to results view
      // Check if context is still mounted before navigation
      if (!context.mounted) {
        debugPrint('Context not mounted, skipping navigation');
        return;
      }
      
      await Navigator.of(context).pushReplacement(
        UniversalFactorRoute.createRoute(
          factorId: factorId,
          inputData: widget.inputData,
          previewNumber: null,
        ),
      );
      
    } catch (e) {
      debugPrint('Navigation error: $e');
      // Fallback - try to go back to results instead of crashing
      if (context.mounted) {
        try {
          Navigator.of(context).popUntil((route) => route.isFirst);
        } catch (fallbackError) {
          debugPrint('Fallback navigation error: $fallbackError');
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Arrow direction types for personality factor
enum ArrowDirection {
  horizontal, // #20F0FF
  vertical, // #85FF60
  diagonal // #F262FF
}

/// Data structure for arrows in the grid
class ArrowData {
  final Offset start;
  final Offset end;
  final ArrowDirection direction;
  final double strokeWidth;
  final List<int> numbers; // Numbers this arrow represents

  const ArrowData({
    required this.start,
    required this.end,
    required this.direction,
    this.strokeWidth = 2.0, // Updated to match design
    required this.numbers,
  });

  /// Get color based on direction
  Color get color {
    switch (direction) {
      case ArrowDirection.horizontal:
        return const Color(0xFF20F0FF); // Cyan
      case ArrowDirection.vertical:
        return const Color(0xFF85FF60); // Green
      case ArrowDirection.diagonal:
        return const Color(0xFFF262FF); // Magenta
    }
  }
}

/// Header component for factors with 3x3 grid charts
/// Used by: Birth Chart, Arrows Personality
class GridChartHeaderComponent extends BaseHeaderComponent {
  final List<List<dynamic>> gridData; // 3x3 matrix (can be int or String)
  final List<ArrowData>? arrows; // Optional arrows for personality factor
  final bool showMissingNumbers;

  const GridChartHeaderComponent({
    super.key,
    super.inputData,
    super.result,
    required super.heroTag,
    super.isLoading = false,
    required this.gridData,
    this.arrows,
    this.showMissingNumbers = false,
  });

  @override
  Widget buildHeaderContent() {
    if (isLoading) {
      return const Center(
        child: CircularProgressIndicator(
          color: Colors.white,
          strokeWidth: 3,
        ),
      );
    }

    return Container(
      margin: EdgeInsets.zero,
      child: Transform.translate(
        // Move up by 56nh to achieve 100nh total from top (156 - 56 = 100)
        offset: Offset(0, -20.nh),
        child: Center(
          child: Hero(
            tag: heroTag,
            child: SizedBox(
              width: 240.nw, // Increase size to match design better
              height: 160.nh, // Increase height to match design
              child: Stack(
                children: [
                  // Grid with numbers (background)
                  _build3x3Grid(),
                  // Arrows (foreground - renders on top)
                  CustomPaint(
                    painter: GridChartPainter(
                      gridData: gridData,
                      arrows: arrows,
                      showMissingNumbers: showMissingNumbers,
                    ),
                    size: Size(240.nw, 160.nh),
                  ),
                ],

            ),
          ),

  Widget _build3x3Grid() {
    // Define shadow specifications - bright intense glow like old code
    final shadows = [
      // Very bright inner glow
      BoxShadow(
        color: Colors.white, // Full white - maximum brightness
        blurRadius: 6,
        spreadRadius: 1,
      ),
      // Bright middle layer  
      BoxShadow(
        color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.95), // Almost full brightness
        blurRadius: 10,
        spreadRadius: 2,
      ),
      // Still bright outer layer
      BoxShadow(
        color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.8), // High brightness
        blurRadius: 14,
        spreadRadius: 3,
      ),
    ];
    
    return Stack(
      children: [
        // Shadow-only layer (outside boundaries)
        CustomPaint(
          painter: ShadowOnlyPainter(
            width: 240.nw,
            height: 160.nh,
            borderRadius: 12.nr,
            shadows: shadows,
          ),
          size: Size(240.nw, 160.nh),
        ),
        // Pure background container (inside boundaries)
        Container(
          width: 240.nw,
          height: 160.nh,
          decoration: BoxDecoration(
            // Pure background - no shadow interference
            color: const Color(0x4D0D0947), // #0D09474D with 30% opacity
            borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12.nr),
          ),
          child: Column(
            children: [
              for (int row = 0; row < 3; row++)
                Expanded(
                  child: Row(
                    children: [
                      for (int col = 0; col < 3; col++)
                        Expanded(
                          child: Container(
                            decoration: BoxDecoration(
                              border: Border(
                                right: col < 2
                                    ? const BorderSide(
                                        color: Color(0xFFFFFAED),
                                        width: 1,
                                      )
                                    : BorderSide.none,
                                bottom: row < 2
                                    ? const BorderSide(
                                        color: Color(0xFFFFFAED),
                                        width: 1,
                                      )
                                    : BorderSide.none,
                              ),
                            ),
                            child: Center(
                              child: SizedBox(
                                width: double.infinity,
                                height: double.infinity,
                                child: Align(
                                  alignment: Alignment.center,
                                  child: _buildGridCell(row, col),
                                ),
                              ),
                            ),
                          ),
                        ),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
            ],
          ),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  Widget _buildGridCell(int row, int col) {
    final value = gridData[row][col];

    if (value == null) {
      // Empty cell or missing number
      return const SizedBox.shrink();
    }

    // Apply optical adjustment for vertical centering based on number
    final offset = _getGridNumberOffset(value);
    
    return Transform.translate(
      offset: Offset(0, offset),
      child: Text(
        value.toString(),
        textAlign: TextAlign.center,
        style: NumerologyTheme.gridChartCellNumber,
      ),
    );
  }
  
  /// Get optical adjustment offset for grid numbers
  /// Similar to number circle adjustments but scaled for grid cells
  double _getGridNumberOffset(dynamic value) {
    // Parse to int if needed
    final number = value is int ? value : int.tryParse(value.toString()) ?? 0;
    
    // Optical adjustments for Playfair font in grid cells
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return -3.nh;   // Thin, needs more lift
      case 2: return -3.nh;   // Slightly high
      case 3: return -5.nh;   // Similar to 2
      case 4: return -3.nh;   // Tall with crossbar
      case 5: return -5.nh;   // Balanced
      case 6: return -1.nh;   // Heavy bottom
      case 7: return -3.nh;   // Tall and angled
      case 8: return -2.nh;       // Perfect baseline
      case 9: return -5.nh;   // Heavy top
      case 0: return -3.nh;   // Oval, heavy bottom
      default: return -2.nh;  // Default adjustment
    }
  }

  @override
  String getTitle() {
    return 'Grid Chart Factor';
  }
}

/// Custom painter for shadow-only rendering (outside boundaries)
class ShadowOnlyPainter extends CustomPainter {
  final double width;
  final double height; 
  final double borderRadius;
  final List<BoxShadow> shadows;
  
  const ShadowOnlyPainter({
    required this.width,
    required this.height,
    required this.borderRadius,
    required this.shadows,
  });
  
  @override
  void paint(Canvas canvas, Size size) {
    for (final shadow in shadows) {
      // Create inner path (container area - no shadow)
      final innerPath = Path()
        ..addRRect(RRect.fromLTRBR(
          0, 0, width, height,
          Radius.circular(borderRadius),
        ));
      
      // Create outer path (shadow area)  
      final shadowSpread = shadow.spreadRadius;
      final outerPath = Path()
        ..addRRect(RRect.fromLTRBR(
          -shadowSpread, -shadowSpread, 
          width + shadowSpread, height + shadowSpread,
          Radius.circular(borderRadius + shadowSpread),
        ));
      
      // Create shadow-only path (outside boundaries only)
      final shadowOnlyPath = Path.combine(
        PathOperation.difference, 
        outerPath, 
        innerPath,
      );
      
      // Create shadow paint with stronger blur effect
      final shadowPaint = Paint()
        ..color = shadow.color
        ..maskFilter = MaskFilter.blur(
          BlurStyle.normal, 
          shadow.blurRadius, // Full blur radius for stronger effect
        );
      
      // Save canvas state for offset
      canvas.save();
      canvas.translate(shadow.offset.dx, shadow.offset.dy);
      
      // Draw shadow ONLY in outside area
      canvas.drawPath(shadowOnlyPath, shadowPaint);
      
      // Restore canvas state
      canvas.restore();
    }
  }
  
  @override
  bool shouldRepaint(covariant CustomPainter oldDelegate) => false;
}

/// Custom painter for grid chart with arrows
class GridChartPainter extends CustomPainter {
  final List<List<dynamic>> gridData;
  final List<ArrowData>? arrows;
  final bool showMissingNumbers;

  GridChartPainter({
    required this.gridData,
    this.arrows,
    this.showMissingNumbers = false,
  });

  @override
  void paint(Canvas canvas, Size size) {
    if (arrows == null) return;

    // Draw arrows with shadow
    for (final arrow in arrows!) {
      // Calculate actual positions - extend beyond grid boundaries
      final gridStartPos = Offset(
        arrow.start.dx * size.width,
        arrow.start.dy * size.height,
      );
      final gridEndPos = Offset(
        arrow.end.dx * size.width,
        arrow.end.dy * size.height,
      );

      // Extend arrow beyond grid boundaries
      final direction = (gridEndPos - gridStartPos);
      final length = direction.distance;
      final normalizedDirection = direction / length;

      // Extend by 20px on each side for more triangle head clip
      final extendDistance = 20.0;
      final startPos = gridStartPos - (normalizedDirection * extendDistance);
      final endPos = gridEndPos + (normalizedDirection * extendDistance);

      // Draw shadow first
      _drawArrowWithShadow(canvas, startPos, endPos, arrow);

      // Draw main arrow
      _drawArrow(canvas, startPos, endPos, arrow);
    }
  }

  /// Draw arrow with shadow effect
  void _drawArrowWithShadow(
      Canvas canvas, Offset start, Offset end, ArrowData arrow) {
    const arrowHeadLength = 15.0;

    // Calculate direction and shorten shadow line
    final direction = (end - start);
    final length = direction.distance;
    final normalizedDirection = direction / length;

    final shadowPaint = Paint()
      ..color = const Color(0x4D000000) // #000000 30%
      ..style = PaintingStyle.stroke
      ..strokeWidth = arrow.strokeWidth
      ..strokeCap = StrokeCap.butt // Match main arrow
      ..maskFilter = const MaskFilter.blur(BlurStyle.normal, 2); // Blur 4/2 = 2

    // Draw shadow line offset by (0, 4) and shortened
    final shadowStart = Offset(start.dx, start.dy + 4);
    final shadowEnd = Offset(end.dx, end.dy + 4);
    final shortenedShadowEnd =
        shadowEnd - (normalizedDirection * (arrowHeadLength * 0.7));

    canvas.drawLine(shadowStart, shortenedShadowEnd, shadowPaint);
    _drawTriangleArrowHead(canvas, shadowPaint, shadowStart, shadowEnd);
  }

  /// Draw main arrow
  void _drawArrow(Canvas canvas, Offset start, Offset end, ArrowData arrow) {
    const arrowHeadLength = 15.0;

    // Calculate direction and shorten line to avoid overlap with triangle
    final direction = (end - start);
    final length = direction.distance;
    final normalizedDirection = direction / length;
    final shortenedEnd = end - (normalizedDirection * (arrowHeadLength * 0.7));

    final paint = Paint()
      ..color = arrow.color
      ..style = PaintingStyle.stroke
      ..strokeWidth = arrow.strokeWidth
      ..strokeCap = StrokeCap.butt; // Changed to butt for clean connection

    // Draw arrow line (shortened to avoid triangle overlap)
    canvas.drawLine(start, shortenedEnd, paint);

    // Draw triangle arrow head
    _drawTriangleArrowHead(canvas, paint, start, end);
  }

  /// Draw triangular arrow head
  void _drawTriangleArrowHead(
      Canvas canvas, Paint paint, Offset start, Offset end) {
    const arrowHeadLength = 15.0; // Increased size for more prominent head
    const arrowHeadAngle = 0.5; // Slightly sharper angle

    final direction = (end - start).direction;
    final arrowHead1 = Offset(
      end.dx - arrowHeadLength * math.cos(direction - arrowHeadAngle),
      end.dy - arrowHeadLength * math.sin(direction - arrowHeadAngle),
    );
    final arrowHead2 = Offset(
      end.dx - arrowHeadLength * math.cos(direction + arrowHeadAngle),
      end.dy - arrowHeadLength * math.sin(direction + arrowHeadAngle),
    );

    // Draw filled triangle
    final trianglePaint = Paint()
      ..color = paint.color
      ..style = PaintingStyle.fill;

    final path = Path()
      ..moveTo(end.dx, end.dy)
      ..lineTo(arrowHead1.dx, arrowHead1.dy)
      ..lineTo(arrowHead2.dx, arrowHead2.dy)
      ..close();

    canvas.drawPath(path, trianglePaint);
  }

  @override
  bool shouldRepaint(covariant CustomPainter oldDelegate) {
    return true;
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Custom painter for pyramid with new design
class PyramidPainter extends CustomPainter {

  final int? currentAge;
  final DateTime? birthDate;

  PyramidPainter({
    required this.pinnacles,
    this.currentAge,
    this.birthDate,
```
