  // M√†u s·∫Øc theo s·ªë pinnacle (kh√¥ng theo layer)
  Color _getColorForNumber(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1:
        return const Color(0xFFEE595C); // Red - cho s·ªë 1
      case 7:
        return const Color(0xFF3D84E0); // Blue - cho s·ªë 7  
      case 9:
        return const Color(0xFFF458C5); // Pink - cho s·ªë 9
      default:
        return const Color(0xFF38BA82); // Green - cho c√°c s·ªë kh√°c (3,4,6...)
    }
  }

  final Color lineColor = const Color(0xFFFFFAED);
  final Color borderColor = Colors.white;

  @override
  void paint(Canvas canvas, Size size) {
    final paint = Paint()
      ..style = PaintingStyle.fill
      ..strokeWidth = 1.5;

    final borderPaint = Paint()
      ..style = PaintingStyle.stroke
      ..strokeWidth = 1.5
      ..color = borderColor;

    final linePaint = Paint()
      ..style = PaintingStyle.stroke
      ..strokeWidth = 1.5
      ..color = lineColor;

    final textPainter = TextPainter(
      textAlign: TextAlign.center,
      textDirection: TextDirection.ltr,
    );

    // T·ªëi ƒëa h√≥a k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc pyramid v·ªõi padding horizontal 10.w
    final radius = 14.nr; // ƒê∆∞·ªùng k√≠nh = 28.nr nh∆∞ y√™u c·∫ßu
    final centerX = size.width / 2;
    final paddingHorizontal = 10.nw;
    final availableWidth = size.width - (paddingHorizontal * 2);
    
    // T√≠nh to√°n ƒë·ªÉ pyramid fill t·ª´ top xu·ªëng bottom KH√îNG c√≥ space d∆∞·ªõi
    final startY = 20.nh; // TƒÉng m·ªôt ch√∫t ƒë·ªÉ kh√¥ng qu√° s√°t app bar  
    final bottomY = size.height +20.nh; // Ch·ªâ reserve 20.nh cho birth info text
    final availableHeight = bottomY - startY;
    final layerSpacing = availableHeight / 3; // Chia cho 3 kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa 4 layers
    
    // V·ªã tr√≠ c√°c circle theo ƒê√öNG design image: 1-1-2-3 circles t·ª´ top xu·ªëng
    // Custom spacing theo y√™u c·∫ßu
    final layer3Spacing = 50.nw; // Kho·∫£ng c√°ch t·ª´ center = 60.nw/2 = 30.nw
    final layer4Spacing = availableWidth * 0.35; // Kho·∫£ng c√°ch r·ªông nh·∫•t cho layer 4
    
    final positions = [
      // Layer 1 (ƒë·ªânh) - 1 circle - Pinnacle 4 (index 3)
      [Offset(centerX, startY)],
      
      // Layer 2 - 1 circle - Pinnacle 3 (index 2)
      [Offset(centerX, startY + layerSpacing)],
      
      // Layer 3 - 2 circles - ƒê·ªânh 1 (tr√°i) + ƒê·ªânh 2 (ph·∫£i)
      [
        Offset(centerX - layer3Spacing, startY + layerSpacing * 2),
        Offset(centerX + layer3Spacing, startY + layerSpacing * 2),
      ],
      
      // Layer 4 (ƒë√°y) - 3 circles - Pinnacle 1 (index 0) - c√°c sub-pinnacles
      [
        Offset(centerX - layer4Spacing - 20.nw, startY + layerSpacing * 3), // Circle th√°ng - d·ªãch tr√°i th√™m 20nw
        Offset(centerX, startY + layerSpacing * 3),                         // Circle ng√†y - gi·ªØ nguy√™n
        Offset(centerX + layer4Spacing + 20.nw, startY + layerSpacing * 3), // Circle nƒÉm - d·ªãch ph·∫£i th√™m 20nw
      ],
    ];

    // V·∫Ω c√°c ƒë∆∞·ªùng n·ªëi tr∆∞·ªõc
    _drawConnectingLines(canvas, linePaint, positions);

    // V·∫Ω c√°c circle v√† text
    _drawPyramidLayers(canvas, paint, borderPaint, textPainter, positions, radius);
    
    // V·∫Ω text ng√†y th√°ng nƒÉm d∆∞·ªõi Layer 4 circles
    _drawBirthInfoUnderCircles(canvas, textPainter, positions, radius);
    
    // V·∫Ω kho·∫£ng nƒÉm b√™n c·∫°nh circles
    _drawYearRanges(canvas, textPainter, positions, radius);
    
    // V·∫Ω year range cho ƒë·ªânh 4 b√™n ph·∫£i circle
    _drawPinnacle4YearRange(canvas, textPainter, positions, radius);
  }

  void _drawConnectingLines(Canvas canvas, Paint linePaint, List<List<Offset>> positions) {
    // C·∫•u tr√∫c theo chu·∫©n: ƒê·ªânh 4 ch·ªâ n·ªëi v·ªõi circle tr√°i v√† ph·∫£i c·ªßa layer 4
    
    // ƒê·ªânh 4 (Layer 1) n·ªëi tr·ª±c ti·∫øp v·ªõi circle tr√°i (th√°ng) v√† ph·∫£i (nƒÉm) c·ªßa Layer 4
    final layer1Center = positions[0][0];
    canvas.drawLine(layer1Center, positions[3][0], linePaint); // N·ªëi v·ªõi circle tr√°i (th√°ng)
    canvas.drawLine(layer1Center, positions[3][2], linePaint); // N·ªëi v·ªõi circle ph·∫£i (nƒÉm)

    // N·ªëi t·ª´ layer 2 (ƒë·ªânh 3) xu·ªëng layer 3 (2 circles)
    final layer2Center = positions[1][0];
    for (final pos in positions[2]) {
      canvas.drawLine(layer2Center, pos, linePaint);
    }

    // N·ªëi t·ª´ layer 3 (2 circles) xu·ªëng layer 4 (3 circles)
    for (int i = 0; i < positions[2].length; i++) {
      final startPos = positions[2][i];
      if (i == 0) {
        // Circle tr√°i c·ªßa layer 3 n·ªëi v·ªõi 2 circles tr√°i c·ªßa layer 4
        canvas.drawLine(startPos, positions[3][0], linePaint);
        canvas.drawLine(startPos, positions[3][1], linePaint);
      } else {
        // Circle ph·∫£i c·ªßa layer 3 n·ªëi v·ªõi 2 circles ph·∫£i c·ªßa layer 4  
        canvas.drawLine(startPos, positions[3][1], linePaint);
        canvas.drawLine(startPos, positions[3][2], linePaint);
      }
    }
  }

  void _drawPyramidLayers(Canvas canvas, Paint paint, Paint borderPaint, 
      TextPainter textPainter, List<List<Offset>> positions, double radius) {
    
    // Mapping theo design image: 1-1-2-3 circles t·ª´ top xu·ªëng
    
    for (int layerIdx = 0; layerIdx < positions.length; layerIdx++) {
      for (int circleIdx = 0; circleIdx < positions[layerIdx].length; circleIdx++) {
        final pos = positions[layerIdx][circleIdx];
        
        // X√°c ƒë·ªãnh pinnacle, m√†u v√† Roman numeral cho t·ª´ng circle
        PinnacleLevel pinnacle;
        Color color;
        String romanNumeral = '';
        
        if (layerIdx == 0) {
          // Layer 1: Pinnacle 4 (ƒë·ªè)
          pinnacle = pinnacles[3];
          color = const Color(0xFFEE595C);
          romanNumeral = 'IV';
        } else if (layerIdx == 1) {
          // Layer 2: Pinnacle 3 (xanh d∆∞∆°ng)
          pinnacle = pinnacles[2];
          color = const Color(0xFF3D84E0);
          romanNumeral = 'III';
        } else if (layerIdx == 2) {
          // Layer 3: 2 circles - Pinnacle 1 (tr√°i) + Pinnacle 2 (ph·∫£i) (h·ªìng)
          pinnacle = circleIdx == 0 ? pinnacles[0] : pinnacles[1]; // ƒê·ªânh 1 tr√°i, ƒê·ªânh 2 ph·∫£i
          color = const Color(0xFFF458C5);
          romanNumeral = circleIdx == 0 ? 'I' : 'II'; // I cho ƒë·ªânh 1, II cho ƒë·ªânh 2
        } else {
          // Layer 4: 3 circles - hi·ªÉn th·ªã ng√†y/th√°ng/nƒÉm birth date (xanh l√°)
          final birthComponents = _getBirthDateComponents();
          final numbers = [birthComponents[0], birthComponents[1], birthComponents[2]]; // th√°ng, ng√†y, nƒÉm
          pinnacle = PinnacleLevel(
            number: numbers[circleIdx], 
            ageRange: '', 
            level: 4, 
            isActive: false
          );
          color = const Color(0xFF38BA82);
          romanNumeral = ''; // Kh√¥ng hi·ªÉn th·ªã Roman numeral cho layer ƒë√°y
        }
        
        _drawCircleWithText(
          canvas, paint, borderPaint, textPainter, 
          pos, radius, color, pinnacle, 
          layerIdx + 1, // Layer number for Roman numeral
          isTop: layerIdx == 0,
          romanNumeral: romanNumeral,
          isFirstCircleInLayer: circleIdx == 0 || (layerIdx == 2 && circleIdx == 1) // Layer 3 c·∫£ 2 circles ƒë·ªÅu c√≥ Roman numeral
        );
      }
    }
  }

  void _drawCircleWithText(Canvas canvas, Paint paint, Paint borderPaint, 
      TextPainter textPainter, Offset position, double radius, Color color, 
      PinnacleLevel pinnacle, int layer, {bool isTop = false, String romanNumeral = '', bool isFirstCircleInLayer = false}) {
    
    // V·∫Ω circle v·ªõi m√†u n·ªÅn
    paint.color = color;
    canvas.drawCircle(position, radius, paint);
    
    // V·∫Ω border tr·∫Øng
    canvas.drawCircle(position, radius, borderPaint);

    // V·∫Ω s·ªë La M√£ ·ªü top c·ªßa circle cho m·ªói layer (ch·ªâ circle ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n trong layer)
    if (isFirstCircleInLayer && romanNumeral.isNotEmpty) {
      textPainter.text = TextSpan(
        text: romanNumeral,
        style: NumerologyTheme.pyramidRomanNumeral,
      );
      textPainter.layout();
      final textOffset = Offset(
        position.dx - textPainter.width / 2, // Center horizontally
        position.dy - radius - textPainter.height - 2.nh, // G·∫ßn s√°t vi·ªÅn circle h∆°n (gi·∫£m t·ª´ 8.nh xu·ªëng 2.nh)
      );
      textPainter.paint(canvas, textOffset);
    }

    // V·∫Ω s·ªë trong circle v·ªõi font Playfair, size 22sp
    textPainter.text = TextSpan(
      text: '${pinnacle.number}',
      style: NumerologyTheme.pyramidCircleNumber,
    );
    textPainter.layout();
    
    // Use visual centering - numbers often appear lower due to baseline
    // Move up by a fixed amount for better visual alignment
    final visualCenterOffset = -3.0; // Move up 3 pixels for visual centering
    
    final numberOffset = Offset(
      position.dx - textPainter.width / 2,
      position.dy - textPainter.height / 2 + visualCenterOffset,
    );
    textPainter.paint(canvas, numberOffset);
  }

  void _drawBirthInfoUnderCircles(Canvas canvas, TextPainter textPainter, List<List<Offset>> positions, double radius) {
    if (birthDate == null || positions.length < 4) return;
    
    final layer4Positions = positions[3]; // Layer 4 c√≥ 3 circles
    if (layer4Positions.length < 3) return;
    
    final birthInfoTexts = [
      'Th√°ng ${birthDate!.month.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}', // Circle tr√°i
      'Ng√†y ${birthDate!.day.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}',   // Circle gi·ªØa
      birthDate!.year.toString(),                            // Circle ph·∫£i
    ];
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final circlePos = layer4Positions[i];
      final text = birthInfoTexts[i];
      
      textPainter.text = TextSpan(
        text: text,
        style: NumerologyTheme.pyramidBirthInfo,
      );
      textPainter.layout();
      
      // V·ªã tr√≠ text ngay d∆∞·ªõi circle
      final textOffset = Offset(
        circlePos.dx - textPainter.width / 2, // Center v·ªõi circle
        circlePos.dy + radius + 5.nh,          // Ngay d∆∞·ªõi circle v·ªõi kho·∫£ng c√°ch 5.nh
      );
      textPainter.paint(canvas, textOffset);
    }
  }

  void _drawYearRanges(Canvas canvas, TextPainter textPainter, List<List<Offset>> positions, double radius) {
    if (birthDate == null) return;
    
    for (int layerIdx = 0; layerIdx < positions.length; layerIdx++) {
      for (int circleIdx = 0; circleIdx < positions[layerIdx].length; circleIdx++) {
        final pos = positions[layerIdx][circleIdx];
        
        // X√°c ƒë·ªãnh pinnacle cho t·ª´ng circle
        PinnacleLevel pinnacle;
        bool shouldDrawYear = false;
        
        if (layerIdx == 0) {
          // Layer 1: Pinnacle 4 - year range s·∫Ω v·∫Ω ri√™ng b√™n ph·∫£i
          pinnacle = pinnacles[3];
          shouldDrawYear = false; // Kh√¥ng v·∫Ω ·ªü ƒë√¢y, s·∫Ω v·∫Ω ri√™ng
        } else if (layerIdx == 1) {
          // Layer 2: Pinnacle 3
          pinnacle = pinnacles[2];
          shouldDrawYear = true;
        } else if (layerIdx == 2) {
          // Layer 3: Pinnacle 1 (tr√°i) + Pinnacle 2 (ph·∫£i) - v·∫Ω c·∫£ 2
          pinnacle = circleIdx == 0 ? pinnacles[0] : pinnacles[1];
          shouldDrawYear = true;
        } else {
          // Layer 4: kh√¥ng v·∫Ω year range (l√† sub-components c·ªßa ƒë·ªânh 1)
          pinnacle = pinnacles[0];
          shouldDrawYear = false; // Kh√¥ng hi·ªÉn th·ªã year range cho layer ƒë√°y
        }
        
        if (!shouldDrawYear) continue;
        
        // Get age range directly from pinnacle properties instead of parsing string
        final startYear = birthDate!.year + _getStartAge(layerIdx, circleIdx);
        final endAge = _getEndAge(layerIdx, circleIdx);
        final endYear = endAge >= 100 ? 
          'tr·ªü ƒëi' : 
          (birthDate!.year + endAge).toString();
        
        final yearText = endAge >= 100 ? 
          '$startYear $endYear' : 
          '$startYear-$endYear';
        
        textPainter.text = TextSpan(
          text: yearText,
          style: NumerologyTheme.pyramidYearRange,
        );
        textPainter.layout();
        
        // V·ªã tr√≠ text t√πy ch·ªânh cho t·ª´ng pinnacle
        Offset textOffset;
        
        if (layerIdx == 2) {
          // Layer 3: ƒê·ªânh 1 (tr√°i) v√† ƒê·ªânh 2 (ph·∫£i) c·∫ßn custom position
          if (circleIdx == 0) {
            // ƒê·ªânh 1: d·ªãch l√™n tr√™n v√† b√™n tr√°i 5px
            textOffset = Offset(
              pos.dx - textPainter.width / 2 - 10.nw, // D·ªãch tr√°i 5px
              pos.dy + radius + 15.nh,               // V·ªã tr√≠ g·ªëc
            );
          } else {
            // ƒê·ªânh 2: d·ªãch l√™n tr√™n v√† b√™n ph·∫£i 5px
            textOffset = Offset(
              pos.dx - textPainter.width / 2 + 10.nw, // D·ªãch ph·∫£i 5px
              pos.dy + radius + 15.nh,               // V·ªã tr√≠ g·ªëc
            );
          }
        } else {
          // C√°c layer kh√°c: v·ªã tr√≠ m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh
          textOffset = Offset(
            pos.dx - textPainter.width / 2,
            pos.dy + radius + 30.nh,
          );
        }
        textPainter.paint(canvas, textOffset);
      }
    }
  }

  void _drawPinnacle4YearRange(Canvas canvas, TextPainter textPainter, List<List<Offset>> positions, double radius) {
    if (birthDate == null || positions.isEmpty) return;
    
    final layer1Position = positions[0][0]; // ƒê·ªânh 4 circle position
    final pinnacle4 = pinnacles[3];
    
    // Get age range directly from pinnacle properties (Pinnacle 4 = layer 0, circle 0)
    final startAge = _getStartAge(0, 0);
    final endAge = _getEndAge(0, 0);
    final startYear = birthDate!.year + startAge;
    final endYear = endAge >= 100 ? 
      'tr·ªü ƒëi' : 
      (birthDate!.year + endAge).toString();
    
    final yearText = endAge >= 100 ? 
      '$startYear $endYear' : 
      '$startYear-$endYear';
    
    textPainter.text = TextSpan(
      text: yearText,
      style: NumerologyTheme.pyramidYearRange,
    );
    textPainter.layout();
    
    // V·ªã tr√≠ text b√™n ph·∫£i circle, th·∫≥ng h√†ng v·ªõi circle
    final textOffset = Offset(
      layer1Position.dx + radius + 15.nw, // B√™n ph·∫£i circle v·ªõi kho·∫£ng c√°ch 15.nw
      layer1Position.dy - textPainter.height / 2, // Th·∫≥ng h√†ng v·ªõi center circle
    );
    textPainter.paint(canvas, textOffset);
  }

  // Helper methods to get age ranges directly from pinnacle data
  int _getStartAge(int layerIdx, int circleIdx) {
    if (layerIdx == 0) {
      // Layer 1: Pinnacle 4 (index 3)
      return pinnacles.length > 3 ? pinnacles[3].startAge ?? 44 : 44;
    } else if (layerIdx == 1) {
      // Layer 2: Pinnacle 3 (index 2)
      return pinnacles.length > 2 ? pinnacles[2].startAge ?? 36 : 36;
    } else if (layerIdx == 2) {
      // Layer 3: Pinnacle 1 (tr√°i, index 0) + Pinnacle 2 (ph·∫£i, index 1)
      if (circleIdx == 0) {
        return pinnacles.isNotEmpty ? pinnacles[0].startAge ?? 0 : 0;
      } else {
        return pinnacles.length > 1 ? pinnacles[1].startAge ?? 0 : 0;
      }
    }
    return 0;
  }

  int _getEndAge(int layerIdx, int circleIdx) {
    if (layerIdx == 0) {
      // Layer 1: Pinnacle 4 (index 3)
      return pinnacles.length > 3 ? pinnacles[3].endAge ?? 120 : 120;
    } else if (layerIdx == 1) {
      // Layer 2: Pinnacle 3 (index 2)
      return pinnacles.length > 2 ? pinnacles[2].endAge ?? 43 : 43;
    } else if (layerIdx == 2) {
      // Layer 3: Pinnacle 1 (tr√°i, index 0) + Pinnacle 2 (ph·∫£i, index 1)
      if (circleIdx == 0) {
        return pinnacles.isNotEmpty ? pinnacles[0].endAge ?? 0 : 0;
      } else {
        return pinnacles.length > 1 ? pinnacles[1].endAge ?? 35 : 35;
      }
    }
    return 0;
  }

  List<int> _getBirthDateComponents() {
    if (birthDate == null) return [1, 1, 1];
    
    // T√≠nh t·ªïng c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë theo numerology
    final month = _reduceToSingleDigit(birthDate!.month);
    final day = _reduceToSingleDigit(birthDate!.day); 
    final year = _reduceToSingleDigit(birthDate!.year);
    
    return [month, day, year]; // Circle tr√°i=th√°ng, gi·ªØa=ng√†y, ph·∫£i=nƒÉm
  }
  
  int _reduceToSingleDigit(int number) {
    while (number > 9) {
      int sum = 0;
      while (number > 0) {
        sum += number % 10;
        number ~/= 10;
      }
      number = sum;
    }
    return number;
  }

  @override
  bool shouldRepaint(covariant CustomPainter oldDelegate) => true;
}

/// Tabbed body component for factors with multiple content categories
/// Used by: Arrows Personality (factor 3), Karmic Debt (factor 13)
class TabbedBodyComponent extends StatefulWidget {
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final NumerologyResult? result;
  final bool isLoading;
  final String calculationText;
  final Map<String, String?> descriptionData;
  final List<TabData> tabsData;
  final bool showCalculation;
  final int? factorId;

  const TabbedBodyComponent({
    super.key,
    this.inputData,
    this.result,
    this.isLoading = false,
    required this.calculationText,
    required this.descriptionData,
    required this.tabsData,
    this.showCalculation = true,
    this.factorId,
  });

  @override
  State<TabbedBodyComponent> createState() => _TabbedBodyComponentState();

  /// Create slivers for STICKY TABS behavior in parent CustomScrollView
  static List<Widget> createSlivers({
    required NumerologyInputModel? inputData,
    required NumerologyResult? result,
    required bool isLoading,
    required String calculationText,
    required Map<String, String?> descriptionData,
    required List<TabData> tabsData,
    bool showCalculation = true,
    int? factorId,
  }) {
    return TabbedSliversController(
      inputData: inputData,
      result: result,
      isLoading: isLoading,
      calculationText: calculationText,
      descriptionData: descriptionData,
      tabsData: tabsData,
      showCalculation: showCalculation,
      factorId: factorId,
    ).buildSlivers();
  }
}

class _TabbedBodyComponentState extends State<TabbedBodyComponent>
    with TickerProviderStateMixin {
  late TabController tabController;
  final RxInt selectedTabIndex = 0.obs;

  final Map<int, List<RxBool>> tabExpandedStates = {};

    super.initState();
    tabController = TabController(
      length: widget.tabsData.length,
      vsync: this,
      initialIndex: _getSmartInitialTabIndex(),

    // Initialize expanded states for each tab

        tabExpandedStates[tabIndex] =

          return (shouldOpenFirst && entry.key == 0).obs;
        }).toList();
      }

      selectedTabIndex.value = tabController.index;

  Widget _buildPlaceholderContent(TabData tab) {

  Widget _buildExpandableSections(

/// Controller class for creating slivers with STICKY tabs behavior
class TabbedSliversController extends DisposableInterface {
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final NumerologyResult? result;
  final bool isLoading;
  final String calculationText;
  final Map<String, String?> descriptionData;
  final List<TabData> tabsData;
  final bool showCalculation;
  final int? factorId;

  late final Rx<int> selectedTabIndex;
  late final Map<int, List<RxBool>> tabExpandedStates;

  TabbedSliversController({
    required this.inputData,
    required this.result,
    required this.isLoading,
    required this.calculationText,
    required this.descriptionData,
    required this.tabsData,
    this.showCalculation = true,
    this.factorId,
  }) {
    selectedTabIndex = _getSmartInitialTabIndex().obs;
    tabExpandedStates = {};
    _initializeExpandedStates();
  }

  @override
  void onClose() {
    selectedTabIndex.close();
    for (final stateList in tabExpandedStates.values) {
      for (final state in stateList) {
        state.close();
      }
    }
    tabExpandedStates.clear();
    super.onClose();
  }

  void _initializeExpandedStates() {
    for (int tabIndex = 0; tabIndex < tabsData.length; tabIndex++) {
      final tab = tabsData[tabIndex];
      if (tab.sections != null) {
        // For Karmic Debt (factor 13) with multiple tabs, open first section
        final shouldOpenFirst = factorId == 13 && tabsData.length > 1;
        tabExpandedStates[tabIndex] =
            tab.sections!.asMap().entries.map((entry) {
          return (shouldOpenFirst && entry.key == 0).obs;
        }).toList();
      }
    }
  }

  /// Determine smart initial tab index based on content availability
  int _getSmartInitialTabIndex() {
    for (int i = 0; i < tabsData.length; i++) {
      final tab = tabsData[i];

      // Prioritize "M≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh" if it has actual content (not placeholder)
      if (tab.title.toLowerCase().contains('c√° t√≠nh')) {
        if (!tab.hasPlaceholder &&
            tab.sections != null &&
            tab.sections!.isNotEmpty) {
          return i; // Focus on personality arrows tab if has content
        }
      }
    }

    // Fallback: Find "M≈©i t√™n thi·∫øu h·ª•t" tab if personality arrows is empty
    for (int i = 0; i < tabsData.length; i++) {
      final tab = tabsData[i];

      if (tab.title.toLowerCase().contains('thi·∫øu h·ª•t')) {
        return i; // Focus on missing arrows tab as fallback
      }
    }

    // Final fallback: first tab (should not happen in normal cases)
    return 0;
  }

  /// Build slivers for sticky tabs architecture
  List<Widget> buildSlivers() {
    return [
      // Calculation section - scrollable (shows how to calculate)
      // Only show for factors that need it (not for Arrows Personality)
      if (calculationText.isNotEmpty && showCalculation)
        SliverToBoxAdapter(
          child: _buildCalculationSection(),
        ),

      // Description section - scrollable
      if (result != null && _hasDescriptionContent())
        SliverToBoxAdapter(
          child: _buildDescriptionSection(),
        ),

      // STICKY Tab Bar
      SliverPersistentHeader(
        pinned: true,
        delegate: _StickyTabBarDelegate(
          tabsData: tabsData,
          selectedTabIndex: selectedTabIndex,
        ),
      ),

      // Current Tab Content - integrated into main scroll
      _buildCurrentTabContentSliver(),
    ];
  }

  Widget _buildCalculationSection() {
    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
      child: Column(
        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
        children: [
          SizedBox(height: 24.nh),
          // Calculation text with same style as BaseBodyComponent
          MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
            calculationText,
            NumerologyTheme.detailCalculationText, // Use the same theme style
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 16.nh),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildDescriptionSection() {
    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
      child: Column(
        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
        children: [
          SizedBox(height: 24.nh),
          _buildDescriptionText(),
          SizedBox(height: 16.nh),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildDescriptionText() {
    return Column(
      crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
      children: [
        if (descriptionData['title'] != null) ...[
          Text(
            descriptionData['title']!,
            style: TextStyle(
              color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED),
              fontSize: 18.nsp,
              fontWeight: FontWeight.w600,
              height: 1.4,
              fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.primaryFont,
            ),
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 8.nh),
        ],
        if (descriptionData['description'] != null) ...[
          Text(
            descriptionData['description']!,
            style: TextStyle(
              color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED),
              fontSize: 16.nsp,
              height: 1.6,
              fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.primaryFont,
            ),
          ),
        ],
      ],
    );
  }

  bool _hasDescriptionContent() {
    return (descriptionData['title'] != null &&
            descriptionData['title']!.isNotEmpty) ||
        (descriptionData['description'] != null &&
            descriptionData['description']!.isNotEmpty);
  }

  /// Build current tab content as sliver
  Widget _buildCurrentTabContentSliver() {
    return Obx(() {
      final currentTabIndex = selectedTabIndex.value;
      if (currentTabIndex >= tabsData.length) {
        return const SliverToBoxAdapter(child: SizedBox.shrink());
      }

      final currentTab = tabsData[currentTabIndex];
      return _buildTabContentSliver(currentTab, currentTabIndex);
    });
  }

  Widget _buildTabContentSliver(TabData tab, int tabIndex) {
    // Show placeholder if needed
    if (tab.hasPlaceholder) {
      return SliverMainAxisGroup(
        slivers: [
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
              child: SizedBox(height: 24.h)), // Spacing from tab buttons
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
            child: _buildPlaceholderContent(tab),
          ),
        ],
      );
    }

    // Render expandable sections as slivers
    if (tab.sections != null && tab.sections!.isNotEmpty) {
      final expandedStates = tabExpandedStates[tabIndex];
      if (expandedStates == null || expandedStates.isEmpty) {
        return const SliverToBoxAdapter(child: SizedBox.shrink());
      }

      return SliverMainAxisGroup(
        slivers: [
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
              child: SizedBox(height: 24.h)), // Spacing from tab buttons
          SliverList.separated(
            itemCount: tab.sections!.length,
            itemBuilder: (context, index) {
              if (index >= expandedStates.length) {
                return const SizedBox.shrink();
              }

              final section = tab.sections![index];
              return RepaintBoundary(
                child: _buildExpandableSection(
                  index,
                  section,
                  expandedStates[index],
                  () {
                    if (index < expandedStates.length) {
                      expandedStates[index].toggle();
                    }
                  },
                ),
              );
            },
            separatorBuilder: (context, index) => const SizedBox(height: 1),
          ),
          SliverToBoxAdapter(child: SizedBox(height: 20.h)),
        ],
      );
    }

    // Simple text content
    if (tab.content.isNotEmpty) {
      return SliverMainAxisGroup(
        slivers: [
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
              child: SizedBox(height: 24.h)), // Spacing from tab buttons
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
            child: Padding(
              padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
              child: Column(
                children: [
                  MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
                    tab.content,
                    NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
                  ),
                  SizedBox(height: 20.h),
                ],
              ),
            ),
          ),
        ],
      );
    }

    // Empty content
    return SliverMainAxisGroup(
      slivers: [
        SliverToBoxAdapter(
            child: SizedBox(height: 24.h)), // Spacing from tab buttons
        SliverToBoxAdapter(
          child: _buildEmptyTabContent(tab),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  Widget _buildPlaceholderContent(TabData tab) {
    return Center(
      child: Column(
        mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
        children: [
          SizedBox(height: 20.h),

          // Th·∫ßn s·ªë h·ªçc graphic illustration
          Image.asset(
            NumerologyPath.graphicThanSoHoc,
            width: 160.nw,
            height: 160.nh,
            fit: BoxFit.contain,
          ),

          SizedBox(height: 24.nh),

          // Title text centered
          Text(
            'B·∫°n hi·ªán kh√¥ng c√≥ ${tab.title.toLowerCase()}',
            style: TextStyle(
              color: const Color(0xFFFFFAED),
              fontSize: 18.nsp,
              fontWeight: FontWeight.w600,
              fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.primaryFont,
            ),
            textAlign: TextAlign.center,
          ),

          SizedBox(height: 20.h),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildEmptyTabContent(TabData tab) {
    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
      child: Center(
        child: Column(
          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            SizedBox(height: 20.h),
            Icon(
              Icons.info_outline,
              size: 48.sp,
              color: const Color(0xFF6B7280),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 16.nh),
            Text(
              'Kh√¥ng c√≥ n·ªôi dung',
              style: TextStyle(
                color: const Color(0xFF9CA3AF),
                fontSize: 16.nsp,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.w500,
                fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.primaryFont,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20.h),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildExpandableSection(
    int index,
    NumerologySection section,
    RxBool isExpanded,
    VoidCallback onToggle,
  ) {
    // Cache expensive computations
    final cleanTitle = _cleanTitle(section.title ?? '');
    final iconNumber = '${index + 1}';

    return Container(
      margin: const EdgeInsets.only(bottom: 1),
      child: Obx(() {
        final expanded = isExpanded.value;

        return Column(
          children: [
            // Header - use RepaintBoundary for performance
            RepaintBoundary(
              child: GestureDetector(
                onTap: onToggle,
                behavior: HitTestBehavior.opaque,
                child: Container(
                  constraints: BoxConstraints(minHeight: 40),
                  width: double.infinity,
                  color: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionBackground,
                  padding:
                      EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw, vertical: 8.nh),
                  child: Row(
                    children: [
                      // Level Icon with number - cache widget
                      _buildLevelIcon(iconNumber),
                      const SizedBox(width: 8),

                      // Title
                      Expanded(
                        child: Text(
                          cleanTitle,
                          style: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionTitle,
                        ),
                      ),

                      // Dropdown Arrow - consistent 180¬∞ rotation
                      TweenAnimationBuilder<double>(
                        tween: Tween(begin: 0.0, end: expanded ? 1.0 : 0.0),
                        duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
                        curve: Curves.easeInOutCubic,
                        builder: (context, turns, child) {
                          return Transform.rotate(
                            angle: turns * 3.14159, // 1.0 * œÄ = 180¬∞
                            child: child,
                          );
                        },
                        child: Image.asset(
                          IconsPath.dropIcon,
                          width: 24.nw,
                          height: 24.nw,
                          color: const Color(0xFFFFEFC4),
                          fit: BoxFit.contain,
                        ),
                      ),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
              ),
            ),

            // Content with optimized animation
            ClipRect(
              child: AnimatedAlign(
                duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
                curve: Curves.easeInOutCubic,
                alignment: expanded ? Alignment.center : Alignment.topCenter,
                heightFactor: expanded ? 1.0 : 0.0,
                child: Container(
                  width: double.infinity,
                  color: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
                  padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
                  child: MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
                    section.content ?? '',
                    NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
                  ),
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        );
      }),
    );
  }

  // Cache title cleaning
  static final Map<String, String> _titleCache = {};
  String _cleanTitle(String title) {
    return _titleCache.putIfAbsent(title, () {
      return title
          .replaceFirst('‚úÖ ', '')
          .replaceFirst('‚ùå Thi·∫øu ', '')
          .replaceFirst('‚ùå ', '');
    });
  }

  // Cache level icon widget
  Widget _buildLevelIcon(String iconNumber) {
    return SizedBox(
      width: 24.nw,
      height: 24.nw,
      child: Stack(
        alignment: Alignment.center,
        children: [
          Image.asset(
            IconsPath.levelIcon,
            width: 24.nw,
            height: 24.nw,
            fit: BoxFit.contain,
          ),
          Transform.translate(
            offset: Offset(-3.nw, -5.nh),
            child: Text(
              iconNumber,
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 18.nsp,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
                fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.numberFont,
              ),
            ),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

/// Custom SliverPersistentHeaderDelegate for sticky tab bar
class _StickyTabBarDelegate extends SliverPersistentHeaderDelegate {
  final List<TabData> tabsData;
  final Rx<int> selectedTabIndex;
  final double height = 48.0;

  _StickyTabBarDelegate({
    required this.tabsData,
    required this.selectedTabIndex,
  });

  @override
  double get minExtent => height;

  @override
  double get maxExtent => height;

  @override
  Widget build(
      BuildContext context, double shrinkOffset, bool overlapsContent) {
    return Container(
      height: height,
      decoration: BoxDecoration(
        color: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
        boxShadow: overlapsContent
            ? [
                BoxShadow(
                  color: Colors.black.withValues(alpha: 0.1),
                  blurRadius: 4.0,
                  offset: const Offset(0, 2.0),
                ),
              ]
            : null,
      ),
      child: Stack(
        children: [
          // Background line for all tabs
          Positioned(
            bottom: 0,
            left: 0,
            right: 0,
            child: Container(
              height: 3.0,
              color: const Color(0xFF757EDF).withValues(alpha: 0.4),
            ),
          ),
          // Tab buttons
          Row(
            children: tabsData.asMap().entries.map((entry) {
              final index = entry.key;
              final tab = entry.value;
              return _buildTabButton(tab, index);
            }).toList(),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildTabButton(TabData tab, int index) {
    // Responsive font size based on number of tabs
    double getFontSize() {
      if (tabsData.length <= 2) return 16.nsp;
      if (tabsData.length == 3) return 14.nsp;
      return 12.nsp; // 4 tabs or more
    }

    // Check if we need compact mode (4 tabs)
    final bool isCompactMode = tabsData.length >= 4;

    return Expanded(
      child: Obx(() {
        final isSelected = selectedTabIndex.value == index;

        return GestureDetector(
          onTap: () => selectedTabIndex.value = index,
          behavior: HitTestBehavior.opaque,
          child: Container(
            height: height,
            padding:
                EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: isCompactMode ? 4.nw : 8.nw),
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              border: Border(
                bottom: BorderSide(
                  color:
                      isSelected ? const Color(0xFF757EDF) : Colors.transparent,
                  width: 3.0,
                ),
              ),
            ),
            child: Center(
              child: FittedBox(
                fit: BoxFit.scaleDown,
                child: Text(
                  // For compact mode, use single line format
                  isCompactMode
                      ? tab.title.replaceAll('\n', ' ') // "Nghi·ªáp qu·∫£ 13/4"
                      : tab.title, // Keep 2 lines for normal mode
                  textAlign: TextAlign.center,
                  style: TextStyle(
                    fontSize: getFontSize(),
                    fontWeight: isSelected ? FontWeight.w600 : FontWeight.w500,
                    color: isSelected ? Colors.white : Colors.white60,
                    fontFamily: NumerologyTheme.primaryFont,
                    height: 1.2,
                  ),
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ),
        );
      }),
    );
  }

  @override
  bool shouldRebuild(covariant _StickyTabBarDelegate oldDelegate) {
    // Only rebuild if data actually changed
    return oldDelegate.tabsData.length != tabsData.length ||
        !_compareTabData(oldDelegate.tabsData, tabsData);
  }

  bool _compareTabData(List<TabData> oldData, List<TabData> newData) {
    if (oldData.length != newData.length) return false;
    for (int i = 0; i < oldData.length; i++) {
      if (oldData[i].title != newData[i].title) return false;
    }
    return true;
  }
}

    }

    final birthDate = input.birthDate!;
    
    // Use the original Life Path calculator
    final lifePathNumber = LifePathCalculator.calculate(birthDate);
    
    // Get the original interpretation data
    final interpretation = LifePathInterpretations.getInterpretation(lifePathNumber);
    
    // Get calculation explanation

    final result = NumerologyResult(
      mainNumber: lifePathNumber,

      calculation: calculationExplanation,

    print('   - sections count: ${result.sections?.length ?? 0}');
    
    return result;
  }

  // Helper methods

  static int _reduceToSingleDigit(int number, {bool allowMasterNumbers = false}) {
    while (number > 9) {
      if (allowMasterNumbers && (number == 11 || number == 22 || number == 33)) {
        return number;
      }
      number = number.toString().split('').map(int.parse).reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    }
    return number;
  }

  static int _calculateNameValue(String name) {
    const letterValues = {
      'A': 1, 'B': 2, 'C': 3, 'D': 4, 'E': 5, 'F': 6, 'G': 7, 'H': 8, 'I': 9,
      'J': 1, 'K': 2, 'L': 3, 'M': 4, 'N': 5, 'O': 6, 'P': 7, 'Q': 8, 'R': 9,
      'S': 1, 'T': 2, 'U': 3, 'V': 4, 'W': 5, 'X': 6, 'Y': 7, 'Z': 8,
    };

    return name.toUpperCase()
        .split('')
        .where((char) => letterValues.containsKey(char))
        .map((char) => letterValues[char]!)
        .reduce((a, b) => a + b);
  }

  static int _calculateVowelValue(String name) {
    const vowelValues = {
      'A': 1, 'E': 5, 'I': 9, 'O': 6, 'U': 3, 'Y': 7,
    };

    return name.toUpperCase()
        .split('')
        .where((char) => vowelValues.containsKey(char))
        .map((char) => vowelValues[char]!)
        .fold(0, (a, b) => a + b);
  }

  static int _calculateConsonantValue(String name) {
    final totalValue = _calculateNameValue(name);
    final vowelValue = _calculateVowelValue(name);
    return totalValue - vowelValue;
  }

  /// Get Birth Chart calculation breakdown
  static String _getBirthChartCalculationBreakdown(dynamic result) {
    if (result == null) return '';
    
    final chart = result.chart;
    final date = '${chart.birthDate.day}/${chart.birthDate.month}/${chart.birthDate.year}';
    final sequence = chart.digitalSequence.join(', ');
    
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    buffer.writeln('**Ng√†y sinh:** $date');
    buffer.writeln('**Chu·ªói s·ªë:** [$sequence]');
    buffer.writeln();
    buffer.writeln('**T·∫ßn su·∫•t xu·∫•t hi·ªán:**');
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {
      final freq = chart.numberFrequencies[i] ?? 0;
      if (freq > 0) {
        buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ S·ªë $i: $freq l·∫ßn');
      } else {
        buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ S·ªë $i: Thi·∫øu');
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }

  /// Get detailed analysis for Birth Chart
  static String _getBirthChartDetailedAnalysis(dynamic result) {
    if (result == null) return '';
    
    final interpretations = result.interpretations;
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    for (int number = 1; number <= 9; number++) {
      final interpretation = interpretations[number];
      if (interpretation != null) {
        buffer.writeln('**S·ªë $number** (${interpretation.frequency} l·∫ßn):');
        buffer.writeln(interpretation.interpretation);
        buffer.writeln();
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }

    if (result == null) return [];

      for (final lesson in result.karmicLessons) {

          content: '**$title**\n\n$formattedContent',  // Full title with markdown in content
          isExpandable: true,
        ));
      }
    } else if (result.missingNumbers != null && result.missingNumbers.isNotEmpty) {
      // Fallback for missingNumbers list
      for (final number in result.missingNumbers) {
        final interpretationData = KarmicLessonsInterpretations.getInterpretation(number);
        final title = interpretationData['title'] ?? 'Thi·∫øu S·ªë $number';
        final interpretation = interpretationData['interpretation'] ?? '';
        
        // Format content to add bullet points
        final formattedContent = _formatKarmicLessonContent(interpretation);
        
        sections.add(NumerologySection(
          title: 'Thi·∫øu s·ªë $number',  // Short title for box
          content: '**$title**\n\n$formattedContent',  // Full title with markdown in content
          isExpandable: true,
        ));
      }
    }
    
    return sections;
  }
  
  /// Format content with bullet points for all paragraphs
  static String _formatContentWithBullets(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    // First try to split by double newline
    List<String> paragraphs = content.split('\n\n');
    
    // If we only get one paragraph, try splitting by single newline
    // (some content uses single newline to separate paragraphs)
    if (paragraphs.length == 1) {
      paragraphs = content.split('\n');
    }
    
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < paragraphs.length; i++) {
      final paragraph = paragraphs[i].trim();
      if (paragraph.isEmpty) continue;
      
      // Add bullet at the beginning of each paragraph
      if (buffer.isNotEmpty) buffer.write('\n');
      buffer.write('‚Ä¢ $paragraph');
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }
  
  /// Format Life Pinnacle content - similar to Karmic Debt Main Lesson
  /// Lines after ":" get bullets, everything else stays as is
  static String _formatLifePinnacleContent(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    // Split content into lines
    final lines = content.split('\n');
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    bool foundColon = false;
    int bulletCount = 0;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
      final line = lines[i].trim();
      if (line.isEmpty) continue;
      
      // Check if line ends with colon (start of bullet list)
      if (!foundColon && line.endsWith(':')) {
        if (buffer.isNotEmpty) buffer.write('\n');
        buffer.write(line);
        foundColon = true;
        bulletCount = 0;
      }
      // After colon - add bullets for the next lines
      else if (foundColon && bulletCount < 2) {
        // Only add bullets for limited lines after colon
        buffer.write('\n‚Ä¢ $line');
        bulletCount++;
        
        // Check if this might be the last bullet line
        // (usually 2 lines after colon in Life Pinnacles)
        if (bulletCount >= 2 || i == lines.length - 1) {
          foundColon = false; // Reset for potential next section
        }
      }
      // Regular lines - no bullet
      else {
        if (buffer.isNotEmpty) buffer.write('\n');
        buffer.write(line);
        foundColon = false; // Reset if we're past bullet section
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }
  
  /// Format Karmic Debt Main Lesson - first paragraph (ending with :) no bullet, rest with bullets
  static String _formatKarmicDebtMainLesson(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    // Split content into lines
    final lines = content.split('\n');
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    bool foundColon = false;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
      final line = lines[i].trim();
      if (line.isEmpty) continue;
      
      if (!foundColon && line.endsWith(':')) {
        // Line ending with colon - no bullet
        buffer.write(line);
        foundColon = true;
      } else if (foundColon) {
        // After colon - each line gets a bullet
        buffer.write('\n‚Ä¢ $line');
      } else {
        // Before colon - no bullet
        if (buffer.isNotEmpty) buffer.write('\n');
        buffer.write(line);
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }
  
  /// Format Karmic Lesson content to add bullet points to paragraphs
  /// Paragraphs starting with * marker will not have bullets added
  static String _formatKarmicLessonContent(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    // Split content into paragraphs (separated by empty lines)
    final paragraphs = content.split('\n\n');
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < paragraphs.length; i++) {
      var paragraph = paragraphs[i].trim();
      if (paragraph.isEmpty) continue;
      
      // Check if this paragraph starts with * marker
      if (paragraph.startsWith('*')) {
        // Remove only the leading * marker
        paragraph = paragraph.substring(1).trim();
        
        // Check if paragraph has sub-items that need bullets
        // (contains lines after a colon that need to be bulleted)
        if (paragraph.contains(':\n')) {
          final lines = paragraph.split('\n');
          final formattedLines = <String>[];
          
          for (final line in lines) {
            final trimmedLine = line.trim();
            if (trimmedLine.isEmpty) continue;
            
            // Lines that end with : are headers - keep as is (no bold)
            if (trimmedLine.endsWith(':')) {
              formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
            } else {
              // Sub-items get bullets
              formattedLines.add('‚Ä¢ $trimmedLine');
            }
          }
          buffer.write(formattedLines.join('\n'));
        } else {
          // No sub-items, just add as-is without bullet (no bold for headers)
          buffer.write(paragraph);
        }
        
        if (i < paragraphs.length - 1) {
          buffer.write('\n\n');
        }
        continue;
      }
      
      // Split paragraph into lines to handle multi-line paragraphs
      final lines = paragraph.split('\n');
      final formattedLines = <String>[];
      
      // Check if this paragraph contains special bullet list items
      // (lines that are already formatted as list in original content)
      bool hasListItems = false;
      for (final line in lines) {
        if (line.trim().startsWith('H·ªçc c√°ch') || 
            line.trim().startsWith('Can ƒë·∫£m') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('Linh ho·∫°t') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('Ti·∫øp nh·∫≠n') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('T·∫≠p d√†nh') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('Kh√°m ph√°') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('Ph√°t tri·ªÉn') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('X√¢y d·ª±ng') ||
            line.trim().startsWith('Bi·∫øt n·∫Øm')) {
          hasListItems = true;
          break;
        }
      }
      
      if (hasListItems) {
        // This paragraph contains list items, format each item with bullet
        for (final line in lines) {
          final trimmedLine = line.trim();
          if (trimmedLine.isEmpty) continue;
          
          // Lines that end with : are headers for the list
          if (trimmedLine.endsWith('l√†:') || trimmedLine.endsWith('b·∫°n:')) {
            formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
          } else {
            formattedLines.add('‚Ä¢ $trimmedLine');
          }
        }
        buffer.write(formattedLines.join('\n'));
      } else {
        // Regular paragraph - add bullet at the beginning
        buffer.write('‚Ä¢ ${lines.join('\n')}');
      }
      
      // Add spacing between paragraphs
      if (i < paragraphs.length - 1) {
        buffer.write('\n\n');
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }

    int pinnacleIndex = 1;
    for (var pinnacle in result.pinnacles) {
      // Get interpretation from data file
      final interpretation = LifePinnaclesInterpretations.getInterpretation(
        pinnacleIndex,
        pinnacle.number,
      );
      
      final title = interpretation['title'] ?? 'ƒê·ªânh cao $pinnacleIndex';
      final subtitle = interpretation['subtitle'] ?? 'ƒê·ªânh cao $pinnacleIndex l√† s·ªë ${pinnacle.number}';
      final content = interpretation['content'] ?? '';
      
      // Format content similar to Karmic Debt Main Lesson - bullets only after ":"
      final formattedContent = _formatLifePinnacleContent(content);
      
      // Create content with subtitle as bold header and formatted paragraphs
      final fullContent = '**$subtitle**\n\n$formattedContent';
      
      sections.add(NumerologySection(
        title: title,
        content: fullContent,
        isExpandable: true,
      ));
      
      pinnacleIndex++;
    }
    
    return sections;
  }

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../views/universal_factor_detail_view.dart';
import '../factory/numerology_component_factory.dart';
import '../config/factor_config.dart';
import '../generic_factor_controller.dart';
import '../../shared/models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import '../calculators/numerology_calculator.dart';

/// Universal route handler for all numerology factors
/// Replaces 16 separate route implementations with one configurable system
class UniversalFactorRoute {
  
  /// Creates a route for any numerology factor
  static Route<T> createRoute<T>({
    required int factorId,
    NumerologyInputModel? inputData,
    int? previewNumber, // For Hero animations from results view
    Map<String, dynamic>? routeArguments,
  }) {
    return PageRouteBuilder<T>(
      settings: RouteSettings(
        name: FactorConfigHelper.getConfig(factorId)?.route ?? '/unknown-factor',
        arguments: {
          'factorId': factorId,
          'inputData': inputData,
          'previewNumber': previewNumber,
          ...?routeArguments,
        },
      ),
      pageBuilder: (context, animation, secondaryAnimation) {
        return UniversalFactorPage(
          factorId: factorId,
          inputData: inputData,
          previewNumber: previewNumber,
        );
      },
      transitionsBuilder: (context, animation, secondaryAnimation, child) {
        // Slide transition from right
        const begin = Offset(1.0, 0.0);
        const end = Offset.zero;
        const curve = Curves.easeInOut;

        final tween = Tween(begin: begin, end: end);
        final offsetAnimation = animation.drive(tween.chain(
          CurveTween(curve: curve),
        ));

        return SlideTransition(
          position: offsetAnimation,
          child: child,
        );
      },
      transitionDuration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
    );
  }

  /// Navigate to any factor detail view  
  static Future<T?>? navigateToFactor<T>({
    required int factorId,
    NumerologyInputModel? inputData,
    int? previewNumber,
    Map<String, dynamic>? arguments,
  }) {
    try {
      // Clean up any existing controller with this tag
      if (Get.isRegistered<GenericFactorController>(tag: 'factor_$factorId')) {
        Get.delete<GenericFactorController>(tag: 'factor_$factorId');
      }
      
      // Generate hero tag for animation  
      final heroTag = _generateHeroTag(factorId, inputData, previewNumber);
      
      // Create controller instance first
      final controller = NumerologyComponentFactory.createController(
        factorId, 
        inputData: inputData,
        previewNumber: previewNumber,
        heroTag: heroTag,
      ) as GenericFactorController;
      
      // Put controller in GetX
      Get.put<GenericFactorController>(controller, tag: 'factor_$factorId');
      
      // Navigate using GetX with arguments
      return Get.to<T?>(
        () => UniversalFactorPage(
          factorId: factorId,
          inputData: inputData,
          previewNumber: previewNumber,
        ),
        arguments: {
          'factorId': factorId,
          'inputData': inputData,
          'previewNumber': previewNumber,
          ...?arguments,
        },
        transition: Transition.rightToLeft,
        duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
      );
    } catch (e) {
      print('‚ùå Navigation error: $e');
      return null;
    }
  }

  /// Get route name for a factor
  static String getRouteName(int factorId) {
    return FactorConfigHelper.getConfig(factorId)?.route ?? '/unknown-factor';
  }

  /// Generate hero tag for animation consistency
  static String _generateHeroTag(int factorId, NumerologyInputModel? inputData, int? previewNumber) {
    final config = FactorConfigHelper.getConfig(factorId);
    final baseTag = 'factor_${factorId}';
    
    if (config?.hasPreview == true && (previewNumber != null || inputData != null)) {
      // For factors with preview numbers (Life Path, Expression, etc.)
      final number = previewNumber ?? _calculateMainNumber(factorId, inputData);
      return '${baseTag}_number_${number ?? 0}';
    }
    
    // For icon factors (Birth Chart, Arrows, Pinnacles, etc.)
    // These don't have preview numbers but use icon representation in results view
    // Check if factor has icon representation regardless of header type
    if ([2, 3, 8, 12, 13, 15, 16].contains(factorId)) {
      return '${baseTag}_icon';
    }
    
    return baseTag;
  }

  /// Calculate main number for hero tag generation
  static int? _calculateMainNumber(int factorId, NumerologyInputModel? inputData) {
    if (inputData == null) return null;
    
    try {
      switch (factorId) {
        case 1: // Life Path
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateLifePath(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 4: // Expression
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateExpression(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 5: // Soul Urge
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateSoulUrge(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 6: // Personality
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonality(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 7: // Personal Year
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculatePersonalYear(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 9: // Birth Day
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateBirthDayNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 10: // Maturity
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateMaturityNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        case 14: // Attitude
          return NumerologyCalculator.calculateAttitudeNumber(inputData).mainNumber;
        default:
          return null;
      }
    } catch (e) {
      return null;
    }
  }

  /// Register all factor routes with GetX
  static List<GetPage> getAllRoutes() {
    return FACTOR_CONFIGS.entries.map((entry) {
      final factorId = entry.key;
      final config = entry.value;
      
      return GetPage(
        name: config.route,
        page: () => UniversalFactorPage(
          factorId: factorId,
          inputData: Get.arguments?['inputData'],
          previewNumber: Get.arguments?['previewNumber'],
        ),
        binding: FactorBinding(factorId),
        transition: Transition.rightToLeft,
        transitionDuration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
      );
    }).toList();
  }
}

/// Universal factor page that assembles components using the factory
class UniversalFactorPage extends StatelessWidget {
  final int factorId;
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final int? previewNumber;

  const UniversalFactorPage({
    super.key,
    required this.factorId,
    this.inputData,
    this.previewNumber,
  });

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // Get controller from GetX with tag
    final controller = Get.find<GenericFactorController>(tag: 'factor_$factorId');
    
    return Obx(() {
      // Debug logs
      print('üìÑ UniversalFactorPage.build() - Factor $factorId');
      print('   - Controller result: ${controller.resultRx.value}');
      print('   - Controller isLoading: ${controller.isLoadingRx.value}');
      print('   - InputData: $inputData');
      
      // Create header component using controller's heroTag and preview number
      final headerComponent = NumerologyComponentFactory.createHeaderComponent(
        factorId: factorId,
        heroTag: controller.heroTag,
        inputData: inputData,
        result: controller.resultRx.value,
        isLoading: controller.isLoadingRx.value,
        previewNumber: controller.previewNumber,
      );

      // Create body component  
      final bodyComponent = NumerologyComponentFactory.createBodyComponent(
        factorId: factorId,
        inputData: inputData,
        result: controller.resultRx.value,
        isLoading: controller.isLoadingRx.value,
      );

      return Material(
        child: UniversalFactorDetailView(
          headerComponent: headerComponent,
          bodyComponent: bodyComponent,
          controller: controller,
        ),
      );
    });
  }

}

/// Universal GetX binding for all factors
class FactorBinding extends Bindings {
  final int factorId;
  
  FactorBinding(this.factorId);

  @override
  void dependencies() {
    // Create controller for this factor
    Get.lazyPut<GenericFactorController>(
      () => NumerologyComponentFactory.createController(factorId) as GenericFactorController,
      tag: 'factor_$factorId',
    );
  }
}

/// Route helpers for easy navigation
extension NumerologyNavigation on GetInterface {
  
  /// Navigate to Life Path detail
  Future<T?>? toLifePathDetail<T>({

  Future<T?>? toExpressionDetail<T>({

    return UniversalFactorRoute.navigateToFactor<T>(

      arguments: arguments,
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../components/base_header_component.dart';
import '../components/tabbed_body_component.dart';
import '../components/factor_navigation_bar.dart';
import '../generic_factor_controller.dart';
import '../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';

/// Universal detail view that can display any numerology factor
/// Uses composition pattern with header and body components
class UniversalFactorDetailView extends StatefulWidget {
  final BaseHeaderComponent headerComponent;
  final Widget bodyComponent;
  final GenericFactorController controller;

  const UniversalFactorDetailView({
    super.key,
    required this.headerComponent,
    required this.bodyComponent,
    required this.controller,
  });

  @override
  State<UniversalFactorDetailView> createState() => _UniversalFactorDetailViewState();
}

class _UniversalFactorDetailViewState extends State<UniversalFactorDetailView>
    with TickerProviderStateMixin {
  final ScrollController _scrollController = ScrollController();
  late AnimationController _headerAnimationController;
  final RxBool _isHeaderSticky = false.obs;

  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    _headerAnimationController = AnimationController(
      duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 200),
      vsync: this,
    );

    _scrollController.addListener(_onScroll);

    // Debug logs
    print('üèóÔ∏è UniversalFactorDetailView.initState()');
    print('   - Controller has result: ${widget.controller.hasResult}');
    print('   - Controller has inputData: ${widget.controller.inputData != null}');
    print('   - InputData: ${widget.controller.inputData}');
    
    // Auto-trigger calculation if not already done
    if (!widget.controller.hasResult && widget.controller.inputData != null) {
      print('üèóÔ∏è Triggering calculation...');
      WidgetsBinding.instance.addPostFrameCallback((_) {
        widget.controller.calculateResult();
      });
    } else {
      print('üèóÔ∏è Skipping calculation - hasResult: ${widget.controller.hasResult}, hasData: ${widget.controller.inputData != null}');
    }
  }

  @override
  void dispose() {
    _scrollController.removeListener(_onScroll);
    _scrollController.dispose();
    _headerAnimationController.dispose();
    // No cached slivers to clear
    super.dispose();
  }

  void _onScroll() {
    const threshold = 300.0; // Hero section height
    final shouldSticky = _scrollController.offset > threshold;

    if (shouldSticky != _isHeaderSticky.value) {
      _isHeaderSticky.value = shouldSticky;
      if (shouldSticky) {
        _headerAnimationController.forward();
      } else {
        _headerAnimationController.reverse();
      }
    }
  }

  /// Get slivers for body component - handles sticky tabs for TabbedBodyComponent  
  /// No caching to ensure navigation bar updates properly
  // Removed caching due to navigation bar needing fresh data
  
  List<Widget> _getBodySlivers() {
    // No caching to ensure navigation bar updates with current factor
    return _createBodySlivers();
  }
  
  List<Widget> _createBodySlivers() {
    // Check if this is a TabbedBodyComponent that needs sticky tabs
    if (widget.bodyComponent is TabbedBodyComponent) {
      final tabbedComponent = widget.bodyComponent as TabbedBodyComponent;
      
      // Use the static method to get slivers for sticky tabs
      final slivers = TabbedBodyComponent.createSlivers(
        inputData: tabbedComponent.inputData,
        result: tabbedComponent.result,
        isLoading: tabbedComponent.isLoading,
        calculationText: tabbedComponent.calculationText,
        descriptionData: tabbedComponent.descriptionData,
        tabsData: tabbedComponent.tabsData,
        showCalculation: tabbedComponent.showCalculation,
        factorId: tabbedComponent.factorId,
      );
      
      // Add factor navigation bar to sticky tabs
      slivers.add(
        SliverToBoxAdapter(
          child: FactorNavigationBar(
            currentFactorId: widget.controller.factorId,
            inputData: widget.controller.inputData,
          ),
        ),
      );
      
      return slivers;
    }
    
    // For other components, wrap in SliverToBoxAdapter
    return [
      SliverToBoxAdapter(
        child: widget.bodyComponent,
      ),
      // Add factor navigation bar for non-tabbed components
      SliverToBoxAdapter(
        child: FactorNavigationBar(
          currentFactorId: widget.controller.factorId,
          inputData: widget.controller.inputData,
        ),
      ),
    ];
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
      body: CustomScrollView(
        controller: _scrollController,
        slivers: [
          // Header component (SliverAppBar)
          widget.headerComponent,
          
          // Body component - handles sticky tabs automatically + navigation bar
          ..._getBodySlivers(),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

  // Helper methods for generating factor-specific data

  static List<List<dynamic>> _generateBirthChartGrid(NumerologyInputModel input) {
    final birthDate = input.birthDate!;
    final digits = [
      birthDate.day ~/ 10,
      birthDate.day % 10,
      birthDate.month ~/ 10,
      birthDate.month % 10,
      birthDate.year ~/ 1000,
      (birthDate.year % 1000) ~/ 100,
      (birthDate.year % 100) ~/ 10,
      birthDate.year % 10,
    ].where((d) => d > 0).toList();

    // Count frequency of each digit
    final frequency = <int, int>{};
    for (final digit in digits) {
      frequency[digit] = (frequency[digit] ?? 0) + 1;
    }

    // Create 3x3 grid based on correct Pythagorean system layout
    final grid = List.generate(3, (_) => List<dynamic>.filled(3, null));
    final positions = {
      1: [2, 0], 2: [1, 0], 3: [0, 0],  // Column 0: 1,2,3 (bottom to top)
      4: [2, 1], 5: [1, 1], 6: [0, 1],  // Column 1: 4,5,6 (bottom to top)
      7: [2, 2], 8: [1, 2], 9: [0, 2],  // Column 2: 7,8,9 (bottom to top)
    };

    // Fill grid with repeated digits based on frequency
    for (final entry in frequency.entries) {
      final digit = entry.key;
      final count = entry.value;
      if (positions.containsKey(digit)) {
        final pos = positions[digit]!;
        // Create string with digit repeated based on frequency
        grid[pos[0]][pos[1]] = digit.toString() * count;
      }
    }

    return grid;
  }

  static List<grid_chart.ArrowData> _generateArrowsData(List<List<dynamic>> grid) {
    final arrows = <grid_chart.ArrowData>[];

    // Check for horizontal lines (all 3 rows)
    for (int row = 0; row < 3; row++) {
      if (grid[row][0] != null && grid[row][1] != null && grid[row][2] != null) {
        final yPos = 0.16 + (row * 0.34); // 0.16, 0.5, 0.84
        // Extract single digit from repeated string (e.g., "111" -> 1)
        final num0 = int.parse(grid[row][0].toString()[0]);
        final num1 = int.parse(grid[row][1].toString()[0]);
        final num2 = int.parse(grid[row][2].toString()[0]);
        arrows.add(grid_chart.ArrowData(
          start: Offset(0.05, yPos),
          end: Offset(0.95, yPos),
          direction: grid_chart.ArrowDirection.horizontal,
          numbers: [num0, num1, num2],
        ));
      }
    }

    // Check for vertical lines (all 3 columns) - always point upward
    for (int col = 0; col < 3; col++) {
      if (grid[0][col] != null && grid[1][col] != null && grid[2][col] != null) {
        final xPos = 0.16 + (col * 0.34); // 0.16, 0.5, 0.84
        // Extract single digit from repeated string
        final num0 = int.parse(grid[0][col].toString()[0]);
        final num1 = int.parse(grid[1][col].toString()[0]);
        final num2 = int.parse(grid[2][col].toString()[0]);
        arrows.add(grid_chart.ArrowData(
          start: Offset(xPos, 0.95), // Start from bottom
          end: Offset(xPos, 0.05),   // End at top (arrow points up)
          direction: grid_chart.ArrowDirection.vertical,
          numbers: [num2, num1, num0], // Bottom to top
        ));
      }
    }

    // Check for diagonal lines - always point upward
    // Bottom-left to top-right diagonal (arrow points up-right)
    if (grid[0][2] != null && grid[1][1] != null && grid[2][0] != null) {
      arrows.add(const grid_chart.ArrowData(
        start: Offset(0.05, 0.95), // Start bottom-left
        end: Offset(0.95, 0.05),   // End top-right (arrow points up)
        direction: grid_chart.ArrowDirection.diagonal,
        numbers: [7, 5, 3], // Bottom-left to top-right
      ));
    }

    // Bottom-right to top-left diagonal (arrow points up-left)  
    if (grid[0][0] != null && grid[1][1] != null && grid[2][2] != null) {
      arrows.add(const grid_chart.ArrowData(
        start: Offset(0.95, 0.95), // Start bottom-right
        end: Offset(0.05, 0.05),   // End top-left (arrow points up)
        direction: grid_chart.ArrowDirection.diagonal,
        numbers: [9, 5, 1], // Bottom-right to top-left
      ));
    }

    return arrows;
  }

  static List<PinnacleLevel> _generatePinnacles(NumerologyInputModel input) {
    // Fallback calculation theo ƒë√∫ng c√¥ng th·ª©c numerology
    final birthDate = input.birthDate!;
    final month = birthDate.month;
    final day = birthDate.day;
    final year = birthDate.year;
    
    // Calculate Life Path Number for correct age ranges
    final lifePathNumber = _calculateLifePathNumber(birthDate);
    
    // Calculate corrected age ranges using the same formula as the calculator
    // N·∫øu Life Path l√† Master Number, r√∫t g·ªçn v·ªÅ s·ªë ƒë∆°n ƒë·ªÉ t√≠nh tu·ªïi
    int lifePathForAge = lifePathNumber;
    if (lifePathNumber == 11) lifePathForAge = 2;
    else if (lifePathNumber == 22) lifePathForAge = 4;
    else if (lifePathNumber == 33) lifePathForAge = 6;
    
    final pinnacle1End = 36 - lifePathForAge;
    
    // T√≠nh theo ƒë√∫ng c√¥ng th·ª©c life pinnacles - PH·∫¢I T√ÅCH S·ªê TR∆Ø·ªöC
    final monthSum = _sumDigits(month);
    final daySum = _sumDigits(day);
    
    // NƒÉm ph·∫£i r√∫t g·ªçn HO√ÄN TO√ÄN v·ªÅ 1 ch·ªØ s·ªë
    int yearReduced = _sumDigits(year);
    while (yearReduced > 9) {
      yearReduced = _sumDigits(yearReduced);
    }
    
    final pinnacle1 = _reduceToMasterOrSingle(monthSum + daySum);
    final pinnacle2 = _reduceToMasterOrSingle(daySum + yearReduced);
    final pinnacle3 = _reduceToMasterOrSingle(pinnacle1 + pinnacle2);
    final pinnacle4 = _reduceToMasterOrSingle(monthSum + yearReduced);
    
    // Calculate dynamic age ranges based on Life Path
    final pinnacle2End = pinnacle1End + 9;
    final pinnacle3End = pinnacle2End + 9;
    
    return [
      PinnacleLevel(
        number: pinnacle1, 
        ageRange: '0 - $pinnacle1End tu·ªïi', 
        level: 0,
        startAge: 0,
        endAge: pinnacle1End,
      ),
      PinnacleLevel(
        number: pinnacle2, 
        ageRange: '${pinnacle1End + 1} - $pinnacle2End tu·ªïi', 
        level: 1,
        startAge: pinnacle1End + 1,
        endAge: pinnacle2End,
      ),
      PinnacleLevel(
        number: pinnacle3, 
        ageRange: '${pinnacle2End + 1} - $pinnacle3End tu·ªïi', 
        level: 2,
        startAge: pinnacle2End + 1,
        endAge: pinnacle3End,
      ), 
      PinnacleLevel(
        number: pinnacle4, 
        ageRange: '${pinnacle3End + 1} - 120 tu·ªïi', 
        level: 3,
        startAge: pinnacle3End + 1,
        endAge: 120,
      ),
    ];
  }
  
  static int _calculateLifePathNumber(DateTime birthDate) {
    // Calculate Life Path Number using the same logic as the main calculator
    final day = birthDate.day;
    final month = birthDate.month;
    final year = birthDate.year;
    
    final allDigits = <int>[];
    allDigits.addAll(day.toString().split('').map(int.parse));
    allDigits.addAll(month.toString().split('').map(int.parse));
    allDigits.addAll(year.toString().split('').map(int.parse));
    
    int sum = allDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    
    // Reduce to single digit or master number
    while (sum > 9 && ![11, 22, 33].contains(sum)) {
      final digits = sum.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
      sum = digits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    }
    
    return sum;
  }
  
  /// T√≠nh t·ªïng c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë c·ªßa m·ªôt s·ªë
  static int _sumDigits(int number) {
    int sum = 0;
    int temp = number;
    while (temp > 0) {
      sum += temp % 10;
      temp ~/= 10;
    }
    return sum;
  }
  
  static int _reduceToMasterOrSingle(int number) {
    if (number <= 9) return number;
    
    // Ki·ªÉm tra Master Numbers
    if (number == 11 || number == 22 || number == 33) {
      return number;
    }
    
    // R√∫t g·ªçn s·ªë
    int sum = 0;
    int temp = number;
    
    while (temp > 0) {
      sum += temp % 10;
      temp ~/= 10;
    }
    
    // Ki·ªÉm tra Master Numbers sau r√∫t g·ªçn
    if (sum == 11 || sum == 22 || sum == 33) {
      return sum;
    }
    
    // Ti·∫øp t·ª•c r√∫t g·ªçn n·∫øu c·∫ßn
    if (sum > 9) {
      return _reduceToMasterOrSingle(sum);
    }
    
    return sum;
  }

  static int _calculateCurrentAge(NumerologyInputModel input) {
    final now = DateTime.now();
    final birthDate = input.birthDate!;
    return now.year - birthDate.year;
  }

  static String _getCalculationText(int factorId, NumerologyInputModel? input) {
    if (input == null) return '';
    
    switch (factorId) {
      case 1: // Life Path
        if (input.birthDate != null) {
          return _getLifePathCalculationExplanation(input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      case 2: // Birth Chart
        if (input.birthDate != null) {
          return _getBirthChartCalculationExplanation(input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      case 3: // Arrows Personality
        if (input.birthDate != null) {
          return _getArrowsCalculationExplanation(input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      case 4: // Expression Number
        if (input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getExpressionNumberCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!);
        }
        return '';
      case 5: // Soul Urge
        if (input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getSoulUrgeCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!);
        }
        return '';
      case 6: // Personality
        if (input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getPersonalityCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!);
        }
        return '';
      case 7: // Personal Year

        return '';
      case 9: // Birth Day Number
        if (input.birthDate != null) {

        }
        return '';
      case 10: // Maturity Number
        if (input.birthDate != null && input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getMaturityNumberCalculationExplanation(input.birthDate!, input.fullName!);
        }
        return '';
      case 11: // Hidden Passion
        if (input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          // Calculate Life Path for tie-breaking priority
          int? lifePathNumber;
          if (input.birthDate != null) {

          }
          return _getHiddenPassionCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!, lifePathNumber);
        }
        return '';
      case 12: // Missing Numbers

        }
        return '';
      case 13: // Karmic Debt
        if (input.birthDate != null && input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getKarmicDebtCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!, input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      case 14: // Attitude Number
        if (input.birthDate != null && input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getAttitudeNumberCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!, input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      case 15: // Innate Abilities
        if (input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getInnateAbilitiesCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!);
        }
        return '';
      case 16: // Life Pinnacles
        if (input.birthDate != null && input.fullName != null && input.fullName!.isNotEmpty) {
          return _getLifePinnaclesCalculationExplanation(input.fullName!, input.birthDate!);
        }
        return '';
      default:
        return 'Ph√©p t√≠nh d·ª±a tr√™n th√¥ng tin c√° nh√¢n c·ªßa b·∫°n.';
    }
  }

  /// Get Life Path calculation explanation - matching design format exactly
  static String _getLifePathCalculationExplanation(DateTime birthDate) {
    final day = birthDate.day;
    final month = birthDate.month;
    final year = birthDate.year;
    
    // Format birth date with leading zeros
    final formattedDate = "${day.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${month.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/$year";
    
    // Get all digits with proper leading zeros
    final allDigits = <int>[];
    allDigits.addAll(day.toString().padLeft(2, '0').split('').map(int.parse));
    allDigits.addAll(month.toString().padLeft(2, '0').split('').map(int.parse));
    allDigits.addAll(year.toString().split('').map(int.parse));
    
    // Calculate sum
    final sum = allDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    
    // Build explanation - single line format matching design
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    buffer.write('B·∫°n sinh ng√†y $formattedDate. Ta t√°ch ra v√† c·ªông nh∆∞ sau: ');
    buffer.write('${allDigits.join(' + ')} = $sum');
    
    // Handle reduction if needed - using Master Number check
    if (sum > 9 && ![11, 22, 33].contains(sum)) {
      final sumDigits = sum.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
      // Reverse order to match design: [1, 3] becomes [3, 1] 
      final reversedDigits = sumDigits.reversed.toList();
      
      // Calculate final result
      int finalNumber = sum;
      while (finalNumber > 9 && ![11, 22, 33].contains(finalNumber)) {
        final digits = finalNumber.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
        finalNumber = digits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
      }
      
      buffer.write(' ‚Üí R√∫t g·ªçn: ${reversedDigits.join(' + ')} = $finalNumber');
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }

  /// Get Expression Number calculation explanation - balanced version
  static String _getExpressionNumberCalculationExplanation(String fullName) {
    try {
      final normalized = VietnameseTextNormalizer.normalizeToUppercase(fullName);
      final result = ExpressionNumberCalculator.calculate(fullName);
      final letters = result.calculation.letterValues.where((lv) => !lv.isSpace).toList();
      
      if (letters.isEmpty) {
        return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n S·ªë t√™n t·ª´: $fullName';
      }
      
      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      // Format theo design: T√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n **NGUYEN VAN AN** (t√™n ƒë∆∞·ª£c bold)
      buffer.write('T√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n **$normalized**\n');
      
      // Hi·ªÉn th·ªã c√°c ch·ªØ c√°i v√† gi√° tr·ªã: N=5, G=7, U=3...
      final letterValuePairs = <String>[];
      for (final letter in letters) {
        letterValuePairs.add('${letter.letter}=${letter.value}');
      }
      buffer.write(letterValuePairs.join(', '));
      buffer.write('\n');
      
      // T·ªïng ƒëi·ªÉm v·ªõi format: 5+7+3+7+5+5+4+1+5+1+5=48
      buffer.write('**T·ªïng ƒëi·ªÉm:** ');
      final values = letters.map((lv) => lv.value.toString()).toList();
      buffer.write(values.join('+'));
      
      final sum = letters.fold(0, (sum, lv) => sum + lv.value);
      buffer.write('=$sum');
      
      // R√∫t g·ªçn n·∫øu c·∫ßn
      if (sum > 9 && sum != 11 && sum != 22 && sum != 33) {
        int currentSum = sum;
        while (currentSum > 9 && currentSum != 11 && currentSum != 22 && currentSum != 33) {
          final digits = currentSum.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
          final nextSum = digits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
          buffer.write(' ‚Üí R√∫t g·ªçn: ${digits.join('+')}=$nextSum');
          currentSum = nextSum;
        }
      }
      
      buffer.write('\n‚Üí **S·ªë t√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n l√†:** ${result.calculation.finalValue}');
      
      return buffer.toString();
    } catch (e) {
      return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n S·ªë t√™n t·ª´: $fullName';
    }
  }

  /// Get Personality calculation explanation - balanced version
  static String _getPersonalityCalculationExplanation(String fullName) {
    try {
      final consonants = PersonalityCalculator.extractConsonants(fullName);
      final activeConsonants = consonants.where((c) => !c.isSpace).toList();
      
      if (activeConsonants.isEmpty) {

      }
      
      final result = PersonalityCalculator.calculate(fullName);

      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      buffer.write('T√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n **$fullName**\n');
      buffer.write('Ph·ª• √¢m l√†: ');
      
      // Hi·ªÉn th·ªã c√°c ph·ª• √¢m

          buffer.write(sumParts);
