```dart
  /// Get Personal Year calculation explanation - balanced version with proper markdown
  static String _getPersonalYearCalculationExplanation(DateTime birthDate) {
    try {
      final currentYear = DateTime.now().year;
      final result = PersonalYearCalculator.calculate(birthDate, currentYear: currentYear);
      
      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      // Format date with leading zeros
      final dayStr = birthDate.day.toString().padLeft(2, '0');
      final monthStr = birthDate.month.toString().padLeft(2, '0');
      
      buffer.write('**Ng√†y sinh:** $dayStr/$monthStr\n');
      buffer.write('**NƒÉm hi·ªán t·∫°i:** $currentYear\n');
      buffer.write('**T√≠nh:**\n');
      
      // Hi·ªÉn th·ªã c√°ch t√≠nh chi ti·∫øt cho t·ª´ng ph·∫ßn
      // Day calculation
      if (birthDate.day < 10) {
        buffer.write('Ng√†y: ${birthDate.day} = ${result.calculation.daySum}\n');
      } else {
        final dayDigits = birthDate.day.toString().split('').join(' + ');
        buffer.write('Ng√†y: $dayDigits = ${result.calculation.daySum}\n');
      }
      
      // Month calculation  
      if (birthDate.month < 10) {
        buffer.write('Th√°ng: ${birthDate.month} = ${result.calculation.monthSum}\n');
      } else {
        final monthDigits = birthDate.month.toString().split('').join(' + ');
        buffer.write('Th√°ng: $monthDigits = ${result.calculation.monthSum}\n');
      }
      
      // Year calculation
      final yearDigits = currentYear.toString().split('').join(' + ');
      buffer.write('NƒÉm: $yearDigits = ${result.calculation.yearSum}\n');
      
      // Total calculation
      buffer.write('üëâ **T·ªïng:** ${result.calculation.daySum} + ${result.calculation.monthSum} + ${result.calculation.yearSum} = ${result.calculation.totalSum}');
      
      // R√∫t g·ªçn n·∫øu c·∫ßn
      if (result.calculation.totalSum != result.calculation.finalValue) {
        final reductionSteps = _getReductionSteps(result.calculation.totalSum, result.calculation.finalValue);
        buffer.write(' ‚Üí $reductionSteps');
      }
      
      buffer.write('\n**NƒÉm c√° nh√¢n c·ªßa b·∫°n:** ${result.calculation.finalValue}');
      
      return buffer.toString();
    } catch (e) {
      return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n NƒÉm C√° Nh√¢n t·ª´ ng√†y sinh: ${birthDate.day}/${birthDate.month}/${birthDate.year}';
    }
  }
  
  /// Helper to format reduction steps  
  static String _getReductionSteps(int total, int finalValue) {
    if (total <= 9) return finalValue.toString();
    
    final digits = total.toString().split('').join(' + ');
    return '$digits = $finalValue';
  }

  /// Get Nine Year Cycle calculation explanation - theo design m·ªõi
  static String _getNineYearCycleCalculationExplanation(DateTime birthDate) {
    try {
      final currentYear = DateTime.now().year;
      final day = birthDate.day;
      final month = birthDate.month;
      
      // Format ng√†y th√°ng v·ªõi leading zeros
      final dayStr = day.toString().padLeft(2, '0');
      final monthStr = month.toString().padLeft(2, '0');
      
      // T√°ch c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë c·ªßa nƒÉm hi·ªán t·∫°i
      final yearDigits = currentYear.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
      final yearSum = yearDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
      
      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      
      // Format theo design
      buffer.write('**Ng√†y sinh:** $dayStr/$monthStr\n');
      buffer.write('**NƒÉm hi·ªán t·∫°i:** $currentYear\n\n');
      
      buffer.write('**T√≠nh:**\n');
      
      // Ng√†y - Lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫°ng c·ªông c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë (gi·ªëng design)
      final dayDigits = dayStr.split('').map(int.parse).toList();
      if (dayDigits.length == 2) {
        final daySum = dayDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
        buffer.write('Ng√†y: ${dayDigits.join(' + ')} = $daySum\n');
      } else {
        buffer.write('Ng√†y: $day\n');
      }
      
      // Th√°ng - Lu√¥n hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·∫°ng c·ªông c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë (gi·ªëng design)
      final monthDigits = monthStr.split('').map(int.parse).toList();
      if (monthDigits.length == 2) {
        final monthSum = monthDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
        buffer.write('Th√°ng: ${monthDigits.join(' + ')} = $monthSum\n');
      } else {
        buffer.write('Th√°ng: $month\n');
      }
      
      // NƒÉm
      buffer.write('NƒÉm: ${yearDigits.join(' + ')} = $yearSum\n\n');
      
      // T√≠nh gi√° tr·ªã th·ª±c cho ng√†y v√† th√°ng (ƒë√£ r√∫t g·ªçn)
      final dayValue = dayDigits.length == 2 ? dayDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b) : day;
      final monthValue = monthDigits.length == 2 ? monthDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b) : month;
      
      // T√≠nh t·ªïng cu·ªëi c√πng
      final finalSum = dayValue + monthValue + yearSum;
      
      // R√∫t g·ªçn t·ªïng v·ªÅ 1-9
      int personalYear = finalSum;
      String reductionSteps = '';
      
      while (personalYear > 9) {
        final digits = personalYear.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
        final newSum = digits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
        reductionSteps += ' ‚Üí ${digits.join(' + ')} = $newSum';
        personalYear = newSum;
      }
      
      buffer.write('üëâ **T·ªïng:** $dayValue + $monthValue + $yearSum = $finalSum');
      if (reductionSteps.isNotEmpty) {
        buffer.write(reductionSteps);
      }
      buffer.write('\n\n');
      
      buffer.write('**NƒÉm c√° nh√¢n c·ªßa b·∫°n:** $personalYear');
      
      return buffer.toString();
    } catch (e) {
      return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n Chu k·ª≥ 9 nƒÉm t·ª´ ng√†y sinh: ${birthDate.day}/${birthDate.month}/${birthDate.year}';
    }
  }

  static String _getMaturityNumberCalculationExplanation(DateTime birthDate, String fullName) {

  /// Get Hidden Passion calculation explanation - balanced version
  static String _getHiddenPassionCalculationExplanation(String fullName, int? lifePathNumber) {
    try {
      // Calculate with Life Path for proper tie-breaking
      final result = HiddenPassionCalculator.calculate(fullName, lifePathNumber: lifePathNumber);
      final calculation = result.calculation;
      
      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      
      // Format theo design m·ªõi
      buffer.write('T√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n **$fullName**\n');
      buffer.write('Chuy·ªÉn t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i trong t√™n ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß (t√™n khai sinh) sang s·ªë (theo b·∫£ng s·ªë h·ªçc Pythagoras):\n');
      
      // Show letter to number conversion for all letters
      final normalizedName = VietnameseTextNormalizer.normalize(fullName);
      final cleanName = normalizedName.toUpperCase().replaceAll(RegExp(r'[^A-Z]'), '');
      final letterNumbers = <String>[];
      for (int i = 0; i < cleanName.length; i++) {
        final letter = cleanName[i];
        final number = calculation.letterToNumberMap[letter] ?? 0;
        letterNumbers.add('$letter = $number');
      }
      buffer.write(letterNumbers.join(', '));
      
      // Check for ties
      if (result.hadTies) {
        buffer.write(' ‚Üí ');
        // Show tied numbers
        final tiedCounts = <String>[];
        for (final num in result.tiedValues) {
          final count = calculation.letterFrequency[num] ?? 0;
          tiedCounts.add('$count s·ªë $num');
        }
        buffer.write(tiedCounts.join(' v√† '));
        buffer.write(' xu·∫•t hi·ªán b·∫±ng nhau\n');
        
        // Show selection logic
        if (lifePathNumber != null && result.tiedValues.contains(lifePathNumber) && result.calculatedValue == lifePathNumber) {
          buffer.write('‚Üí Ch·ªçn s·ªë $lifePathNumber v√¨ tr√πng v·ªõi S·ªë Ch·ªß ƒê·∫°o (Life Path)\n');
        } else {
          buffer.write('‚Üí Ch·ªçn theo b·∫£ng "m·ª©c ƒë·ªô nƒÉng l∆∞·ª£ng ch·ªß ƒë·ªông": ');
          // Show priority order correctly (1 > 5 > 8 > 3 > 4 > 7 > 2 > 6 > 9)
          final priorityList = [1, 5, 8, 3, 4, 7, 2, 6, 9];
          final relevantPriorities = priorityList.where((n) => result.tiedValues.contains(n)).toList();
          buffer.write(relevantPriorities.join(' > '));
          buffer.write('\n');
        }
      } else {
        // Single highest frequency
        buffer.write(' ‚Üí S·ªë ${result.calculatedValue} xu·∫•t hi·ªán nhi·ªÅu nh·∫•t (${result.frequency} l·∫ßn)\n');
      }
      
      // Final result with markdown
      buffer.write('**‚Üí S·ªë ti·ªÅm nƒÉng c·ªßa b·∫°n: ${result.calculatedValue}**');
      
      return buffer.toString();
    } catch (e) {
      return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n S·ªë ti·ªÅm nƒÉng t·ª´ t√™n: $fullName';
    }
  }

  /// Get Innate Abilities calculation explanation - balanced version
  static String _getInnateAbilitiesCalculationExplanation(String fullName) {
    try {
      final result = InnateAbilitiesCalculator.calculate(fullName);
      final profile = result.profile;
      
      final buffer = StringBuffer();
      
      // Format theo design m·ªõi
      buffer.write('T√™n c·ªßa b·∫°n **$fullName**\n');
      buffer.write('Chuy·ªÉn t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i trong t√™n ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß (t√™n khai sinh) sang s·ªë (theo b·∫£ng s·ªë h·ªçc Pythagoras):\n');
      
      // Show letter to number conversion
      final normalizedName = VietnameseTextNormalizer.normalize(fullName);
      final cleanName = normalizedName.toUpperCase().replaceAll(RegExp(r'[^A-Z]'), '');
      final letterNumbers = <String>[];
      final letterMapping = <String, int>{
        'A': 1, 'J': 1, 'S': 1,
        'B': 2, 'K': 2, 'T': 2,
        'C': 3, 'L': 3, 'U': 3,
        'D': 4, 'M': 4, 'V': 4,
        'E': 5, 'N': 5, 'W': 5,
        'F': 6, 'O': 6, 'X': 6,
        'G': 7, 'P': 7, 'Y': 7,
        'H': 8, 'Q': 8, 'Z': 8,
        'I': 9, 'R': 9,
      };
      
      // Mapping ch·ªØ c√°i theo 4 nh√≥m nƒÉng l·ª±c ƒê√öNG (d·ª±a tr√™n b·∫£n ch·∫•t)
      final abilityGroups = {
        'th·ªÉ ch·∫•t': ['D', 'M', 'V'],
        'c·∫£m x√∫c': ['E', 'N', 'W'],
        'tr√≠ tu·ªá': ['A', 'J', 'S', 'B', 'K', 'T', 'C', 'L', 'U'],
        'tinh th·∫ßn': ['F', 'O', 'X', 'G', 'P', 'Y', 'H', 'Q', 'Z', 'I', 'R'],
      };
      
      final uniqueNumbers = <int>{};
      for (int i = 0; i < cleanName.length; i++) {
        final letter = cleanName[i];
        final number = letterMapping[letter] ?? 0;
        if (number > 0) {
          letterNumbers.add('$letter = $number');
          uniqueNumbers.add(number);
        }
      }
      
      buffer.write(letterNumbers.join(', '));
      buffer.write(' ‚Üí ');
      
      // Show unique numbers that appear
      final sortedNumbers = uniqueNumbers.toList()..sort();
      if (sortedNumbers.length > 1) {
        buffer.write('${sortedNumbers.join(' v√† ')} l√† c√°c s·ªë xu·∫•t hi·ªán\n');
      } else if (sortedNumbers.length == 1) {
        buffer.write('${sortedNumbers[0]} l√† s·ªë xu·∫•t hi·ªán\n');
      } else {
        buffer.write('Kh√¥ng c√≥ s·ªë n√†o xu·∫•t hi·ªán\n');
      }
      
      // Show ability classification v·ªõi format ng·∫Øn g·ªçn
      buffer.write('‚Üí ');
      
      // ƒê·∫øm s·ªë l·∫ßn xu·∫•t hi·ªán c·ªßa t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i theo nh√≥m nƒÉng l·ª±c
      final letterCountByGroup = <String, Map<String, int>>{};
      for (final entry in abilityGroups.entries) {
        letterCountByGroup[entry.key] = {};
      }
      
      // ƒê·∫øm t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i
      for (int i = 0; i < cleanName.length; i++) {
        final letter = cleanName[i];
        
        // T√¨m nh√≥m nƒÉng l·ª±c c·ªßa ch·ªØ c√°i n√†y
        for (final entry in abilityGroups.entries) {
          if (entry.value.contains(letter)) {
            final group = entry.key;
            letterCountByGroup[group]![letter] = (letterCountByGroup[group]![letter] ?? 0) + 1;
            break;
          }
        }
      }
      
      // Format output theo nh√≥m
      final groupDescriptions = <String>[];
      final groupOrder = ['th·ªÉ ch·∫•t', 'c·∫£m x√∫c', 'tr√≠ tu·ªá', 'tinh th·∫ßn'];
      
      for (final group in groupOrder) {
        final letters = letterCountByGroup[group]!;
        if (letters.isNotEmpty) {
          // Sort letters alphabetically
          final sortedLetters = letters.keys.toList()..sort();
          final letterList = sortedLetters.map((letter) => '$letter(${letters[letter]})').join(', ');
          groupDescriptions.add('$letterList thu·ªôc $group');
        }
      }
      
      // Show all descriptions
      if (groupDescriptions.isNotEmpty) {
        buffer.write(groupDescriptions.join('; '));
        buffer.write('.');
      }
      
      return buffer.toString();
    } catch (e) {
      return 'Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t√≠nh to√°n 4 NƒÉng l·ª±c b·∫©m sinh t·ª´ t√™n: $fullName';
    }
  }

  /// Get Personal Year interpretation t·ª´ PersonalYearInterpretations data

  static List<TabData> _getTabsData(int factorId, NumerologyResult? result) {
    switch (factorId) {
      case 3: // Arrows Personality - Extract from sections since ArrowsResult is converted
        if (result?.sections != null && result!.sections!.isNotEmpty) {
          // Extract present and missing arrows from sections (with null safety)
          final presentSections = result.sections!.where((s) => s.title?.contains('‚úÖ') == true).toList();
          final missingSections = result.sections!.where((s) => s.title?.contains('‚ùå') == true || s.title?.contains('Thi·∫øu') == true).toList();
          
          // Build present arrows content
          final presentBuffer = StringBuffer();
          if (presentSections.isNotEmpty) {
            presentBuffer.write('**B·∫°n c√≥ ${presentSections.length} m≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh:**\n\n');
            for (int i = 0; i < presentSections.length; i++) {
              final section = presentSections[i];
              final arrowName = (section.title ?? '').replaceFirst('‚úÖ ', '');
              presentBuffer.write('**${i + 1}. $arrowName**\n\n');
              presentBuffer.write('${section.content ?? ''}\n\n');
              if (i < presentSections.length - 1) {
                presentBuffer.write('---\n\n');
              }
            }
          } else {
            presentBuffer.write('B·∫°n hi·ªán ch∆∞a c√≥ m≈©i t√™n n√†o ho√†n ch·ªânh trong bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ng√†y sinh.\n\n');
            presentBuffer.write('ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y c√≥ nghƒ©a l√† trong ng√†y sinh c·ªßa b·∫°n, kh√¥ng c√≥ nh√≥m 3 s·ªë n√†o (theo h√†ng, c·ªôt, ch√©o) xu·∫•t hi·ªán ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß.');
          }
          
          // Build missing arrows content  
          final missingBuffer = StringBuffer();
          if (missingSections.isNotEmpty) {
            missingBuffer.write('**B·∫°n thi·∫øu ${missingSections.length} m≈©i t√™n:**\n\n');
            for (int i = 0; i < missingSections.length; i++) {
              final section = missingSections[i];
              final arrowName = (section.title ?? '').replaceFirst('‚ùå Thi·∫øu ', '').replaceFirst('‚ùå ', '');
              missingBuffer.write('**${i + 1}. $arrowName**\n\n');
              missingBuffer.write('${section.content ?? ''}\n\n');
              if (i < missingSections.length - 1) {
                missingBuffer.write('---\n\n');
              }
            }
          } else {
            missingBuffer.write('Ch√∫c m·ª´ng! B·∫°n c√≥ ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß t·∫•t c·∫£ 8 m≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh.\n\n');
            missingBuffer.write('ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y r·∫•t hi·∫øm g·∫∑p v√† cho th·∫•y s·ª± c√¢n b·∫±ng ho√†n h·∫£o trong t√≠nh c√°ch.');
          }
          
          return [
            // Tab 1: M≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh
            TabData(
              title: 'M≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh',
              content: presentSections.isEmpty ? 'B·∫°n hi·ªán ch∆∞a c√≥ m≈©i t√™n n√†o ho√†n ch·ªânh trong bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ng√†y sinh.' : '',
              hasPlaceholder: presentSections.isEmpty,
              sections: presentSections.isNotEmpty ? presentSections : null,
            ),
            
            // Tab 2: M≈©i t√™n thi·∫øu h·ª•t
            TabData(
              title: 'M≈©i t√™n thi·∫øu h·ª•t',
              content: missingSections.isEmpty ? 'Ch√∫c m·ª´ng! B·∫°n c√≥ ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß t·∫•t c·∫£ 8 m≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh.' : '',
              hasPlaceholder: missingSections.isEmpty,
              sections: missingSections.isNotEmpty ? missingSections : null,
            ),
          ];
        }
        // Fallback if result is not ArrowsResult
        return [
          const TabData(
            title: 'M≈©i t√™n c√° t√≠nh',
            content: 'C√°c m≈©i t√™n hi·ªán c√≥ trong bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì c·ªßa b·∫°n',
            hasPlaceholder: true,
          ),
          const TabData(
            title: 'M≈©i t√™n thi·∫øu h·ª•t',
            content: 'C√°c m≈©i t√™n b·ªã thi·∫øu trong bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì c·ªßa b·∫°n',
            hasPlaceholder: true,
          ),
        ];
      
      case 13: // Karmic Debt - Generate tab for each karmic debt
        if (result != null) {
          // Try to extract KarmicDebtResult from the result
          final karmicResult = _extractKarmicDebtResult(result);
          
          if (karmicResult != null && karmicResult.karmicDebts.length > 1) {
            final debts = karmicResult.karmicDebts;
            // Multiple karmic debts - create tab for each
            return debts.map((debt) {
              final interpretation = KarmicDebtInterpretations.getInterpretation(debt);
              
              // Create sections for this specific debt
              final sections = [
                NumerologySection(
                  title: 'ƒê·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm n·ªïi b·∫≠t',
                  content: interpretation['prominentCharacteristics'] ?? '',
                ),
                NumerologySection(
                  title: 'D·∫•u hi·ªáu ph·ªï bi·∫øn',
                  content: interpretation['commonSigns'] ?? '',
                ),
                NumerologySection(
                  title: 'B√†i h·ªçc ch√≠nh',
                  content: interpretation['mainLesson'] ?? '',
                ),
                NumerologySection(
                  title: 'Ph·∫ßn th∆∞·ªüng',
                  content: interpretation['rewards'] ?? '',
                ),
              ];
              
              return TabData(
                title: 'Nghi·ªáp qu·∫£\n${debt.title.replaceFirst('Nghi·ªáp Qu·∫£ ', '').split(' - ')[0]}', // e.g., "Nghi·ªáp qu·∫£\n13/4" - Force 2 lines
                content: '',
                sections: sections,
              );
            }).toList();
          }
        }
        return [];
        
      default:
        return [];
    }
  }

        'development': 'PH√ÅT TRI·ªÇN B·∫¢N TH√ÇN ‚Äì S·ª®C M·∫†NH N·ªòI T·∫†I V√Ä TR√ÅCH NHI·ªÜM',
      },
      9: {

        'love': 'T√åNH C·∫¢M ‚Äì THA TH·ª® V√Ä K·∫æT TH√öC',
        'development': 'PH√ÅT TRI·ªÇN B·∫¢N TH√ÇN ‚Äì CHUY·ªÇN H√ìA V√Ä TR∆Ø·ªûNG TH√ÄNH',
      },
    };
    
    return titles[yearNumber]?[section] ?? '${section.toUpperCase()}';
  }
  
  /// Format Personal Year content with * marker support
  /// Lines wrapped with * markers will not have bullets added
  /// Example: *This line won't have bullet*
  static String _formatPersonalYearContent(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    final lines = content.split('\n');
    final formattedLines = <String>[];
    
    // Headers that should be bold
    const relationshipHeaders = ['Ng∆∞·ªùi ƒë·ªôc th√¢n:', 'ƒêang trong m·ªëi quan h·ªá:', 'ƒêang y√™u ho·∫∑c k·∫øt h√¥n:'];
    // Special patterns that shouldn't have bullets
    final specialPatternRegex = RegExp(r'^(Ch√∫ √Ω:|‚ö†Ô∏è|üí¨|üîÅ|üìå|üí°)');
    
    for (final line in lines) {
      final trimmedLine = line.trim();
      
      if (trimmedLine.isEmpty) {
        formattedLines.add('');
        continue;
      }
      
      // Lines with * markers: remove markers and don't add bullet
      if (trimmedLine.startsWith('*') && trimmedLine.endsWith('*')) {
        var unmarked = trimmedLine.substring(1, trimmedLine.length - 1);
        // Make headers (ending with :) bold
        if (unmarked.endsWith(':')) {
          formattedLines.add('**$unmarked**');
        } else {
          formattedLines.add(unmarked);
        }
        continue;
      }
      
      // Special handling for "B·∫°n n√™n:" followed by text on same line
      if (trimmedLine.startsWith('B·∫°n n√™n:')) {
        final parts = trimmedLine.split('B·∫°n n√™n:');
        if (parts.length == 2 && parts[1].trim().isNotEmpty) {
          // Split into header and content
          formattedLines.add('**B·∫°n n√™n:**');
          formattedLines.add('‚Ä¢ ${parts[1].trim()}');
          continue;
        }
      }
      
      // Check if line starts with special patterns that shouldn't be bulleted
      if (specialPatternRegex.hasMatch(trimmedLine)) {
        formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
        continue;
      }
      
      // Headers ending with ':' should be bold
      if (trimmedLine.endsWith(':')) {
        // Check if it's a known relationship header
        bool isRelationshipHeader = relationshipHeaders.any((h) => trimmedLine == h);
        // Check if it's other special headers that should be bold
        bool isSpecialHeader = trimmedLine == 'NƒÉm nay r·∫•t th√≠ch h·ª£p ƒë·ªÉ:' || 
                               trimmedLine.contains('B·∫°n s·∫Ω th·∫•y m√¨nh c√≥ c·∫£m h·ª©ng ƒë·ªÉ:');
        
        if (isRelationshipHeader || isSpecialHeader) {
          formattedLines.add('**$trimmedLine**');
        } else {
          formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
        }
        continue;
      }
      
      // Default: Add bullet to normal lines
      if (!trimmedLine.startsWith('‚Ä¢')) {
        formattedLines.add('‚Ä¢ $trimmedLine');
      } else {
        formattedLines.add(trimmedLine); // Already has bullet
      }
    }
    
    return formattedLines.join('\n');
  }
  

  /// Format content with marking system for precise layout control
  /// Markers:
  /// - No marker: Add bullet point (‚Ä¢) and auto-bold text before ':'
  /// - * (single asterisk at start): Skip formatting for that item only
  /// - ** (double asterisk): Keep as markdown bold
  /// - ~ (tilde): Indented paragraph, no bullet  
  /// - ^ (caret): Emphasized conclusion with spacing
  static String _formatContentWithMarkers(List<String> items) {
    if (items.isEmpty) return '';
    
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
      var item = items[i].trim();
      
      if (item.isEmpty) {
        // Keep empty lines for spacing
        buffer.write('\n');
        continue;
      }
      
      // Process the content
      String processedContent = item;
      bool shouldAddBullet = true;
      
      // Check for markers first
      if (item.startsWith('**')) {
        // Bold header - keep as is for markdown
        processedContent = item;
        shouldAddBullet = false;
      }
      else if (item.startsWith('^')) {
        // Emphasized conclusion with extra spacing
        if (i > 0) buffer.write('\n'); // Extra line before
        processedContent = item.substring(1).trim();
        shouldAddBullet = false;
      }
      else if (item.startsWith('*') && !item.startsWith('**')) {
        // Plain paragraph, remove marker
        processedContent = item.substring(1).trim();
        shouldAddBullet = false;
        
        // Special handling for multi-line content with colon
        if (processedContent.contains(':\n')) {
          // Split by lines
          final lines = processedContent.split('\n');
          final processedLines = <String>[];
          bool afterColon = false;
          
          for (var line in lines) {
            if (!afterColon && line.endsWith(':')) {
              // Bold the line ending with colon
              processedLines.add('**$line**');
              afterColon = true;
            } else if (afterColon && line.trim().isNotEmpty) {
              // Add bullet to lines after colon
              processedLines.add('‚Ä¢ $line');
            } else {
              processedLines.add(line);
            }
          }
          processedContent = processedLines.join('\n');
        }
      }
      else if (item.startsWith('~')) {
        // Indented paragraph
        processedContent = '    ${item.substring(1).trim()}';
        shouldAddBullet = false;
      }
      
      // Auto-bold text before ':' (if not already processed)
      if (processedContent.contains(':') && !processedContent.contains('**')) {
        final colonIndex = processedContent.indexOf(':');
        if (colonIndex > 0) {
          final beforeColon = processedContent.substring(0, colonIndex + 1);
          final afterColon = processedContent.substring(colonIndex + 1);
          processedContent = '**$beforeColon**$afterColon';
        }
      }
      
      // Add bullet if needed
      if (shouldAddBullet) {
        buffer.write('‚Ä¢ $processedContent');
      } else {
        buffer.write(processedContent);
      }
      
      // Add spacing between items
      if (i < items.length - 1 && !items[i + 1].isEmpty) {
        buffer.write('\n\n');
      }
    }
    
    return buffer.toString();
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Main model for the 9-Year Cycle calculation
class NineYearCycleModel {
  final DateTime birthDate;
  final int currentYear;
  final int personalYearNumber;
  final int cycleStartYear; // Year when Phase 1 began
  final List<CycleYear> cycleYears;
  final NineYearPhase currentPhase;
  final int cycleNumber; // Which cycle this person is in (1st, 2nd, etc.)

  const NineYearCycleModel({
    required this.birthDate,
    required this.currentYear,
    required this.personalYearNumber,
    required this.cycleStartYear,
    required this.cycleYears,
    required this.currentPhase,
    required this.cycleNumber,
  });

  Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => {
    'birthDate': birthDate.toIso8601String(),
    'currentYear': currentYear,
    'personalYearNumber': personalYearNumber,
    'cycleStartYear': cycleStartYear,
    'cycleYears': cycleYears.map((year) => year.toJson()).toList(),
    'currentPhase': currentPhase.value,
    'cycleNumber': cycleNumber,
  };

  /// Get formatted birth date
  String get formattedBirthDate {
    return '${birthDate.day.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${birthDate.month.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${birthDate.year}';
  }

  /// Get the current cycle range as string
  String get cycleRangeString {
    final endYear = cycleStartYear + 8;
    return '$cycleStartYear - $endYear';
  }

  /// Get years remaining in current cycle
  int get yearsRemainingInCycle {
    final cycleEndYear = cycleStartYear + 8;
    return cycleEndYear - currentYear;
  }

  /// Check if current year is the last year of the cycle
  bool get isLastYearOfCycle {
    return currentPhase == NineYearPhase.year9;
  }

  /// Check if current year is the first year of the cycle
  bool get isFirstYearOfCycle {
    return currentPhase == NineYearPhase.year1;
  }

  /// Get the next phase
  NineYearPhase? get nextPhase {
    if (currentPhase == NineYearPhase.year9) {
      return NineYearPhase.year1; // Next cycle begins
    }
    
    final nextValue = currentPhase.value + 1;
    return NineYearPhase.fromValue(nextValue);
  }

  /// Get the previous phase
  NineYearPhase? get previousPhase {
    if (currentPhase == NineYearPhase.year1) {
      return NineYearPhase.year9; // Previous cycle
    }
    
    final previousValue = currentPhase.value - 1;
    return NineYearPhase.fromValue(previousValue);
  }

  /// Get calculation explanation
  String get calculationExplanation {
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    buffer.writeln('**C√°ch t√≠nh Chu k·ª≥ 9 nƒÉm:**');
    buffer.writeln();
    
    buffer.writeln('1. T√≠nh NƒÉm C√° Nh√¢n hi·ªán t·∫°i: **$personalYearNumber**');
    buffer.writeln('2. T√≠nh ng∆∞·ª£c v·ªÅ NƒÉm C√° Nh√¢n s·ªë 1: **$cycleStartYear**');
    buffer.writeln('3. X√°c ƒë·ªãnh v·ªã tr√≠ hi·ªán t·∫°i trong chu k·ª≥: **${currentPhase.title}**');
    buffer.writeln();
    
    buffer.writeln('**Chu k·ª≥ hi·ªán t·∫°i ($cycleNumber): $cycleRangeString**');
    
    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }
}
```

```dart
import 'dart:ui';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';

import '../../../utils/numerology_responsive.dart';
import '../controllers/nine_year_cycle_detail_controller.dart';
import '../../../../../config/assets_path.dart';

/// Header component for Nine Year Cycle Detail view
/// Follows the exact same structure as universal detail headers
class NineYearCycleDetailHeaderComponent extends StatelessWidget {
  const NineYearCycleDetailHeaderComponent({super.key});

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    final controller = Get.find<NineYearCycleDetailController>();

    return SliverAppBar(
      expandedHeight: 336.nh,
      floating: false,
      pinned: true,
      backgroundColor: const Color(0xFF020931), // Color when collapsed
      elevation: 0,
      surfaceTintColor: Colors.transparent,
      leading: Container(
        margin: EdgeInsets.only(left: 16.nw, top: 8.nh, bottom: 8.nh),
        child: GestureDetector(
          onTap: () => Navigator.of(context).pop(),
          child: Container(
            width: 40.nw,
            height: 40.nw,
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.3),
              shape: BoxShape.circle,
            ),
            child: ClipOval(
              child: BackdropFilter(
                filter: ImageFilter.blur(sigmaX: 18, sigmaY: 18),
                child: const Icon(
                  Icons.arrow_back_ios_rounded,
                  color: Colors.white,
                  size: 20,
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ),
        ),
      ),
      title: Text(
        controller.pageTitle,
        style: NumerologyTheme.detailHeaderTitle,
      ),
      centerTitle: true,
      flexibleSpace: LayoutBuilder(
        builder: (context, constraints) {
          // Calculate if AppBar is collapsed
          final isCollapsed = constraints.biggest.height <= kToolbarHeight + MediaQuery.of(context).padding.top;
          
          return Stack(
            fit: StackFit.expand,
            children: [
              // Background - only show when expanded
              if (!isCollapsed) ...[
                FlexibleSpaceBar(
                  background: Stack(
                    fit: StackFit.expand,
                    children: [
                      // Background
                      _buildHeaderBackground(),
                      // Content
                      Positioned(
                        top: 156.nh,
                        left: 0,
                        right: 0,
                        child: _buildHeaderContent(controller),
                      ),
                    ],
                  ),
                ),
              ],
              // Shadow overlay when collapsed
              if (isCollapsed)
                Positioned(
                  bottom: -1, // Move down 1px to only show shadow
                  left: 0,
                  right: 0,
                  child: Container(
                    height: 2, // Slightly taller for better shadow
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(
                      color: const Color(0xFF020931), // Match AppBar color
                      boxShadow: [
                        BoxShadow(
                          color: const Color(0xFFE9E9E9).withValues(alpha: 0.20), // Slightly less opacity for subtler effect
                          offset: const Offset(0, 1),
                          blurRadius: 2.0, // Slightly less blur for sharper shadow
                          spreadRadius: 0,
                        ),
                      ],
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
            ],
          );
        },
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildHeaderBackground() {
    return Stack(
      fit: StackFit.expand,
      children: [
        // Background image
        Image.asset(
          NumerologyPath.detailBackground,
          fit: BoxFit.cover,
          width: double.infinity,
          height: double.infinity,
          filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
        ),

        // Dark overlay gradient
        Container(
          decoration: const BoxDecoration(
            gradient: LinearGradient(
              begin: Alignment.topCenter,
              end: Alignment.bottomCenter,
              colors: [
                Colors.transparent,
                Color(0x40020931),
                Color(0xFF020931),
              ],
              stops: [0.0, 0.7, 1.0],
            ),
          ),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  Widget _buildHeaderContent(NineYearCycleDetailController controller) {
    return Center(
      child: Column(
        mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
        children: [
          // Circle with year number - using numberCircleOrdinary
          Stack(
            alignment: Alignment.center,
            children: [
              Image.asset(
                NumerologyPath.numberCircleOrdinary,
                width: 100.nw,
                height: 100.nw,
                fit: BoxFit.contain,
                filterQuality: FilterQuality.high,
              ),
              Transform.translate(
                offset: Offset(0, _getNumberOffset(controller.yearNumber)),
                child: Text(
                  controller.yearNumber.toString(),
                  style: NumerologyTheme.resultsMainNumber,
                ),
              ),
            ],
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  /// Dynamic offset for centering numbers 1-9 properly in 100.nw circle
  /// Using exact same logic as universal widgets with 1.5x scale for larger circle
  double _getNumberOffset(int number) {
    // Base offsets for 66.nw circle (from numerology_results_view.dart)
    double baseOffset;
    switch (number) {
      case 1:
        baseOffset = -9.nh;
        break; // Tall ascender
      case 2:
        baseOffset = -8.nh;
        break; // Slightly high baseline
      case 3:
        baseOffset = -8.nh;
        break; // Similar to 2
      case 4:
        baseOffset = -10.nh;
        break; // Tall ascender but shorter than 1
      case 5:
        baseOffset = -8.nh;
        break; // Mid-height
      case 6:
        baseOffset = -4.nh;
        break; // Heavy bottom, less negative
      case 7:
        baseOffset = -10.nh;
        break; // Tall but angled
      case 8:
        baseOffset = -3.nh;
        break; // BASELINE - perfect center
      case 9:
        baseOffset = -9.nh;
        break; // Similar to 1
      default:
        baseOffset = -8.nh;
        break; // Fallback
    }

    // Scale factor for 100.nw circle (100/66 = ~1.5)
    const scale = 1.5;
    return baseOffset * scale;
  }
}
```

### factors/nine_year_cycle/calculators/nine_year_cycle_calculator.dart

```dart
import '../models/nine_year_cycle_model.dart';
import '../models/nine_year_cycle_result.dart';
import '../data/nine_year_cycle_interpretations.dart';
import '../../personal_year/calculators/personal_year_calculator.dart';

/// Calculator for 9-Year Cycle analysis
class NineYearCycleCalculator {
  
  /// Calculate 9-Year Cycle from birth date and current year
  static NineYearCycleResult calculate(DateTime birthDate, {int? currentYear}) {
    // Use provided year or current year
    final year = currentYear ?? DateTime.now().year;
    
    // Step 1: Get the current Personal Year
    final personalYearResult = PersonalYearCalculator.calculate(birthDate, currentYear: year);
    final personalYearNumber = personalYearResult.calculation.finalValue;
    
    // Step 2: Calculate when Personal Year 1 occurred (start of current cycle)
    final cycleStartYear = year - (personalYearNumber - 1);
    
    // Step 3: Build the complete 9-year cycle
    final cycleYears = <CycleYear>[];
    for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
      final cycleYear = cycleStartYear + i;
      final phase = NineYearPhase.fromValue(i + 1)!;
      
      cycleYears.add(CycleYear(
        year: cycleYear,
        phase: phase,
        isCurrentYear: cycleYear == year,
        isPast: cycleYear < year,
        isFuture: cycleYear > year,
      ));
    }
    
    // Step 4: Determine current phase and cycle number
    final currentPhase = NineYearPhase.fromValue(personalYearNumber)!;
    final cycleNumber = _calculateCycleNumber(birthDate, cycleStartYear);
    
    // Step 5: Create calculation model
    final calculationModel = NineYearCycleModel(
      birthDate: birthDate,
      currentYear: year,
      personalYearNumber: personalYearNumber,
      cycleStartYear: cycleStartYear,
      cycleYears: cycleYears,
      currentPhase: currentPhase,
      cycleNumber: cycleNumber,
    );

    // Step 6: Get interpretation
    final interpretation = NineYearCycleInterpretations.getInterpretation(currentPhase);

    // Step 7: Create result
    return NineYearCycleResult(
      cycleModel: calculationModel,
      currentPhase: currentPhase,
      fullInterpretation: interpretation.overview,
      currentPhaseInterpretation: interpretation.detailedDescription,
      cycleOverview: interpretation.cycleContext,
      currentPhaseGuidance: interpretation.guidance,
      focusAreas: interpretation.focusAreas,
      cautions: interpretation.cautions,
      nextPhasePreparation: interpretation.nextPhasePreparation,
    );
  }

  /// Calculate for current year using current date
  static NineYearCycleResult calculateCurrent(DateTime birthDate) {
    return calculate(birthDate, currentYear: DateTime.now().year);
  }

  /// Calculate for specific year
  static NineYearCycleResult calculateForYear(DateTime birthDate, int year) {
    if (year < 1900 || year > 3000) {
      throw ArgumentError('NƒÉm kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá: $year');
    }
    return calculate(birthDate, currentYear: year);
  }

  /// Get multiple cycles (past, current, future)
  static List<NineYearCycleResult> calculateMultipleCycles(
    DateTime birthDate, 
    int numberOfCycles, 
    {int? fromYear}
  ) {
    final results = <NineYearCycleResult>[];
    final startYear = fromYear ?? DateTime.now().year;
    
    // Calculate the base cycle to determine cycle boundaries
    final baseResult = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: startYear);
    final baseCycleStart = baseResult.cycleModel.cycleStartYear;
    
    // Calculate multiple cycles
    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfCycles; i++) {
      // Each cycle is 9 years apart
      final cycleStartYear = baseCycleStart + (i * 9);
      final cycleMiddleYear = cycleStartYear + 4; // Use middle of cycle for calculation
      
      try {
        final result = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: cycleMiddleYear);
        results.add(result);
      } catch (e) {
        // Skip invalid cycles
        continue;
      }
    }
    
    return results;
  }

  /// Calculate which cycle number this is for the person
  static int _calculateCycleNumber(DateTime birthDate, int cycleStartYear) {
    // Calculate approximate age at cycle start
    final ageAtCycleStart = cycleStartYear - birthDate.year;
    
    // Each cycle is 9 years, so cycle number is roughly age / 9
    // Add 1 because we count cycles starting from 1
    return (ageAtCycleStart / 9).floor() + 1;
  }

  /// Get the year when a specific phase will occur
  static int getYearForPhase(DateTime birthDate, NineYearPhase targetPhase, {int? fromYear}) {
    final startYear = fromYear ?? DateTime.now().year;
    final result = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: startYear);
    
    // Calculate the year when the target phase occurs in current cycle
    final targetYear = result.cycleModel.cycleStartYear + (targetPhase.value - 1);
    
    // If target year is in the past, calculate for next cycle
    if (targetYear < startYear) {
      return targetYear + 9; // Next cycle
    }
    
    return targetYear;
  }

  /// Get timeline of phases for a given year range
  static Map<int, NineYearPhase> getPhaseTimeline(
    DateTime birthDate, 
    int startYear, 
    int endYear
  ) {
    final timeline = <int, NineYearPhase>{};
    
    for (int year = startYear; year <= endYear; year++) {
      try {
        final result = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: year);
        timeline[year] = result.currentPhase;
      } catch (e) {
        // Skip invalid years
        continue;
      }
    }
    
    return timeline;
  }

  /// Validate birth date for cycle calculation
  static bool canCalculate(DateTime birthDate) {
    try {
      final now = DateTime.now();
      // Birth date should not be in future and not too old
      return birthDate.isBefore(now) && 
             birthDate.year >= 1900 && 
             birthDate.year <= now.year;
    } catch (e) {
      return false;
    }
  }

  /// Get detailed cycle analysis for a specific year range
  static Map<String, dynamic> getCycleAnalysis(
    DateTime birthDate, 
    int analysisYear
  ) {
    final result = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: analysisYear);
    
    return {
      'year': analysisYear,
      'phase': result.currentPhase,
      'cycleNumber': result.cycleModel.cycleNumber,
      'cycleProgress': result.cycleProgressPercentage,
      'isFirstYear': result.cycleModel.isFirstYearOfCycle,
      'isLastYear': result.cycleModel.isLastYearOfCycle,
      'yearsRemaining': result.cycleModel.yearsRemainingInCycle,
      'keyFocus': result.currentPhaseEssence,
      'message': result.keyMessage,
    };
  }

  /// Get transition points (year 9 ‚Üí year 1) for planning
  static List<int> getTransitionYears(DateTime birthDate, int startYear, int numberOfTransitions) {
    final transitions = <int>[];
    
    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfTransitions; i++) {
      // Find next year 9 (end of cycle)
      int searchYear = startYear + (i * 9);
      
      // Find exact year when phase 9 occurs
      for (int year = searchYear; year < searchYear + 20; year++) {
        try {
          final result = calculate(birthDate, currentYear: year);
          if (result.currentPhase == NineYearPhase.year9) {
            transitions.add(year);
            break;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          continue;
        }
      }
    }
    
    return transitions;
  }

  /// Check if a given year is valid for calculation
  static bool isValidYear(int year) {
    return year >= 1900 && year <= 3000;
  }

  /// Get current year for display
  static int get currentYear => DateTime.now().year;
}
```

```dart
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../controllers/nine_year_cycle_detail_controller.dart';
import '../widgets/nine_year_cycle_detail_body_component.dart';
import '../components/nine_year_cycle_detail_header_component.dart';
import '../../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';

/// Nine Year Cycle Detail View 
/// Follows the exact same structure as UniversalFactorDetailView
class NineYearCycleDetailView extends StatefulWidget {
  const NineYearCycleDetailView({super.key});

  @override
  State<NineYearCycleDetailView> createState() => _NineYearCycleDetailViewState();
}

class _NineYearCycleDetailViewState extends State<NineYearCycleDetailView>
    with TickerProviderStateMixin {
  final ScrollController _scrollController = ScrollController();
  late AnimationController _headerAnimationController;
  final RxBool _isHeaderSticky = false.obs;
  late NineYearCycleDetailController controller;

  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    controller = Get.find<NineYearCycleDetailController>();
    
    _headerAnimationController = AnimationController(
      duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 200),
      vsync: this,
    );

    _scrollController.addListener(_onScroll);
  }

  @override
  void dispose() {
    _scrollController.removeListener(_onScroll);
    _scrollController.dispose();
    _headerAnimationController.dispose();
    super.dispose();
  }

  void _onScroll() {
    const threshold = 300.0; // Hero section height
    final shouldSticky = _scrollController.offset > threshold;

    if (shouldSticky != _isHeaderSticky.value) {
      _isHeaderSticky.value = shouldSticky;
      if (shouldSticky) {
        _headerAnimationController.forward();
      } else {
        _headerAnimationController.reverse();
      }
    }
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
      body: CustomScrollView(
        controller: _scrollController,
        slivers: [
          // Header component (SliverAppBar) - exactly like universal
          const NineYearCycleDetailHeaderComponent(),
          
          // Body component - wrapped in SliverToBoxAdapter like universal
          SliverToBoxAdapter(
            child: NineYearCycleDetailBodyComponent(
              yearNumber: controller.yearNumber,
              actualYear: controller.actualYear,
              yearPositionInCycle: controller.yearPositionInCycle,
            ),
          ),
          // No factor navigation bar for nine year cycle detail
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}
```

```dart
        'development': 'PH√ÅT TRI·ªÇN B·∫¢N TH√ÇN ‚Äì S·ª®C M·∫†NH N·ªòI T·∫†I V√Ä TR√ÅCH NHI·ªÜM',

        'development': 'PH√ÅT TRI·ªÇN B·∫¢N TH√ÇN ‚Äì CHUY·ªÇN H√ìA V√Ä TR∆Ø·ªûNG TH√ÄNH',
      },
    };
    
    return titles[yearNumber]?[section] ?? '${section.toUpperCase()}';
  }
  
  /// Format content with paragraph spacing (no bullets)
  String _formatWithParagraphSpacing(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    // Don't process if content has * markers (they should be handled separately)
    if (content.contains('*')) {
      return content;
    }
    
    // Replace single newlines with double newlines to create paragraph spacing
    // But preserve existing double newlines
    return content.replaceAll(RegExp(r'(?<!\n)\n(?!\n)'), '\n\n');
  }
  
  /// Format content with bullet points - same logic as Personal Year
  /// Lines wrapped with * markers will not have bullets added
  String _formatContentWithBullets(String content) {
    if (content.isEmpty) return content;
    
    final lines = content.split('\n');
    final formattedLines = <String>[];
    
    // Headers that should be bold
    const relationshipHeaders = ['Ng∆∞·ªùi ƒë·ªôc th√¢n:', 'ƒêang trong m·ªëi quan h·ªá:', 'ƒêang y√™u ho·∫∑c k·∫øt h√¥n:'];
    // Special patterns that shouldn't have bullets
    final specialPatternRegex = RegExp(r'^(Ch√∫ √Ω:|‚ö†Ô∏è|üí¨|üîÅ|üìå|üí°)');
    
    for (final line in lines) {
      final trimmedLine = line.trim();
      
      if (trimmedLine.isEmpty) {
        formattedLines.add('');
        continue;
      }
      
      // Lines with * markers: remove markers and don't add bullet
      if (trimmedLine.startsWith('*') && trimmedLine.endsWith('*')) {
        var unmarked = trimmedLine.substring(1, trimmedLine.length - 1);
        // Make headers (ending with :) bold
        if (unmarked.endsWith(':')) {
          formattedLines.add('**$unmarked**');
        } else {
          formattedLines.add(unmarked);
        }
        continue;
      }
      
      // Check if line starts with special patterns that shouldn't be bulleted
      if (specialPatternRegex.hasMatch(trimmedLine)) {
        formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
        continue;
      }
      
      // Headers ending with ':' should be bold
      if (trimmedLine.endsWith(':')) {
        // Check if it's a known relationship header
        bool isRelationshipHeader = relationshipHeaders.any((h) => trimmedLine == h);
        
        if (isRelationshipHeader) {
          formattedLines.add('**$trimmedLine**');
        } else {
          formattedLines.add(trimmedLine);
        }
        continue;
      }
      
      // Default: Add bullet to normal lines
      if (!trimmedLine.startsWith('‚Ä¢')) {
        formattedLines.add('‚Ä¢ $trimmedLine');
      } else {
        formattedLines.add(trimmedLine); // Already has bullet
      }
    }
    
    return formattedLines.join('\n');
  }
  
  /// Build expandable section matching universal detail style exactly
  Widget _buildUniversalExpandableSection(
    int index,
    String icon,
    String title,
    String content,
    RxBool isExpanded,
  ) {
    return Container(
      margin: const EdgeInsets.only(bottom: 1),
      child: Obx(() {
        final expanded = isExpanded.value;
        
        return Column(
          children: [
            // Header
            GestureDetector(
              onTap: () => isExpanded.toggle(),
              child: Container(
                constraints: const BoxConstraints(minHeight: 40),
                width: double.infinity,
                color: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionBackground,
                padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw, vertical: 8.nh),
                child: Row(
                  children: [
                    // Level Icon with number
                    SizedBox(
                      width: 24.nw,
                      height: 24.nw,
                      child: Stack(
                        alignment: Alignment.center,
                        children: [
                          Image.asset(
                            IconsPath.levelIcon,
                            width: 24.nw,
                            height: 24.nw,
                            fit: BoxFit.contain,
                          ),
                          Transform.translate(
                            offset: Offset(-3.nw, -5.nh),
                            child: Text(
                              icon,
                              style: NumerologyTheme.detailSectionNumber,
                            ),
                          ),
                        ],
                      ),

                    // Title
                    Expanded(

                        fit: BoxFit.contain,

                    ),

                ),

            ),
            
            // Content
            AnimatedContainer(

              height: expanded ? null : 0,
              child: expanded
                  ? Container(
                      width: double.infinity,
                      color: NumerologyTheme.detailBackground,
                      padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
                      child: MarkdownHelper.buildRichText(
                        content,
                        NumerologyTheme.detailSectionContent,
                      ),
                    )
                  : const SizedBox.shrink(),
            ),
          ],
        );
      }),
    );
  }
  
  /// Build opportunities and challenges content
  String _buildOpportunitiesChallengesContent() {
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    
    buffer.writeln('**C∆° h·ªôi l·ªõn nh·∫•t:**');
    buffer.writeln();
    for (final opp in interpretation.opportunities) {
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ $opp');
      buffer.writeln();
    }
    
    buffer.writeln('**Th·ª≠ th√°ch ti·ªÅm ·∫©n:**');
    buffer.writeln();
    for (final challenge in interpretation.challenges) {
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ $challenge');
      buffer.writeln();
    }
    
    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }

  // Implement required abstract methods from BaseBodyComponent
```

```dart
  List<FrequencyInterpretationModel> get balancedNumberInterpretations {

  String get primaryColor {

    for (var key in map1.keys) {
      if (map1[key] != map2[key]) return false;
    }
    return true;
  }
```

```dart
/// Model cho Bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ng√†y sinh (Birth Chart)
class BirthChartModel {
  final DateTime birthDate;
  final Map<int, int> numberFrequencies; // S·ªë 1-9 v√† t·∫ßn su·∫•t xu·∫•t hi·ªán
  final List<int> digitalSequence; // D√£y s·ªë g·ªëc t·ª´ ng√†y sinh
  final String chartDescription; // M√¥ t·∫£ t·ªïng quan
  
  const BirthChartModel({
    required this.birthDate,
    required this.numberFrequencies,
    required this.digitalSequence,
    required this.chartDescription,
  });

  /// L·∫•y t·∫ßn su·∫•t c·ªßa m·ªôt s·ªë c·ª• th·ªÉ
  int getFrequency(int number) {
    if (number < 1 || number > 9) return 0;
    return numberFrequencies[number] ?? 0;
  }

  /// Ki·ªÉm tra xem c√≥ s·ªë n√†o thi·∫øu kh√¥ng (t·∫ßn su·∫•t = 0)
  List<int> get missingNumbers {
    List<int> missing = [];
    for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {
      if (getFrequency(i) == 0) {
        missing.add(i);
      }
    }
    return missing;
  }

  /// L·∫•y nh·ªØng s·ªë xu·∫•t hi·ªán nhi·ªÅu nh·∫•t
  List<int> get dominantNumbers {
    if (numberFrequencies.isEmpty) return [];
    
    final maxFreq = numberFrequencies.values.reduce((a, b) => a > b ? a : b);
    return numberFrequencies.entries
        .where((entry) => entry.value == maxFreq && entry.value > 1)
        .map((entry) => entry.key)
        .toList()
        ..sort();
  }

  /// T·ªïng s·ªë ch·ªØ s·ªë trong ng√†y sinh
  int get totalDigits => digitalSequence.length;

  /// T·∫°o chu·ªói m√¥ t·∫£ ng·∫Øn g·ªçn v·ªÅ bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì
  String get summaryDescription {
    final missing = missingNumbers;
    final dominant = dominantNumbers;
    
    String summary = "Bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì t·ª´ ${digitalSequence.join('')}";
    
    if (missing.isNotEmpty) {
      summary += " | Thi·∫øu: ${missing.join(', ')}";
    }
    
    if (dominant.isNotEmpty) {
      summary += " | N·ªïi b·∫≠t: ${dominant.join(', ')}";
    }
    
    return summary;
  }

  @override
  String toString() {
    return 'BirthChartModel(birthDate: $birthDate, frequencies: $numberFrequencies, sequence: $digitalSequence)';
  }

  @override
  bool operator ==(Object other) {
    if (identical(this, other)) return true;
    return other is BirthChartModel &&
        other.birthDate == birthDate &&
        _mapEquals(other.numberFrequencies, numberFrequencies) &&
        _listEquals(other.digitalSequence, digitalSequence);
  }

  @override
  int get hashCode {
    return birthDate.hashCode ^
        numberFrequencies.hashCode ^
        digitalSequence.hashCode;
  }

  bool _mapEquals(Map<int, int> map1, Map<int, int> map2) {
    if (map1.length != map2.length) return false;
    for (var key in map1.keys) {
      if (map1[key] != map2[key]) return false;
    }
    return true;
  }

  bool _listEquals(List<int> list1, List<int> list2) {
    if (list1.length != list2.length) return false;
    for (int i = 0; i < list1.length; i++) {
      if (list1[i] != list2[i]) return false;
    }
    return true;
  }
}
```

```dart
import '../../../core/base_factor_calculator.dart';
import '../models/birth_chart_model.dart';
import '../models/birth_chart_result.dart';
import '../models/number_meaning_model.dart';
import '../data/birth_chart_interpretations.dart';

/// Calculator cho Bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ng√†y sinh
class BirthChartCalculator extends BaseFactorCalculator {
  
  /// T√≠nh to√°n bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ng√†y sinh t·ª´ ng√†y sinh
  /// Input: DateTime birthDate
  /// Output: BirthChartResult v·ªõi ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß th√¥ng tin v√† di·ªÖn gi·∫£i
  static BirthChartResult calculate(DateTime birthDate) {
    // B∆∞·ªõc 1: T√°ch c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë t·ª´ ng√†y sinh
    final digitalSequence = _extractDigitalSequence(birthDate);
    
    // B∆∞·ªõc 2: ƒê·∫øm t·∫ßn su·∫•t xu·∫•t hi·ªán c·ªßa t·ª´ng s·ªë 1-9
    final numberFrequencies = _countNumberFrequencies(digitalSequence);
    
    // B∆∞·ªõc 3: T·∫°o BirthChartModel
    final chart = BirthChartModel(
      birthDate: birthDate,
      numberFrequencies: numberFrequencies,
      digitalSequence: digitalSequence,
      chartDescription: _generateChartDescription(numberFrequencies),
    );
    
    // B∆∞·ªõc 4: L·∫•y di·ªÖn gi·∫£i cho t·ª´ng s·ªë d·ª±a tr√™n t·∫ßn su·∫•t
    final interpretations = <int, FrequencyInterpretationModel>{};
    for (int number = 1; number <= 9; number++) {
      final frequency = numberFrequencies[number] ?? 0;
      final interpretation = BirthChartInterpretations.getInterpretation(number, frequency);
      if (interpretation != null) {
        interpretations[number] = interpretation;
      }
    }
    
    // B∆∞·ªõc 5: T·∫°o nh·∫≠n ƒë·ªãnh t·ªïng quan
    final overallInsights = _generateOverallInsights(chart, interpretations);
    final strengths = _generateStrengths(interpretations);
    final challenges = _generateChallenges(interpretations);
    
    return BirthChartResult(
      chart: chart,
      interpretations: interpretations,
      overallInsights: overallInsights,
      strengths: strengths,
      challenges: challenges,
    );
  }

  /// T√°ch c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë t·ª´ ng√†y sinh th√†nh d√£y s·ªë
  /// V√≠ d·ª•: 25/12/1986 ‚Üí [2,5,1,2,1,9,8,6]
  static List<int> _extractDigitalSequence(DateTime birthDate) {
    List<int> digits = [];
    
    // Th√™m digits t·ª´ ng√†y
    String day = birthDate.day.toString();
    for (int i = 0; i < day.length; i++) {
      digits.add(int.parse(day[i]));
    }
    
    // Th√™m digits t·ª´ th√°ng
    String month = birthDate.month.toString();
    for (int i = 0; i < month.length; i++) {
      digits.add(int.parse(month[i]));
    }
    
    // Th√™m digits t·ª´ nƒÉm
    String year = birthDate.year.toString();
    for (int i = 0; i < year.length; i++) {

    // L·ªçc b·ªè s·ªë 0 (kh√¥ng t√≠nh trong bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì)
    return digits.where((digit) => digit != 0).toList();

  /// ƒê·∫øm t·∫ßn su·∫•t xu·∫•t hi·ªán c·ªßa t·ª´ng s·ªë 1-9
  static Map<int, int> _countNumberFrequencies(List<int> digitalSequence) {
    Map<int, int> frequencies = {};
    
    // Kh·ªüi t·∫°o t·∫ßn su·∫•t = 0 cho t·∫•t c·∫£ s·ªë 1-9
    for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {

    for (int digit in digitalSequence) {

  static String _generateChartDescription(Map<int, int> frequencies) {

    final missingCount = frequencies.values.where((freq) => freq == 0).length;
    final dominantCount = frequencies.values.where((freq) => freq >= 3).length;
    
    String description = "Bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì ch·ª©a $totalNumbers ch·ªØ s·ªë";
    
    if (missingCount > 0) {

    if (dominantCount > 0) {

    return description + ".";
  }

  /// T·∫°o nh·∫≠n ƒë·ªãnh t·ªïng quan t·ª´ bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì
  static List<String> _generateOverallInsights(
    BirthChartModel chart,
    Map<int, FrequencyInterpretationModel> interpretations,
  ) {
    List<String> insights = [];
    
    // Nh·∫≠n ƒë·ªãnh v·ªÅ t√≠nh c√¢n b·∫±ng
    final missing = chart.missingNumbers;
    final dominant = chart.dominantNumbers;
    
    if (missing.isEmpty && dominant.isEmpty) {

    } else if (missing.length > 3) {

    } else if (dominant.length > 2) {

    }
    
    // Nh·∫≠n ƒë·ªãnh v·ªÅ ƒë·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm n·ªïi b·∫≠t
    if (chart.getFrequency(1) >= 3) {

    }
    
    return insights;
  }

  /// T·∫°o danh s√°ch ƒëi·ªÉm m·∫°nh t·ª´ bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì
  static List<String> _generateStrengths(Map<int, FrequencyInterpretationModel> interpretations) {
    List<String> strengths = [];
    
    for (var interpretation in interpretations.values) {

    // Lo·∫°i b·ªè tr√πng l·∫∑p v√† gi·ªõi h·∫°n s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng
    return strengths.toSet().take(5).toList();

  static List<String> _generateChallenges(Map<int, FrequencyInterpretationModel> interpretations) {

  static bool isValidBirthDate(DateTime birthDate) {

  }

  }
```

```dart
import '../models/hidden_passion_model.dart';

/// Calculator for Hidden Passion Number (S·ªë Ti·ªÅm NƒÉng)
/// 
/// Finds the most frequently appearing number in a person's full name
/// using Pythagorean letter-to-number conversion
class HiddenPassionCalculator {
  
  /// Pythagorean letter to number mapping
  static const Map<String, int> _letterToNumberMap = {
    'A': 1, 'J': 1, 'S': 1,
    'B': 2, 'K': 2, 'T': 2,
    'C': 3, 'L': 3, 'U': 3,
    'D': 4, 'M': 4, 'V': 4,
    'E': 5, 'N': 5, 'W': 5,
    'F': 6, 'O': 6, 'X': 6,
    'G': 7, 'P': 7, 'Y': 7,
    'H': 8, 'Q': 8, 'Z': 8,
    'I': 9, 'R': 9,
  };

  /// Priority order for resolving ties (1 > 5 > 8 > 3 > 4 > 7 > 2 > 6 > 9)
  static const List<int> _priorityOrder = [1, 5, 8, 3, 4, 7, 2, 6, 9];

  /// Calculate the complete Hidden Passion result
  /// [lifePathNumber] - Optional Life Path number for tie-breaking priority
  static HiddenPassionResult calculate(String fullName, {int? lifePathNumber}) {
    if (fullName.isEmpty) {
      throw ArgumentError('T√™n kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªëng');
    }

    // First normalize Vietnamese text (remove diacritics)
    final normalizedName = VietnameseTextNormalizer.normalize(fullName);
    // Then clean name - only keep letters
    final cleanName = normalizedName.toUpperCase().replaceAll(RegExp(r'[^A-Z]'), '');
    
    if (cleanName.isEmpty) {
      throw ArgumentError('T√™n ph·∫£i ch·ª©a √≠t nh·∫•t m·ªôt ch·ªØ c√°i');
    }

    // Count frequency of each number
    final letterFrequency = <int, int>{};
    for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {
      letterFrequency[i] = 0;
    }

    // Convert each letter to number and count
    for (final letter in cleanName.split('')) {
      final number = _letterToNumberMap[letter];
      if (number != null) {
        letterFrequency[number] = (letterFrequency[number] ?? 0) + 1;
      }
    }

    // Find the maximum frequency
    final maxFrequency = letterFrequency.values.reduce((a, b) => a > b ? a : b);
    
    // Find all numbers with maximum frequency
    final numbersWithMaxFreq = letterFrequency.entries
        .where((entry) => entry.value == maxFrequency)
        .map((entry) => entry.key)
        .toList();

    // Determine the hidden passion number
    int hiddenPassionNumber;
    if (numbersWithMaxFreq.length == 1) {
      hiddenPassionNumber = numbersWithMaxFreq.first;
    } else {
      // Resolve ties: first check Life Path, then use priority order
      if (lifePathNumber != null && numbersWithMaxFreq.contains(lifePathNumber)) {
        hiddenPassionNumber = lifePathNumber;
      } else {
        hiddenPassionNumber = _resolveTies(numbersWithMaxFreq);
      }
    }

    // Create calculation explanation
    final calculationExplanation = _createCalculationExplanation(
      fullName, 
      cleanName, 
      letterFrequency, 
      hiddenPassionNumber, 
      maxFrequency, 
      numbersWithMaxFreq,
      lifePathNumber
    );

    // Create the calculation model
    final calculation = HiddenPassionModel(
      fullName: fullName,
      letterFrequency: letterFrequency,
      calculatedValue: hiddenPassionNumber,
      frequency: maxFrequency,
      tiedValues: numbersWithMaxFreq,
      letterToNumberMap: _letterToNumberMap,
      calculationExplanation: calculationExplanation,
    );

    // Get the corresponding HiddenPassion enum
    final hiddenPassion = HiddenPassion.fromValue(hiddenPassionNumber)!;

    return HiddenPassionResult(
      calculation: calculation,
      hiddenPassion: hiddenPassion,
    );
  }

  /// Calculate only the hidden passion number value

    return result.calculatedValue;
  }

  static Map<int, int> getLetterFrequency(String fullName) {
    final normalizedName = VietnameseTextNormalizer.normalize(fullName);

    final letterFrequency = <int, int>{};
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++) {

      final number = _letterToNumberMap[letter];
      if (number != null) {

      }
    }

  /// Resolve ties using priority order
  static int _resolveTies(List<int> tiedNumbers) {
    for (final priority in _priorityOrder) {

      // Check if chosen number matches Life Path

      } else {
```

```dart
@immutable
class InnateAbilitiesProfile {
  final String fullName;
  final List<InnateAbilityModel> abilities;
  final int totalLetters;
  final Map<String, int> allLetterFrequency;

  const InnateAbilitiesProfile({
    required this.fullName,
    required this.abilities,
    required this.totalLetters,
    required this.allLetterFrequency,
  });

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c theo lo·∫°i
  InnateAbilityModel getAbility(InnateAbility ability) {
    return abilities.firstWhere((a) => a.ability == ability);
  }

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c th·ªÉ ch·∫•t
  InnateAbilityModel get physicalAbility => getAbility(InnateAbility.physical);

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c c·∫£m x√∫c
  InnateAbilityModel get emotionalAbility => getAbility(InnateAbility.emotional);

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c tr√≠ tu·ªá
  InnateAbilityModel get mentalAbility => getAbility(InnateAbility.mental);

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c tinh th·∫ßn
  InnateAbilityModel get spiritualAbility => getAbility(InnateAbility.spiritual);

  /// L·∫•y c√°c nƒÉng l·ª±c m·∫°nh nh·∫•t
  List<InnateAbilityModel> get strongestAbilities {
    final sorted = List<InnateAbilityModel>.from(abilities)
      ..sort((a, b) => b.priority.compareTo(a.priority));
    return sorted.where((a) => a.isStrong).toList();
  }

  /// L·∫•y c√°c nƒÉng l·ª±c y·∫øu nh·∫•t
  List<InnateAbilityModel> get weakestAbilities {
    final sorted = List<InnateAbilityModel>.from(abilities)
      ..sort((a, b) => a.priority.compareTo(b.priority));
    return sorted.where((a) => a.isWeak).toList();
  }

  /// L·∫•y nƒÉng l·ª±c chi·∫øm ∆∞u th·∫ø
  InnateAbilityModel get dominantAbility {
    return abilities.reduce((a, b) => a.letterCount > b.letterCount ? a : b);
  }

  /// Ki·ªÉm tra c√¢n b·∫±ng
  bool get isBalanced {
    final counts = abilities.map((a) => a.letterCount).toList();
    final max = counts.reduce((a, b) => a > b ? a : b);
    final min = counts.reduce((a, b) => a < b ? a : b);
    return (max - min) <= 2; // Ch√™nh l·ªách kh√¥ng qu√° 2
  }

  /// L·∫•y ch·ªâ s·ªë c√¢n b·∫±ng (0-100)
  double get balanceIndex {
    final counts = abilities.map((a) => a.letterCount).toList();
    final mean = counts.reduce((a, b) => a + b) / counts.length;
    final variance = counts.map((count) => (count - mean) * (count - mean)).reduce((a, b) => a + b) / counts.length;
    return (1 / (1 + variance)) * 100; // Chuy·ªÉn th√†nh ch·ªâ s·ªë 0-100
  }

  /// L·∫•y t√≥m t·∫Øt ph√¢n b·ªë
  String get distributionSummary {
    final physical = physicalAbility.letterCount;
    final emotional = emotionalAbility.letterCount;
    final mental = mentalAbility.letterCount;
    final spiritual = spiritualAbility.letterCount;
    
    return 'Th·ªÉ ch·∫•t: $physical, C·∫£m x√∫c: $emotional, Tr√≠ tu·ªá: $mental, Tinh th·∫ßn: $spiritual';
  }

  /// T·∫°o copy v·ªõi th√¥ng tin m·ªõi
  InnateAbilitiesProfile copyWith({
    String? fullName,
    List<InnateAbilityModel>? abilities,
    int? totalLetters,
    Map<String, int>? allLetterFrequency,
  }) {
    return InnateAbilitiesProfile(
      fullName: fullName ?? this.fullName,
      abilities: abilities ?? this.abilities,
      totalLetters: totalLetters ?? this.totalLetters,
      allLetterFrequency: allLetterFrequency ?? this.allLetterFrequency,
    );
  }

  @override
  bool operator ==(Object other) {
    if (identical(this, other)) return true;
    return other is InnateAbilitiesProfile &&
        other.fullName == fullName &&
        listEquals(other.abilities, abilities) &&
        other.totalLetters == totalLetters &&
        mapEquals(other.allLetterFrequency, allLetterFrequency);
  }

  @override
  int get hashCode {
    return fullName.hashCode ^
        abilities.hashCode ^
        totalLetters.hashCode ^
        allLetterFrequency.hashCode;
  }

  @override
  String toString() {
    return 'InnateAbilitiesProfile(name: $fullName, total: $totalLetters, balance: ${balanceIndex.toStringAsFixed(1)}%)';
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Model cho qu√° tr√¨nh t√≠nh to√°n 4 nƒÉng l·ª±c b·∫©m sinh
@immutable
class InnateAbilitiesCalculation {
  final String fullName;
  final String normalizedName;
  final Map<String, int> letterFrequency;
  final Map<InnateAbility, List<String>> lettersByAbility;
  final Map<InnateAbility, int> countsByAbility;
  final int totalLetters;
  final List<String> unrecognizedLetters;

  const InnateAbilitiesCalculation({
    required this.fullName,
    required this.normalizedName,
    required this.letterFrequency,
    required this.lettersByAbility,
    required this.countsByAbility,
    required this.totalLetters,
    required this.unrecognizedLetters,
  });

  /// L·∫•y gi·∫£i th√≠ch t·ª´ng b∆∞·ªõc
  String get stepByStepExplanation {
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    buffer.writeln('C√ÅCH T√çNH 4 NƒÇNG L·ª∞C B·∫®M SINH (PLANE OF EXPRESSION):');
    buffer.writeln();
    
    buffer.writeln('H·ªç t√™n: $fullName');
    buffer.writeln('T√™n chu·∫©n h√≥a: $normalizedName');
    buffer.writeln('T·ªïng ch·ªØ c√°i: $totalLetters');
    buffer.writeln();

    buffer.writeln('PH√ÇN LO·∫†I CH·ªÆ C√ÅI THEO 4 NH√ìM:');
    buffer.writeln();

    for (final ability in InnateAbility.values) {
      final letters = lettersByAbility[ability] ?? [];
      final count = countsByAbility[ability] ?? 0;
      final level = AbilityLevel.fromCount(count);
      
      buffer.writeln('${ability.displayName.toUpperCase()} (${ability.englishName}):');
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ Nh√≥m ch·ªØ c√°i: ${ability.letters.join(', ')}');
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ Ch·ªØ c√°i t√¨m th·∫•y: ${letters.isEmpty ? "Kh√¥ng c√≥" : letters.join(', ')}');
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ S·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng: $count');
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ M·ª©c ƒë·ªô: ${level.displayName}');
      buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ T·ª∑ l·ªá: ${totalLetters > 0 ? (count / totalLetters * 100).toStringAsFixed(1) : 0}%');
      buffer.writeln();
    }

    if (unrecognizedLetters.isNotEmpty) {
      buffer.writeln('CH·ªÆ C√ÅI KH√îNG NH·∫¨N D·∫†NG:');
      buffer.writeln('${unrecognizedLetters.join(', ')}');
      buffer.writeln();
    }

    buffer.writeln('K·∫æT QU·∫¢ PH√ÇN T√çCH:');
    final dominant = countsByAbility.entries.reduce((a, b) => a.value > b.value ? a : b);
    buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ NƒÉng l·ª±c chi·∫øm ∆∞u th·∫ø: ${dominant.key.displayName} (${dominant.value} ch·ªØ c√°i)');
    
    final balance = _calculateBalance();
    buffer.writeln('‚Ä¢ Ch·ªâ s·ªë c√¢n b·∫±ng: ${balance.toStringAsFixed(1)}%');

    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }

  /// T√≠nh ch·ªâ s·ªë c√¢n b·∫±ng
  double _calculateBalance() {
    final counts = countsByAbility.values.toList();
    if (counts.isEmpty) return 0.0;
    
    final mean = counts.reduce((a, b) => a + b) / counts.length;
    final variance = counts.map((count) => (count - mean) * (count - mean)).reduce((a, b) => a + b) / counts.length;
    return (1 / (1 + variance)) * 100;
  }

  /// L·∫•y t√≥m t·∫Øt t√≠nh to√°n
  String get calculationSummary {
    final distribution = countsByAbility.entries
        .map((e) => '${e.key.displayName}: ${e.value}')
        .join(', ');
    return 'T·ªïng: $totalLetters ch·ªØ c√°i | $distribution';
  }

  @override
  bool operator ==(Object other) {
    if (identical(this, other)) return true;
    return other is InnateAbilitiesCalculation &&
        other.fullName == fullName &&
        other.normalizedName == normalizedName &&
        mapEquals(other.letterFrequency, letterFrequency) &&
        other.totalLetters == totalLetters;
  }

  @override
  int get hashCode {
    return fullName.hashCode ^
        normalizedName.hashCode ^
        letterFrequency.hashCode ^
        totalLetters.hashCode;
  }

  @override
  String toString() {
    return 'InnateAbilitiesCalculation(name: $fullName, total: $totalLetters)';
  }
}
```

```dart
  static InnateAbilitiesResult calculate(String fullName) {
    if (fullName.trim().isEmpty) {
      throw ArgumentError('T√™n kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªëng');
    }

    // T√≠nh to√°n c√°c nƒÉng l·ª±c
    final calculation = _calculateAbilities(fullName);
    
    // T·∫°o profile
    final profile = _createProfile(calculation);

    // T·∫°o interpretation v√† messages

    final overallMessage = _generateOverallMessage(profile);

  /// T√≠nh to√°n chi ti·∫øt c√°c nƒÉng l·ª±c t·ª´ t√™n
  static InnateAbilitiesCalculation _calculateAbilities(String fullName) {
    // Chu·∫©n h√≥a t√™n (ch·ªâ gi·ªØ ch·ªØ c√°i, vi·∫øt hoa)
    final normalizedName = _normalizeName(fullName);
    
    // ƒê·∫øm t·∫ßn su·∫•t t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i
    final letterFrequency = <String, int>{};
    final allLetters = <String>[];
    
    for (final char in normalizedName.split('')) {
      if (char.isNotEmpty && char != ' ') {
        letterFrequency[char] = (letterFrequency[char] ?? 0) + 1;
        allLetters.add(char);
      }
    }

    // Ph√¢n lo·∫°i ch·ªØ c√°i theo 4 nh√≥m nƒÉng l·ª±c
    final lettersByAbility = <InnateAbility, List<String>>{};
    final countsByAbility = <InnateAbility, int>{};
    final unrecognizedLetters = <String>[];

    for (final ability in InnateAbility.values) {
      lettersByAbility[ability] = [];
      countsByAbility[ability] = 0;

    // Ph√¢n lo·∫°i t·ª´ng ch·ªØ c√°i
    for (final letter in allLetters) {

          lettersByAbility[ability]!.add(letter);
          countsByAbility[ability] = countsByAbility[ability]! + 1;
          recognized = true;

      if (!recognized) {

    // Lo·∫°i b·ªè tr√πng l·∫∑p trong danh s√°ch ch·ªØ c√°i t√¨m th·∫•y
    for (final ability in InnateAbility.values) {
      lettersByAbility[ability] = lettersByAbility[ability]!.toSet().toList()..sort();
    }

    return InnateAbilitiesCalculation(
      fullName: fullName,
      normalizedName: normalizedName,
      letterFrequency: letterFrequency,
      lettersByAbility: lettersByAbility,

      totalLetters: allLetters.length,

  }

  /// Chu·∫©n h√≥a t√™n (lo·∫°i b·ªè d·∫•u, vi·∫øt hoa, ch·ªâ gi·ªØ ch·ªØ c√°i)

      '√î': 'O', '·ªí': 'O', '·ªê': 'O', '·ªò': 'O', '·ªî': 'O', '·ªñ': 'O',
      '∆†': 'O', '·ªú': 'O', '·ªö': 'O', '·ª¢': 'O', '·ªû': 'O', '·ª†': 'O',
      '√ô': 'U', '√ö': 'U', '·ª§': 'U', '·ª¶': 'U', '≈®': 'U',

  /// T√¨m ƒëi·ªÉm t∆∞∆°ng ƒë·ªìng
  static List<String> _findSimilarities(InnateAbilitiesProfile first, InnateAbilitiesProfile second) {
    final similarities = <String>[];
    
    for (final ability in InnateAbility.values) {
      final firstLevel = first.getAbility(ability).level;
      final secondLevel = second.getAbility(ability).level;
      
      if (firstLevel == secondLevel) {
        similarities.add('C√πng m·ª©c ${ability.displayName}: ${firstLevel.displayName}');
      }

    if (first.dominantAbility.ability == second.dominantAbility.ability) {
      similarities.add('C√πng nƒÉng l·ª±c chi·∫øm ∆∞u th·∫ø: ${first.dominantAbility.displayName}');
    }
    
    return similarities;

  static List<String> _findDifferences(InnateAbilitiesProfile first, InnateAbilitiesProfile second) {
    final differences = <String>[];
    
    for (final ability in InnateAbility.values) {
      final firstLevel = first.getAbility(ability).level;
      final secondLevel = second.getAbility(ability).level;
      
      if (firstLevel != secondLevel) {
        differences.add('${ability.displayName}: ${first.fullName} (${firstLevel.displayName}) vs ${second.fullName} (${secondLevel.displayName})');
```

```dart
  AttitudeNumberResult copyWith({

@immutable
class AttitudeNumberCalculation {
  final DateTime birthDate;
  final int day;
  final int month;
  final int year;
  final List<int> dayDigits;
  final List<int> monthDigits;
  final int initialSum;
  final List<int> reductionSteps;
  final int finalResult;
  final bool isMasterNumber;

  const AttitudeNumberCalculation({
    required this.birthDate,
    required this.day,
    required this.month,
    required this.year,
    required this.dayDigits,
    required this.monthDigits,
    required this.initialSum,
    required this.reductionSteps,
    required this.finalResult,
    required this.isMasterNumber,
  });

  /// L·∫•y gi·∫£i th√≠ch t·ª´ng b∆∞·ªõc
  String get stepByStepExplanation {
    final buffer = StringBuffer();
    buffer.writeln('C√ÅCH T√çNH S·ªê TH√ÅI ƒê·ªò (ATTITUDE NUMBER):');
    buffer.writeln();
    
    buffer.writeln('C√¥ng th·ª©c: Ng√†y sinh + Th√°ng sinh (d∆∞∆°ng l·ªãch)');
    buffer.writeln('Ng√†y sinh: ${day.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${month.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/$year');
    buffer.writeln();

    // Ph√¢n t√°ch ch·ªØ s·ªë
    buffer.writeln('1. PH√ÇN T√ÅCH CH·ªÆ S·ªê:');
    buffer.writeln('   Ng√†y: $day ‚Üí ${dayDigits.join(' + ')}');
    buffer.writeln('   Th√°ng: $month ‚Üí ${monthDigits.join(' + ')}');
    buffer.writeln();

    // T√≠nh t·ªïng ban ƒë·∫ßu
    buffer.writeln('2. T√çNH T·ªîNG BAN ƒê·∫¶U:');
    buffer.write('   ${dayDigits.join(' + ')} + ${monthDigits.join(' + ')}');
    buffer.writeln(' = $initialSum');
    buffer.writeln();

    // R√∫t g·ªçn
    if (reductionSteps.isNotEmpty) {
      buffer.writeln('3. R√öT G·ªåN TH√ÄNH 1 CH·ªÆ S·ªê:');
      for (int i = 0; i < reductionSteps.length - 1; i++) {
        final current = reductionSteps[i];
        final next = reductionSteps[i + 1];
        final digits = _getDigits(current);
        buffer.writeln('   $current ‚Üí ${digits.join(' + ')} = $next');
      }
      
      if (isMasterNumber) {
        buffer.writeln('   ‚Üí Gi·ªØ nguy√™n $finalResult (Master Number)');
      }
    } else {
      buffer.writeln('3. K·∫æT QU·∫¢ NGAY:');
      buffer.writeln('   $initialSum l√† s·ªë ƒë∆°n ${isMasterNumber ? "ho·∫∑c Master Number" : ""}');
    }

    buffer.writeln();
    buffer.writeln('‚Üí S·ªê TH√ÅI ƒê·ªò C·ª¶A B·∫†N: $finalResult');

    return buffer.toString().trim();
  }

  /// L·∫•y ch·ªØ s·ªë t·ª´ m·ªôt s·ªë
  List<int> _getDigits(int number) {
    return number.toString().split('').map(int.parse).toList();
  }

  /// L·∫•y t√≥m t·∫Øt t√≠nh to√°n
  String get calculationSummary {
    final daySum = dayDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    final monthSum = monthDigits.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
    return 'Ng√†y: ${dayDigits.join('+')}=$daySum, Th√°ng: ${monthDigits.join('+')}=$monthSum ‚Üí $daySum+$monthSum=$initialSum${reductionSteps.isNotEmpty ? " ‚Üí $finalResult" : ""}';
  }

  @override
  bool operator ==(Object other) {
    if (identical(this, other)) return true;
    return other is AttitudeNumberCalculation &&
        other.birthDate == birthDate &&
        other.finalResult == finalResult;
  }

  @override
  int get hashCode {
    return birthDate.hashCode ^ finalResult.hashCode;
  }

  @override
  String toString() {
    return 'AttitudeNumberCalculation(birthDate: $birthDate, finalResult: $finalResult)';
  }
}
```

```dart
import '../models/attitude_number_model.dart';
```
