```dart
/// Controller cho m√†n h√¨nh k·∫øt qu·∫£ th·∫ßn s·ªë h·ªçc
class NumerologyResultsController extends GetxController {
  final NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
  final NumerologyPreviewResult? previewResult;

  // Observable states
  final _isLoadingCache = false.obs;
  final _activeFactorForHero =
      0.obs; // Track which factor is being navigated for Hero animation

  // Services
  late final AnalyticsService _analyticsService;
  SmartRatingService? _smartRatingService;

  NumerologyResultsController({this.inputData, this.previewResult});

  // Getters
  bool get isLoadingCache => _isLoadingCache.value;
  bool get hasPreviewData => previewResult != null;

  /// Get the currently active factor ID for Hero animation optimization
  int get activeFactorForHero => _activeFactorForHero.value;

  /// Check if a specific factor should use Hero animation
  bool shouldUseHeroForFactor(int factorId) =>
      _activeFactorForHero.value == factorId;

  /// Clear active factor for Hero animation (reset optimization state)
  void clearActiveFactorForHero() => _activeFactorForHero.value = 0;

  /// Set active factor for Hero animation (used by navigation bar)
  void setActiveFactorForHero(int factorId) =>
      _activeFactorForHero.value = factorId;

  /// Set active factor for back navigation Hero animation
  void setActiveFactorForBackNavigation(int factorId) {
    _activeFactorForHero.value = factorId;

    // Auto-reset after back animation completes
    Future.delayed(const Duration(milliseconds: 300), () {
      clearActiveFactorForHero();
    });
  }

  /// Format ng√†y sinh ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã
  String get formattedBirthDate {
    if (inputData?.birthDate == null) return '';
    final date = inputData!.birthDate;
    return '${date.day.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${date.month.toString().padLeft(2, '0')}/${date.year}';
  }

  /// Navigate ƒë·∫øn m√†n h√¨nh chi ti·∫øt c·ªßa factor v·ªõi preview data
  void navigateToFactorDetail(NumerologyFactor factor) {
    // Track factor click
    _analyticsService.logCustomEvent(
      name: 'numerology_factor_clicked',
      parameters: {
        'factor_id': factor.id,
        'factor_name': factor.name,
        'factor_category': factor.category.toString().split('.').last,
        'has_preview': hasFactorPreview(factor.id),
        if (hasFactorPreview(factor.id)) 
          'factor_number': getFactorNumber(factor.id) ?? 0,
      },
    );

    // Set active factor for Hero animation optimization
    _activeFactorForHero.value = factor.id;

    // Reset active factor after navigation completes (delayed to allow Hero animation)
    Future.delayed(const Duration(milliseconds: 500), () {
      if (_activeFactorForHero.value == factor.id) {
        clearActiveFactorForHero();
      }
    });

    // Get preview number if available
    int? previewNumber;
    if (hasFactorPreview(factor.id)) {
      previewNumber = getFactorNumber(factor.id);
    }

    // Use universal navigation system for all factors
    UniversalFactorRoute.navigateToFactor(
      factorId: factor.id,
      inputData: inputData,
      previewNumber: previewNumber,
      arguments: {
        'factor': factor,
        'previewTitle':
            hasFactorPreview(factor.id) ? getFactorTitle(factor.id) : null,
        'isMasterNumber': hasFactorPreview(factor.id)
            ? isFactorMasterNumber(factor.id)
            : false,
        'fullName': inputData?.fullName ?? '',
      },
    );
  }

  /// L·∫•y c√°c y·∫øu t·ªë theo category
  List<NumerologyFactor> getFactorsByCategory(NumerologyCategory category) {
    return NumerologyFactors.getByCategory(category);
  }

  /// Ki·ªÉm tra c√≥ d·ªØ li·ªáu input kh√¥ng
  bool get hasInputData => inputData != null;

  /// Get calculated number for a factor (from preview or calculate on-demand)
  int? getFactorNumber(int factorId) {
    return previewResult?.factorNumbers[factorId];
  }

  /// Get calculated title for a factor
  String? getFactorTitle(int factorId) {
    return previewResult?.factorTitles[factorId];
  }

  /// Check if factor has master number
  bool isFactorMasterNumber(int factorId) {
    return previewResult?.isMasterNumbers[factorId] ?? false;
  }

  /// Get preview calculation performance info
  String get calculationPerformance {
    if (previewResult == null) return '';
    final totalFactors = previewResult!.factorNumbers.length;
    return 'T√≠nh to√°n $totalFactors y·∫øu t·ªë s·ªë trong ${previewResult!.calculationTime.inMilliseconds}ms';
  }

  /// Check if factor has calculated preview data (numeric factors only)
  bool hasFactorPreview(int factorId) {
    return previewResult?.hasFactorPreview(factorId) ?? false;
  }

  /// Get preview text for numeric factors only
  String getFactorPreviewText(int factorId) {
    return previewResult?.getPreviewText(factorId) ?? 'Ch∆∞a t√≠nh to√°n';
  }

  /// Check if this is a numeric factor that should show preview
  bool isNumericFactor(int factorId) {
    // Only 8 factors have numeric preview: 1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 14
    return [1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 14].contains(factorId);
  }

  @override
  void onInit() {
    super.onInit();

    // Initialize services
    _analyticsService = Get.find<AnalyticsService>();
    
    // Try to get SmartRatingService if available
    try {
      _smartRatingService = Get.find<SmartRatingService>();
      // Start tracking numerology session
      _smartRatingService?.startModuleSession(RatingModule.numerology);
    } catch (e) {
      print('SmartRatingService not available: $e');
    }

    // Track screen view
    _analyticsService.logScreenView(
      screenName: 'numerology_results',
      screenClass: 'NumerologyResultsView',
    );

    // Debug log
    if (inputData != null) {
      print('üìä Numerology Results loaded for: ${inputData!.fullName}');
      print('üìÖ Birth date: ${formattedBirthDate}');

      if (hasPreviewData) {
        final numericFactors = previewResult!.factorNumbers.length;
        print('‚ö° Preview data available: $numericFactors numeric factors');
        print(
            'üìä Calculated factors: ${previewResult!.factorNumbers.keys.toList()}');
        print(
            '‚è±Ô∏è Calculation time: ${previewResult!.calculationTime.inMilliseconds}ms');
      } else {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è No preview data - using on-demand calculation');
      }
    }
  }

  @override
  void onClose() {
    // End numerology session for smart rating
    _smartRatingService?.endModuleSession(
      RatingModule.numerology,
      context: Get.context,
    );
    super.onClose();
  }
}
```

```dart
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
```

```dart
/// M√†n h√¨nh k·∫øt qu·∫£ th·∫ßn s·ªë h·ªçc v·ªõi 16 y·∫øu t·ªë
class NumerologyResultsView extends StatelessWidget {
  const NumerologyResultsView({super.key});

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    final args = Get.arguments;

    // Extract input data and preview result
    NumerologyInputModel? inputData;
    NumerologyPreviewResult? previewResult;

    if (args is Map<String, dynamic>) {
      inputData = args['inputData'] as NumerologyInputModel?;
      previewResult = args['previewResult'] as NumerologyPreviewResult?;
    } else if (args is NumerologyInputModel) {
      inputData = args;
    }

    final controller = Get.put(NumerologyResultsController(
      inputData: inputData,
      previewResult: previewResult,
    ));

    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: const Color(0xFF020931),

              length: 3,

                  // Tab content full height

                    child: TabBarView(

                        _buildScrollableFactorsTab(

            child: Image.asset(

          // Content overlay - positioned higher to be more visible on background

            bottom: 19.nh,

                  controller.formattedBirthDate,
                  style: NumerologyTheme.resultsBirthDate,

                // Button with same shadow style as "B·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu xem"

                  height: 33.nh,

                        NumerologyTheme.buttonBorderRadius),

                      BoxShadow(
                        color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.5),

  /// Build centered main factor for basic tab
  Widget _buildCenteredMainFactor(NumerologyResultsController controller) {
    const factorId = 1;
    final hasPreview = controller.hasFactorPreview(factorId);
    final number = hasPreview ? controller.getFactorNumber(factorId) : null;

    return GestureDetector(
      onTap: () => _navigateToFactor(factorId, controller),
      child: Container(
        padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(vertical: 16.nh),
        child: Column(
          mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
          children: [
            // Premium number circle - size 100 with conditional Hero animation
            Obx(() {
              final shouldUseHero = controller.shouldUseHeroForFactor(factorId);
              final circleWidget = Stack(
                alignment: Alignment.center,
                children: [
                  Image.asset(
                    NumerologyPath.numberCirclePremium,
                    width: 100.nr,
                    height: 100.nr,
                    fit: BoxFit.contain,
                    cacheWidth: 200,
                    cacheHeight: 200,
                    filterQuality: FilterQuality.high, // Consistent with Detail view
                  ),
                  if (hasPreview && number != null)
                    Transform.translate(
                      offset: Offset(0, _getMainFactorOffset(number)), // Dynamic offset for main factor
                      child: Text(
                        number.toString(),
                        style: NumerologyTheme.resultsPremiumNumber, // White text for Life Path premium circle
                      ),
                    ),
                ],
              );
              
              return shouldUseHero
                  ? Hero(
                      tag: 'factor_1_number_${number ?? 0}',
                      child: circleWidget,
                    )
                  : circleWidget;
            }),

            SizedBox(height: 12.nh),

            Text(
              'S·ªê CH·ª¶ ƒê·∫†O',
              style: NumerologyTheme.resultsMainFactorLabel,

  /// Custom tab bar with proper indicator styling
  Widget _buildSimpleTabBar() {
    return Stack(
      children: [
        // Background line for all tabs
        Positioned(
          bottom: 0,
          left: 0,
          right: 0,
          child: Container(
            height: 3.nh,
            color: const Color(0xFF757EDF).withValues(alpha: 0.4),
          ),
        ),
        // TabBar
        TabBar(
          indicatorColor: const Color(0xFF757EDF),
          indicatorWeight: 3.nh,
          indicatorSize: TabBarIndicatorSize.tab,
          indicatorPadding: EdgeInsets.zero,
          labelColor: Colors.white,
          unselectedLabelColor: Colors.white60,
          labelStyle: NumerologyTheme.resultsTabSelected,
          unselectedLabelStyle: NumerologyTheme.resultsTabUnselected,
          tabs: const [
            Tab(text: 'C∆° b·∫£n'),
            Tab(text: 'M·ªü r·ªông'),
            Tab(text: 'Chuy√™n s√¢u'),
          ],
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  /// Scrollable factors tab - all items can scroll including main factor
  Widget _buildScrollableFactorsTab(
      NumerologyCategory category, NumerologyResultsController controller) {
    if (category == NumerologyCategory.basic) {
      // For basic tab - main factor centered + grid below
      return Container(
        color: const Color(0xFF020931),
        child: SingleChildScrollView(
          child: Column(
            children: [
              // Main factor centered with spacing
              Container(
                margin: EdgeInsets.only(top: 24.nh, bottom: 16.nh),
                child: _buildCenteredMainFactor(controller),
              ),

              // Responsive grid of other factors
              GridView.builder(
                shrinkWrap: true,
                physics: const NeverScrollableScrollPhysics(),
                padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw),
                gridDelegate: SliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount(
                  crossAxisCount: _getResponsiveCrossAxisCount(),
                  crossAxisSpacing: 12.nw,
                  mainAxisSpacing: 16.nh,
                  childAspectRatio:
                      _getResponsiveChildAspectRatio(), // Dynamic aspect ratio
                ),
                itemCount: _getBasicFactorsForGrid(controller).length,
                itemBuilder: (context, index) {
                  final factorData = _getBasicFactorsForGrid(controller)[index];
                  return _buildResponsiveFactorCard(factorData, controller);
                },
              ),

              SizedBox(height: 24.nh), // Bottom padding
            ],
          ),
        ),
      );
    } else {
      // For other tabs - show factors with preview priority
      final factors = _getSortedFactorsByCategory(category, controller);
      return Container(
        color: const Color(0xFF020931),
        child: GridView.builder(
          padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.nw),
          gridDelegate: SliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount(
            crossAxisCount: _getResponsiveCrossAxisCount(),
            crossAxisSpacing: 12.nw,
            mainAxisSpacing: 16.nh,
            childAspectRatio: _getResponsiveChildAspectRatio(),
          ),
          itemCount: factors.length,
          itemBuilder: (context, index) {
            final factor = factors[index];
            return _buildResponsiveFactorCard({
              'id': factor.id,
              'name': factor.name,
              'type':
                  controller.hasFactorPreview(factor.id) ? 'number' : 'icon',
              'hasPreview': controller.hasFactorPreview(factor.id),
              'number': controller.hasFactorPreview(factor.id)
                  ? controller.getFactorNumber(factor.id)
                  : null,
              'isMaster': controller.hasFactorPreview(factor.id)
                  ? controller.isFactorMasterNumber(factor.id)
                  : false,
              'icon': factor.icon,
            }, controller);
          },
        ),
      );
    }
  }

  /// Get dynamic offset for number visual alignment in regular circles (66.w)
  /// Fine-tuned offset for each number using Playfair font (66.w circle)
  /// Number 8 is used as baseline (perfect center)
  double _getNumberOffset(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return -9.nh;   // ADJUSTED: Was too high, reduced from -12.nh
      case 2: return -8.nh;   // Slightly high baseline  
      case 3: return -8.nh;   // Similar to 2
      case 4: return -10.nh;  // Tall ascender but shorter than 1
      case 5: return -8.nh;   // Mid-height
      case 6: return -4.nh;   // Heavy bottom, less negative
      case 7: return -10.nh;  // Tall but angled
      case 8: return -3.nh;   // BASELINE - perfect center
      case 9: return -9.nh;   // ADJUSTED: Moved up more from -6.nh
      case 0: return -4.nh;   // Heavy bottom, oval shape
      case 11: return -9.nh;  // Double 1s, adjusted with number 1
      case 22: return -8.nh;  // Double 2s
      case 33: return -8.nh;  // Double 3s
      default: return -8.nh;  // Fallback
    }
  }

  /// Get dynamic offset for main factor circle (100.w)
  /// Proportionally scaled from regular circle offsets (100.nw vs 66.nw = ~1.5x)
  double _getMainFactorOffset(int number) {
    const scale = 1.5; // 100.nw / 66.nw
    return _getNumberOffset(number) * scale;
  }

  /// Navigate to factor detail
  void _navigateToFactor(int factorId, NumerologyResultsController controller) {
    // Get the real factor from the predefined list
    final factor = NumerologyFactors.getById(factorId);

      controller.navigateToFactorDetail(factor);
    } else {
      // TODO: Use proper logging instead of print
      // print('‚ö†Ô∏è Factor with ID $factorId not found');
    }
  }
```

```dart
import 'dart:convert';
import '../models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import 'numerology_preview_service.dart';

/// Cache service for numerology calculations
class NumerologyCacheService {
  static final Map<String, NumerologyPreviewResult> _previewCache = {};
  static final Map<String, DateTime> _cacheTimestamps = {};
  
  // Cache settings
  static const Duration _cacheExpiration = Duration(hours: 24);
  static const int _maxCacheSize = 100;
  
  /// Generate cache key from input data
  static String _generateCacheKey(NumerologyInputModel inputData) {
    final data = {
      'fullName': inputData.fullName.trim().toLowerCase(),
      'birthDate': inputData.birthDate.toIso8601String(),
    };
    
    final jsonString = jsonEncode(data);
    return jsonString.hashCode.toString();
  }
  
  /// Check if cache entry is valid
  static bool _isCacheValid(String cacheKey) {
    final timestamp = _cacheTimestamps[cacheKey];
    if (timestamp == null) return false;
    
    final age = DateTime.now().difference(timestamp);
    return age <= _cacheExpiration;
  }
  
  /// Clean expired cache entries
  static void _cleanExpiredCache() {
    final now = DateTime.now();
    final keysToRemove = <String>[];
    
    for (final entry in _cacheTimestamps.entries) {
      final age = now.difference(entry.value);
      if (age > _cacheExpiration) {
        keysToRemove.add(entry.key);
      }
    }
    
    for (final key in keysToRemove) {
      _previewCache.remove(key);
      _cacheTimestamps.remove(key);
    }
  }
  
  /// Manage cache size
  static void _manageCacheSize() {
    if (_previewCache.length <= _maxCacheSize) return;
    
    // Remove oldest entries first
    final sortedEntries = _cacheTimestamps.entries
        .toList()
        ..sort((a, b) => a.value.compareTo(b.value));
    
    final keysToRemove = sortedEntries
        .take(_previewCache.length - _maxCacheSize)
        .map((e) => e.key)
        .toList();
    
    for (final key in keysToRemove) {
      _previewCache.remove(key);
      _cacheTimestamps.remove(key);
    }
  }
  
  /// Get cached preview result
  static NumerologyPreviewResult? getCachedPreview(NumerologyInputModel inputData) {
    _cleanExpiredCache();
    
    final cacheKey = _generateCacheKey(inputData);
    
    if (!_isCacheValid(cacheKey)) return null;
    
    final cachedResult = _previewCache[cacheKey];
    if (cachedResult != null) {
      final numericFactors = cachedResult.factorNumbers.length;
      print('üéØ Cache HIT for ${inputData.fullName} ($numericFactors numeric factors)');
    }
    
    return cachedResult;
  }
  
  /// Cache preview result
  static void cachePreview(NumerologyInputModel inputData, NumerologyPreviewResult result) {
    _cleanExpiredCache();
    _manageCacheSize();
    
    final cacheKey = _generateCacheKey(inputData);
    
    _previewCache[cacheKey] = result;
    _cacheTimestamps[cacheKey] = DateTime.now();
    
    final numericFactors = result.factorNumbers.length;
    print('üíæ Cached preview for ${inputData.fullName} ($numericFactors numeric factors)');
  }
  
  /// Get cached preview with fallback calculation
  static Future<NumerologyPreviewResult> getOrCalculatePreview(
    NumerologyInputModel inputData,
  ) async {
    // Try cache first
    final cached = getCachedPreview(inputData);
    if (cached != null) return cached;
    
    // Calculate and cache
    final result = await NumerologyPreviewService.calculatePreview(inputData);
    cachePreview(inputData, result);
    
    return result;
  }
  
  /// Clear specific cache entry
  static void clearCache(NumerologyInputModel inputData) {
    final cacheKey = _generateCacheKey(inputData);
    _previewCache.remove(cacheKey);
    _cacheTimestamps.remove(cacheKey);
    
    print('üóëÔ∏è Cleared cache for ${inputData.fullName}');
  }
  
  /// Clear all cache
  static void clearAllCache() {
    final count = _previewCache.length;
    _previewCache.clear();
    _cacheTimestamps.clear();
    
    print('üóëÔ∏è Cleared all cache ($count entries)');
  }
  
  /// Get cache statistics
  static Map<String, dynamic> getCacheStats() {
    _cleanExpiredCache();
    
    return {
      'totalEntries': _previewCache.length,
      'maxSize': _maxCacheSize,
      'expirationHours': _cacheExpiration.inHours,
      'oldestEntry': _cacheTimestamps.values.isNotEmpty 
          ? _cacheTimestamps.values.reduce((a, b) => a.isBefore(b) ? a : b)
          : null,
      'newestEntry': _cacheTimestamps.values.isNotEmpty
          ? _cacheTimestamps.values.reduce((a, b) => a.isAfter(b) ? a : b)
          : null,
    };
  }
  
  /// Preload cache with common calculations
  static Future<void> preloadCommonCalculations(List<NumerologyInputModel> commonInputs) async {
    print('üîÑ Preloading cache with ${commonInputs.length} common calculations...');
    
    final futures = commonInputs.map((input) async {
      try {
        final result = await NumerologyPreviewService.calculatePreview(input);
        cachePreview(input, result);
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Failed to preload cache for ${input.fullName}: $e');
      }
    });
    
    await Future.wait(futures);
    print('‚úÖ Cache preload completed');
  }
}
```

```dart
import 'dart:async';
import '../models/numerology_input_model.dart';
import 'numerology_preview_service.dart';

/// Error types for numerology calculations
enum NumerologyErrorType {
  invalidInput('D·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·∫ßu v√†o kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá'),
  calculationTimeout('T√≠nh to√°n qu√° l√¢u, vui l√≤ng th·ª≠ l·∫°i'),
  networkError('L·ªói k·∫øt n·ªëi m·∫°ng'),
  unknownError('L·ªói kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh'),
  missingData('Thi·∫øu d·ªØ li·ªáu c·∫ßn thi·∫øt'),
  invalidDate('Ng√†y sinh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá'),
  invalidName('T√™n kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá');

  const NumerologyErrorType(this.message);
  final String message;
}

/// Enhanced numerology exception with fallback support
class NumerologyException implements Exception {
  final NumerologyErrorType errorType;
  final String? details;
  final StackTrace? stackTrace;
  final Duration? calculationTime;

  const NumerologyException(
    this.errorType, {
    this.details,
    this.stackTrace,
    this.calculationTime,
  });

  @override
  String toString() {
    final buffer = StringBuffer('NumerologyException: ${errorType.message}');
    if (details != null) buffer.write(' - $details');
    if (calculationTime != null) {
      buffer.write(' (took ${calculationTime!.inMilliseconds}ms)');
    }
    return buffer.toString();
  }
}

/// Fallback result for failed calculations
class NumerologyFallbackResult {
  final Map<int, int> availableNumbers;
  final Map<int, String?> availableTitles;
  final Map<int, bool> availableMasterNumbers;
  final List<int> failedFactors;
  final Duration calculationTime;

  const NumerologyFallbackResult({
    required this.availableNumbers,
    required this.availableTitles,
    required this.availableMasterNumbers,
    required this.failedFactors,
    required this.calculationTime,
  });
}

/// Error handling and fallback service
class NumerologyErrorService {
  static const Duration _maxRetryDelay = Duration(seconds: 2);
  static const int _maxRetries = 3;
  
  /// Validate input data
  static NumerologyException? validateInput(NumerologyInputModel inputData) {
    // Validate name
    if (inputData.fullName.trim().isEmpty) {
      return const NumerologyException(
        NumerologyErrorType.invalidName,
        details: 'T√™n kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªëng',
      );
    }
    
    if (inputData.fullName.trim().length < 2) {
      return const NumerologyException(
        NumerologyErrorType.invalidName,
        details: 'T√™n qu√° ng·∫Øn (√≠t nh·∫•t 2 k√Ω t·ª±)',
      );
    }
    
    // Validate birth date
    final now = DateTime.now();
    if (inputData.birthDate.isAfter(now)) {
      return const NumerologyException(
        NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate,
        details: 'Ng√†y sinh kh√¥ng th·ªÉ l·ªõn h∆°n hi·ªán t·∫°i',
      );
    }
    
    if (inputData.birthDate.year < 1900) {
      return const NumerologyException(
        NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate,
        details: 'Ng√†y sinh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá (tr∆∞·ªõc nƒÉm 1900)',
      );
    }
    
    if (inputData.birthDate.year > now.year) {
      return const NumerologyException(
        NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate,
        details: 'Ng√†y sinh kh√¥ng th·ªÉ trong t∆∞∆°ng lai',
      );
    }
    
    return null;
  }
  
  /// Categorize exception
  static NumerologyErrorType categorizeError(dynamic error) {
    if (error is TimeoutException) {
      return NumerologyErrorType.calculationTimeout;
    } else if (error is NumerologyCalculationException) {
      return NumerologyErrorType.unknownError;
    } else if (error is NumerologyException) {
      return error.errorType;
    } else if (error.toString().contains('name') || error.toString().contains('t√™n')) {
      return NumerologyErrorType.invalidName;
    } else if (error.toString().contains('date') || error.toString().contains('ng√†y')) {
      return NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate;
    } else {
      return NumerologyErrorType.unknownError;
    }
  }
  
  /// Calculate with retry logic
  static Future<NumerologyPreviewResult> calculateWithRetry(
    NumerologyInputModel inputData,
  ) async {
    final stopwatch = Stopwatch()..start();
    
    // Validate input first
    final validationError = validateInput(inputData);
    if (validationError != null) {
      stopwatch.stop();
      throw NumerologyException(
        validationError.errorType,
        details: validationError.details,
        calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
      );
    }
    
    for (int attempt = 1; attempt <= _maxRetries; attempt++) {
      try {
        final result = await NumerologyPreviewService.calculatePreview(inputData);
        stopwatch.stop();
        
        print('‚úÖ Calculation succeeded on attempt $attempt (${stopwatch.elapsed.inMilliseconds}ms)');
        return result;
        
      } catch (e, stackTrace) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Calculation failed on attempt $attempt: $e');
        
        if (attempt == _maxRetries) {
          stopwatch.stop();
          throw NumerologyException(
            categorizeError(e),
            details: e.toString(),
            stackTrace: stackTrace,
            calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
          );
        }
        
        // Wait before retry (exponential backoff)
        final delay = Duration(milliseconds: 200 * attempt);
        await Future.delayed(delay.inMilliseconds > _maxRetryDelay.inMilliseconds 
            ? _maxRetryDelay 
            : delay);
      }
    }
    
    stopwatch.stop();
    throw NumerologyException(
      NumerologyErrorType.unknownError,
      details: 'Calculation failed after $_maxRetries attempts',
      calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
    );
  }
  
  /// Calculate with fallback (partial results)
  static Future<NumerologyFallbackResult> calculateWithFallback(
    NumerologyInputModel inputData,
  ) async {
    final stopwatch = Stopwatch()..start();
    
    final numbers = <int, int>{};
    final titles = <int, String?>{};
    final masters = <int, bool>{};
    final failed = <int>[];
    
    // Individual factor calculations with error isolation
    final factorCalculations = [
      () async {
        try {
          // Factor 1: Life Path
          await Future.delayed(const Duration(milliseconds: 10));
          numbers[1] = inputData.birthDate.day % 9 + 1; // Fallback calculation
          titles[1] = 'Ng∆∞·ªùi L√£nh ƒê·∫°o';
          masters[1] = false;
        } catch (e) {
          failed.add(1);
          print('‚ùå Factor 1 fallback failed: $e');
        }
      },
      () async {
        try {
          // Factor 4: Expression Number
          if (inputData.fullName.isNotEmpty) {
            await Future.delayed(const Duration(milliseconds: 10));
            numbers[4] = inputData.fullName.length % 9 + 1; // Fallback calculation
            titles[4] = 'Bi·ªÉu Hi·ªán';
            masters[4] = false;
          }
        } catch (e) {
          failed.add(4);
          print('‚ùå Factor 4 fallback failed: $e');
        }
      },
      // Add more factor fallbacks as needed
    ];
    
    await Future.wait(factorCalculations.map((calc) => calc()));
    
    stopwatch.stop();
    
    print('üõ°Ô∏è Fallback calculation completed: ${numbers.length} factors, ${failed.length} failed');
    
    return NumerologyFallbackResult(
      availableNumbers: numbers,
      availableTitles: titles,
      availableMasterNumbers: masters,
      failedFactors: failed,
      calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
    );
  }
  
  /// Get user-friendly error message
  static String getUserFriendlyMessage(NumerologyException error) {
    switch (error.errorType) {
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidInput:
        return 'Vui l√≤ng ki·ªÉm tra l·∫°i th√¥ng tin ƒë·∫ßu v√†o';
      case NumerologyErrorType.calculationTimeout:
        return 'T√≠nh to√°n m·∫•t qu√° nhi·ªÅu th·ªùi gian. Vui l√≤ng th·ª≠ l·∫°i';
      case NumerologyErrorType.networkError:
        return 'Ki·ªÉm tra k·∫øt n·ªëi m·∫°ng v√† th·ª≠ l·∫°i';
      case NumerologyErrorType.missingData:
        return 'Thi·∫øu th√¥ng tin c·∫ßn thi·∫øt. Vui l√≤ng nh·∫≠p ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß';
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate:
        return error.details ?? 'Ng√†y sinh kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá';
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidName:
        return error.details ?? 'T√™n kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá';
      case NumerologyErrorType.unknownError:
        return 'C√≥ l·ªói x·∫£y ra. Vui l√≤ng th·ª≠ l·∫°i sau';
    }
  }
  
  /// Check if error is recoverable
  static bool isRecoverable(NumerologyException error) {
    switch (error.errorType) {
      case NumerologyErrorType.calculationTimeout:
      case NumerologyErrorType.networkError:
      case NumerologyErrorType.unknownError:
        return true;
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidInput:
      case NumerologyErrorType.missingData:
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidDate:
      case NumerologyErrorType.invalidName:
        return false;
    }
  }
}
```

```dart
/// Simplified preview result model - only numeric factors
class NumerologyPreviewResult {

/// Service for calculating preview numbers efficiently
class NumerologyPreviewService {
  static const Duration _timeout = Duration(seconds: 3);

  /// Calculate preview numbers for all factors
  static Future<NumerologyPreviewResult> calculatePreview(
    NumerologyInputModel inputData,
  ) async {
    final stopwatch = Stopwatch()..start();
    
    try {
      final completer = Completer<NumerologyPreviewResult>();
      
      // Run calculations with timeout protection
      final future = _performCalculations(inputData);
      Timer(_timeout, () {
        if (!completer.isCompleted) {
          completer.completeError(TimeoutException('Calculation timeout', _timeout));
        }
      });
      
      final result = await future;
      stopwatch.stop();
      
      if (!completer.isCompleted) {
        completer.complete(NumerologyPreviewResult(
          factorNumbers: result['numbers'] as Map<int, int>,
          factorTitles: result['titles'] as Map<int, String?>,
          isMasterNumbers: result['masters'] as Map<int, bool>,
          calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
        ));
      }
      
      return completer.future;
    } catch (e) {
      stopwatch.stop();
      throw NumerologyCalculationException(
        'Failed to calculate preview: ${e.toString()}',
        calculationTime: stopwatch.elapsed,
      );
    }
  }

  /// Perform calculations for 9 numeric factors only
  static Future<Map<String, dynamic>> _performCalculations(
    NumerologyInputModel inputData,
  ) async {
    final numbers = <int, int>{};
    final titles = <int, String?>{};
    final masters = <int, bool>{};

    // Factor 1: Life Path
    int? lifePathNumber;
    try {
      lifePathNumber = LifePathCalculator.calculate(inputData.birthDate);
      numbers[1] = lifePathNumber;
      titles[1] = _getLifePathTitle(lifePathNumber);
      masters[1] = _isMasterNumber(lifePathNumber);
    } catch (e) {
      print('‚ö†Ô∏è Life Path calculation error: $e');
    }

    // Factor 4: Expression Number
    if (inputData.fullName.isNotEmpty) {
      try {
        final expressionResult = ExpressionNumberCalculator.calculate(inputData.fullName);
        numbers[4] = expressionResult.expressionNumber.value;
        titles[4] = expressionResult.expressionNumber.title;
        masters[4] = expressionResult.calculation.isMasterNumber;
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Expression calculation error: $e');
      }

      // Factor 5: Soul Urge Number
      try {
        final soulUrgeResult = SoulUrgeCalculator.calculate(inputData.fullName);
        numbers[5] = soulUrgeResult.soulUrge.value;
        titles[5] = soulUrgeResult.soulUrge.title;
        masters[5] = soulUrgeResult.calculation.isMasterNumber;
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Soul Urge calculation error: $e');
      }

      // Factor 6: Personality Number
      try {
        final personalityResult = PersonalityCalculator.calculate(inputData.fullName);
        numbers[6] = personalityResult.personality.value;
        titles[6] = personalityResult.personality.title;
        masters[6] = personalityResult.personality.isMasterNumber;
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Personality calculation error: $e');
      }

      // Factor 10: Maturity Number
      try {
        final maturityNumber = MaturityNumberCalculator.calculateValue(
          inputData.birthDate, 
          inputData.fullName,
        );
        numbers[10] = maturityNumber;
        titles[10] = _getMaturityTitle(maturityNumber);
        masters[10] = MaturityNumberCalculator.isMasterNumber(
          inputData.birthDate, 
          inputData.fullName,
        );
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Maturity calculation error: $e');
      }

      // Factor 14: Attitude Number
      try {
        final attitudeResult = AttitudeNumberCalculator.calculate(
          inputData.fullName, 
          inputData.birthDate,
        );
        numbers[14] = attitudeResult.attitudeModel.value;
        titles[14] = attitudeResult.attitudeModel.title;
        masters[14] = attitudeResult.attitudeModel.isMasterNumber;
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Attitude calculation error: $e');
      }
        
      // Factor 11: Hidden Passion Number
      try {
        // Pass Life Path number for tie-breaking according to rules
        final hiddenPassionResult = HiddenPassionCalculator.calculate(
          inputData.fullName,
          lifePathNumber: lifePathNumber, // Pass Life Path for priority checking
        );
        numbers[11] = hiddenPassionResult.calculatedValue;
        titles[11] = hiddenPassionResult.title;
        masters[11] = false; // Hidden Passion kh√¥ng c√≥ Master Number
      } catch (e) {
        print('‚ö†Ô∏è Hidden Passion calculation error: $e');
      }
    }

    // Factor 9: Birth Day Number
    try {
      final birthDayNumber = BirthDayNumberCalculator.calculateValue(inputData.birthDate);
      numbers[9] = birthDayNumber;
      titles[9] = _getBirthDayTitle(birthDayNumber);
      masters[9] = _isMasterNumber(birthDayNumber);
    } catch (e) {
      print('‚ö†Ô∏è Birth Day calculation error: $e');
    }
      
    // Factor 7: Personal Year (current year calculation)
    try {
      final currentYear = DateTime.now().year;
      final personalYear = _calculatePersonalYear(inputData.birthDate, currentYear);
      numbers[7] = personalYear;
      titles[7] = _getPersonalYearTitle(personalYear);
      masters[7] = false;
    } catch (e) {
      print('‚ö†Ô∏è Personal Year calculation error: $e');
    }

    return {
      'numbers': numbers,
      'titles': titles,
      'masters': masters,
    };
  }

  /// Get title helpers
  static String _getLifePathTitle(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi L√£nh ƒê·∫°o';
      case 2: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi H·ª£p T√°c';
      case 3: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi S√°ng T·∫°o';
      case 4: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi X√¢y D·ª±ng';
      case 5: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi T·ª± Do';
      case 6: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Nu√¥i D∆∞·ª°ng';
      case 7: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi T√¨m Ki·∫øm';
      case 8: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Quy·ªÅn L·ª±c';
      case 9: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Nh√¢n ƒê·∫°o';
      case 11: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Truy·ªÅn C·∫£m H·ª©ng';
      case 22: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Ki·∫øn T·∫°o Vƒ© ƒê·∫°i';
      case 33: return 'Ng∆∞·ªùi Th·∫ßy T√¢m Linh';
      default: return 'Con s·ªë $number';
    }
  }

  static String _getMaturityTitle(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return 'L√£nh ƒê·∫°o Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 2: return 'H·ª£p T√°c Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 3: return 'S√°ng T·∫°o Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 4: return 'X√¢y D·ª±ng Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 5: return 'T·ª± Do Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 6: return 'ChƒÉm S√≥c Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 7: return 'Tr√≠ Tu·ªá Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 8: return 'Quy·ªÅn L·ª±c Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 9: return 'Nh√¢n ƒê·∫°o Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 11: return 'C·∫£m H·ª©ng Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 22: return 'Ki·∫øn T·∫°o Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      case 33: return 'Ch·ªØa L√†nh Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh';
      default: return 'Tr∆∞·ªüng Th√†nh $number';
    }
  }

  static String _getBirthDayTitle(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return 'L√£nh ƒê·∫°o B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 2: return 'H·ª£p T√°c B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 3: return 'S√°ng T·∫°o B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 4: return 'T·ªï Ch·ª©c B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 5: return 'T·ª± Do B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 6: return 'ChƒÉm S√≥c B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 7: return 'Tr√≠ Tu·ªá B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 8: return 'Quy·ªÅn L·ª±c B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 9: return 'Nh√¢n ƒê·∫°o B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 11: return 'Tr·ª±c Gi√°c B·∫©m Sinh';
      case 22: return 'Ki·∫øn T·∫°o B·∫©m Sinh';
      default: return 'Thi√™n Ph√∫ $number';
    }
  }

  static bool _isMasterNumber(int number) {
    return number == 11 || number == 22 || number == 33;
  }
  
  /// Personal Year calculation (matching PersonalYearCalculator)
  static int _calculatePersonalYear(DateTime birthDate, int year) {
    // Step 1: Sum digits of each component separately
    final daySum = _sumDigits(birthDate.day);
    final monthSum = _sumDigits(birthDate.month);
    final yearSum = _sumDigits(year);
    
    // Step 2: Add all components
    final totalSum = daySum + monthSum + yearSum;
    
    // Step 3: Reduce to single digit (no master numbers for Personal Year)
    return _reduceSumToSingleDigit(totalSum);
  }
  
  /// Sum individual digits of a number
  static int _sumDigits(int number) {
    int sum = 0;
    while (number > 0) {
      sum += number % 10;
      number ~/= 10;
    }
    return sum;
  }
  
  /// Reduce sum to single digit (1-9, no master numbers)
  static int _reduceSumToSingleDigit(int sum) {
    int current = sum;
    while (current > 9) {
      current = _sumDigits(current);
    }
    return current;
  }
  
  /// Get Personal Year title
  static String _getPersonalYearTitle(int number) {
    switch (number) {
      case 1: return 'NƒÉm Kh·ªüi ƒê·∫ßu M·ªõi';
      case 2: return 'NƒÉm H·ª£p T√°c';
      case 3: return 'NƒÉm S√°ng T·∫°o';
      case 4: return 'NƒÉm X√¢y D·ª±ng';
      case 5: return 'NƒÉm T·ª± Do';
      case 6: return 'NƒÉm ChƒÉm S√≥c';
      case 7: return 'NƒÉm Tr√¨ Tu·ªá';
      case 8: return 'NƒÉm Th√†nh C√¥ng';
      case 9: return 'NƒÉm Ho√†n T·∫•t';
      case 11: return 'NƒÉm Tr·ª±c Gi√°c';
      case 22: return 'NƒÉm Ki·∫øn T·∫°o';
      default: return 'NƒÉm $number';
    }
  }
}

/// Custom exception for calculation errors
class NumerologyCalculationException implements Exception {
  final String message;
  final Duration calculationTime;

  const NumerologyCalculationException(
    this.message, {
    required this.calculationTime,
  });

  @override
  String toString() => 'NumerologyCalculationException: $message (took ${calculationTime.inMilliseconds}ms)';
}
```

```dart
import 'dart:ui';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:get/get.dart';
import '../../theme/numerology_theme.dart';
import '../../utils/numerology_responsive.dart';

/// Custom date picker dialog matching numerology input view style
class CustomDatePickerDialog extends StatefulWidget {
  final DateTime? initialDate;
  final Function(DateTime) onDateSelected;

  const CustomDatePickerDialog({
    super.key,
    this.initialDate,
    required this.onDateSelected,
  });

  @override
  State<CustomDatePickerDialog> createState() => _CustomDatePickerDialogState();
}

class _CustomDatePickerDialogState extends State<CustomDatePickerDialog> {
  late DateTime selectedDate;
  late FixedExtentScrollController dayController;
  late FixedExtentScrollController monthController;
  late FixedExtentScrollController yearController;

  final int currentYear = DateTime.now().year;
  final int minYear = 1900;

  List<int> days = [];
  final List<int> months = List.generate(12, (index) => index + 1);
  final List<String> monthNames = [
    'Th√°ng 1',
    'Th√°ng 2',
    'Th√°ng 3',
    'Th√°ng 4',
    'Th√°ng 5',
    'Th√°ng 6',
    'Th√°ng 7',
    'Th√°ng 8',
    'Th√°ng 9',
    'Th√°ng 10',
    'Th√°ng 11',
    'Th√°ng 12'
  ];
  late List<int> years;

  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    selectedDate = widget.initialDate ?? DateTime(1990, 1, 1);

    // Generate years from minYear up to current year (oldest to newest)
    years = List.generate(
        currentYear - minYear + 1, (index) => minYear + index);

    _updateDaysInMonth();

    // Set initial scroll positions
    final initialDayIndex = selectedDate.day - 1;
    final initialMonthIndex = selectedDate.month - 1;
    final initialYearIndex = years.indexOf(selectedDate.year);

    dayController = FixedExtentScrollController(initialItem: initialDayIndex);
    monthController =
        FixedExtentScrollController(initialItem: initialMonthIndex);
    yearController = FixedExtentScrollController(
        initialItem: initialYearIndex >= 0 ? initialYearIndex : 0);
  }

  void _updateDaysInMonth() {
    final daysInMonth =
        DateTime(selectedDate.year, selectedDate.month + 1, 0).day;
    days = List.generate(daysInMonth, (index) => index + 1);
  }

  void _onDateChanged() {
    setState(() {
      _updateDaysInMonth();
      // Adjust day if it exceeds the new month's limit
      if (selectedDate.day > days.length) {
        selectedDate =
            DateTime(selectedDate.year, selectedDate.month, days.length);
        WidgetsBinding.instance.addPostFrameCallback((_) {
          if (dayController.hasClients) {
            dayController.animateToItem(
              days.length - 1,
              duration: const Duration(milliseconds: 300),
              curve: Curves.easeInOut,
            );
          }
        });
      }
    });
  }

  @override
  void dispose() {
    dayController.dispose();
    monthController.dispose();
    yearController.dispose();
    super.dispose();
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Dialog(
      backgroundColor: Colors.transparent,
      child: Container(
        constraints: BoxConstraints(maxWidth: 340.nw),
        child: ClipRRect(
          borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(20.nr),
          child: BackdropFilter(
            filter: ImageFilter.blur(sigmaX: 20, sigmaY: 20),
            child: Container(
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(20.nr),
                color: const Color(0xFF020931).withValues(alpha: 0.95),
                border: Border.all(
                  color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.3),
                  width: 1.5,
                ),
              ),
              child: Column(
                mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
                children: [
                  _buildHeader(),
                  _buildDatePickers(),
                  _buildActions(),
                ],
              ),
            ),
          ),
        ),
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildHeader() {
    return Container(
      width: double.infinity,
      padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(24.nw, 20.nh, 24.nw, 16.nh),
      alignment: Alignment.center,
      decoration: BoxDecoration(
        border: Border(
          bottom: BorderSide(
            color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.2),
            width: 1,
          ),
        ),
      ),
      child: Text(
        'Ch·ªçn ng√†y sinh',
        style: NumerologyTheme.datePickerTitle,
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildDatePickers() {
    return Container(
      height: 240.nh,
      padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.nw, vertical: 20.nh),
      child: Row(
        children: [
          // Day picker
          Expanded(
            flex: 2,
            child: _buildWheelPicker(
              controller: dayController,
              items: days,
              onSelectedItemChanged: (index) {
                selectedDate = DateTime(
                    selectedDate.year, selectedDate.month, days[index]);
              },
              label: 'Ng√†y',
            ),
          ),

          SizedBox(width: 8.nw),

          // Month picker
          Expanded(
            flex: 3,
            child: _buildMonthWheelPicker(
              controller: monthController,
              items: monthNames,
              onSelectedItemChanged: (index) {
                selectedDate = DateTime(
                    selectedDate.year, months[index], selectedDate.day);
                _onDateChanged();
              },
              label: 'Th√°ng',
            ),
          ),

          SizedBox(width: 8.nw),

          // Year picker
          Expanded(
            flex: 2,
            child: _buildWheelPicker(
              controller: yearController,
              items: years,
              onSelectedItemChanged: (index) {
                selectedDate = DateTime(
                    years[index], selectedDate.month, selectedDate.day);
                _onDateChanged();
              },
              label: 'NƒÉm',
            ),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildWheelPicker({
    required FixedExtentScrollController controller,
    required List<int> items,
    required Function(int) onSelectedItemChanged,
    required String label,
  }) {
    return Column(
      children: [
        // Label
        Text(
          label,
          style: NumerologyTheme.datePickerButton.copyWith(
            fontSize: 12.nsp,
            color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.7),
          ),
        ),

        SizedBox(height: 8.nh),

        // Wheel picker with built-in selection background
        Expanded(
          child: Stack(
            children: [
              // Selection highlight - perfectly centered
              Positioned.fill(
                child: Center(
                  child: Container(
                    height: 44.nh,
                    margin: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 4.nw),
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(
                      color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.1),
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12.nr),
                      border: Border.all(
                        color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.4),
                        width: 1.5,
                      ),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
              ),
              
              // Wheel picker
              ListWheelScrollView.useDelegate(
                controller: controller,
                itemExtent: 44.nh,
                physics: const FixedExtentScrollPhysics(),
                diameterRatio: 2.5,
                perspective: 0.003,
                squeeze: 0.9,
                onSelectedItemChanged: onSelectedItemChanged,
                childDelegate: ListWheelChildBuilderDelegate(
                  builder: (context, index) {
                    if (index < 0 || index >= items.length) return null;

                    return Container(
                      height: 44.nh,
                      alignment: Alignment.center,
                      child: AnimatedBuilder(
                        animation: controller,
                        builder: (context, child) {
                          double itemOffset = 0;
                          if (controller.hasClients) {
                            final position = controller.position;
                            if (position.hasContentDimensions) {
                              itemOffset = (position.pixels / 44.nh) - index;
                            }
                          }

                          final isSelected = itemOffset.abs() < 0.5;
                          final opacity =
                              (1 - (itemOffset.abs().clamp(0.0, 1.0) * 0.5));

                          return Container(
                            width: double.infinity,
                            alignment: Alignment.center,
                            child: Opacity(
                              opacity: opacity,
                              child: Text(
                                items[index].toString(),
                                textAlign: TextAlign.center,
                                style: NumerologyTheme.datePickerButton.copyWith(
                                  fontSize: isSelected ? 18.nsp : 15.nsp,
                                  fontWeight: isSelected
                                      ? FontWeight.w700
                                      : FontWeight.w500,
                                  color: isSelected
                                      ? Colors.white
                                      : Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.6),
                                  height: 1.2,
                                ),
                              ),
                            ),
                          );
                        },
                      ),
                    );
                  },
                  childCount: items.length,
                ),
              ),
            ],
          ),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

                  child: Container(
                    height: 44.nh,
                    margin: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 4.nw),
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(
                      color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.1),
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12.nr),
                      border: Border.all(
                        color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.4),
                        width: 1.5,
                      ),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
              ),
              
              // Wheel picker
              ListWheelScrollView.useDelegate(
                controller: controller,
                itemExtent: 44.nh,
                physics: const FixedExtentScrollPhysics(),
                diameterRatio: 2.5,
                perspective: 0.003,
                squeeze: 0.9,
                onSelectedItemChanged: onSelectedItemChanged,
                childDelegate: ListWheelChildBuilderDelegate(
                  builder: (context, index) {
                    if (index < 0 || index >= items.length) return null;

                    return Container(
                      height: 44.nh,
                      alignment: Alignment.center,
                      child: AnimatedBuilder(
                        animation: controller,
                        builder: (context, child) {
                          double itemOffset = 0;
                          if (controller.hasClients) {
                            final position = controller.position;
                            if (position.hasContentDimensions) {
                              itemOffset = (position.pixels / 44.nh) - index;
                            }
                          }

                          final isSelected = itemOffset.abs() < 0.5;
                          final opacity =
                              (1 - (itemOffset.abs().clamp(0.0, 1.0) * 0.5));

                          return Container(
                            width: double.infinity,
                            alignment: Alignment.center,
                            child: Opacity(
                              opacity: opacity,
                              child: Text(
                                items[index],
                                textAlign: TextAlign.center,
                                style: NumerologyTheme.datePickerButton.copyWith(
                                  fontSize: isSelected ? 16.nsp : 13.nsp,
                                  fontWeight: isSelected
                                      ? FontWeight.w700
                                      : FontWeight.w500,
                                  color: isSelected
                                      ? Colors.white
                                      : Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.6),
                                  height: 1.2,
                                ),
                              ),
                            ),
                          );
                        },
                      ),
                    );
                  },
                  childCount: items.length,
                ),
              ),
            ],
          ),
        ),
      ],
    );
  }

  Widget _buildActions() {
    return Container(
      padding: EdgeInsets.all(24.nw),
      child: Row(
        children: [
          // Cancel button
          Expanded(
            child: _buildActionButton(
              text: 'Hu·ª∑',
              onPressed: () => Get.back(),
              isPrimary: false,
            ),
          ),

          SizedBox(width: 16.nw),

          // Confirm button
          Expanded(
            child: _buildActionButton(
              text: 'Ch·ªçn',
              onPressed: () {
                widget.onDateSelected(selectedDate);
                Get.back();
              },
              isPrimary: true,
            ),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget _buildActionButton({
    required String text,
    required VoidCallback onPressed,
    required bool isPrimary,
  }) {
    return Container(
      height: 44.nh,
      decoration: BoxDecoration(
        borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(22.nr),
        color: isPrimary ? const Color(0xFF4C5CE6) : Colors.transparent,
        border: isPrimary
            ? null
            : Border.all(
                color: Colors.white.withValues(alpha: 0.3),
                width: 1,
              ),
      ),
      child: ElevatedButton(
        onPressed: onPressed,
        style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
          backgroundColor: Colors.transparent,
          shadowColor: Colors.transparent,
          elevation: 0,
          shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
            borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(22.nr),
          ),
          padding: EdgeInsets.zero,
        ),
        child: Text(
          text,
          style: NumerologyTheme.datePickerButton,
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

/// Extension to show the custom date picker
extension CustomDatePickerExtension on BuildContext {
  Future<DateTime?> showCustomDatePicker({
    DateTime? initialDate,
  }) async {
    DateTime? selectedDate;

    await showDialog<void>(
      context: this,
      barrierDismissible: true,
      barrierColor: Colors.black.withValues(alpha: 0.6),
      builder: (context) => CustomDatePickerDialog(
        initialDate: initialDate,
        onDateSelected: (date) {
          selectedDate = date;
        },
      ),
    );

    return selectedDate;
  }
}
```
